story:
Each cup of Virtual Acoustic headset contains 4 discrete drivers - left surround, right surround, one mid-range speaker, and one sub woofer. By combining advanced acoustic algorithms and digital signal processing algorithms, we deliver you true Dolby 5.1 surround audio with incredibly clarity and spaciousness.

 

 

 

At the heart of the Audio Decoder resides a 32-bit DAC with Dolby Digital and Pro Logic IIx and other decoding abilities.

 

The Audio Decoder includes both digital and analog inputs (a coaxial, an optical, one USB-C, analog and Bluetooth) and a pair of outputs: 5.1 analog output and 2.4G WiFi 5.1-channel output.

 

 

 

2.4 GHz proprietary wireless protocol gets you the most uncompressed audio without dropouts, delays or interruptions associated with Bluetooth. It brings more flexibility to immerse yourself in virtual reality world, and more care to your families when you enjoy games.

 

 

 

 

The audio decoder can be simultaneously connected by 4 Virtual Acoustic headphones at most. Get your personal theater experience at home.

 

 

 

 

Truly Dolby 5.1-Channel surround sound takes the excitement of your games to the next level and truly immerses you in the action with more depth, realism and spatial accuracy. Get the winning edge and lost in epic adventures on your home console with the details delivered by Virtual Acoustic headset sysetm. 


It’s compatible with a wide range of gaming and media systems including PlayStation, Xbox 360, and PCs. 

 

 

 

With unwavering commitment to quality and audio performance, we’ve included the latest CSR8645 high quality decoding chip, which allows for 3D sound streaming over Bluetooth. You’ll have top-notch immersive sound alone with our wireless headset when you’re out the reach of our Audio Decoder.

 

 

 

Virtual Acoustic headphone uses a 1200mAh lithium polymer rechargeable battery that stays powered for up to 10 hours for Wi-Fi use and up to 5 hours while streaming with Bluetooth.

 

The magnetic charging cable design prevents your headset from flying off when it was tugged or pulled.  

 

 

 

 

The future is wireless. We spent 3 months developing the proprietary wireless protocol and another 6 months to decreasing the audio latency by 10ms, (Dolby requires the audio latency within 15ms). Virtual Acoustic is the first wireless headphone in the world with truly Dolby 5.1 channel surround sound. It brings more flexibility to immerse yourself in virtual reality world, more care to your families when you enjoy games.


Movies

Enjoy any movie with cinema-grade sound quality from the comfort of your couch, bed, or anywhere together with your families.

 

Games

Get your winning edge with detailed surround sound.

 

Music

Stream music with stereo sound and consistent reliable connection.

 

 

 

 

 

 

FoxLink(http://foxlink.com), one of component suppliers of Apple, Bests, Belkin, HTC, is going to bring our Virtual Actual headset system to life. Every Virtual Actual headset you get will meet the strict quality standards set forth by FoxLink.

 

 

 

 

Jovi.Sun - Founder, Lead Designer

Decades of proven expertise in acoustic and filming industry. Jovi has been recording engineer, R&D, senior audio technical director in listed entertainment companies, like Oasis Studio, avex Group, Golden Harvest, etc. After refused the offer of senior cinema audio technical director position from Dolby Laboratories, Jovi teamed with a group of acoustic experts with average over 15 years acoustic industry experience. This is a bunch of passionate people who want to challenge the industry with acoustic products that “combined with future entertainment”. The team spent 3 years on the Virtual Acoustic truly Dolby 5.1-channel headset system and got official licenses from Dolby Laboratories, Qualcomm, Apple MFi, Cirrus Logic and OEM from FoxLink. We’d be proud to present our truly Dolby 5.1-channel headset system to you for your immersive audio experience.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

How long does the battery last?
It takes 3 hours for a full charge and a single charge can support up to 5 hours of play. You can get battery volumn through the light indicator on the headphone. 

 

How long is the warranty?
Virtual Acoustic headset system comes with a 12 month limited warranty for Indiegogo backers. We also ensure that every unit is free from manufacturing defects and handled with the utmost care during shipment?

 

Does it work on tablets?
Yes, as long as you downloaded USB driver for your tablet or it support coaxial, optical or Bluetooth inputs.

story:
Developed from scratch looking at every use-case of demanding performing guitarists.

 

Watch Soren Andersen (Glenn Hughes, Mike Tramp, Marco Mendoza etc.) take the Noatronic Wireless Guitar System for a spin.

 

The system consists of a Controller, Transmitter, and Receiver.
It is completely optional whether you want to install and use the Controller.

  • Controller goes into the guitar along with a stereo jack socket
  • Guitar connects to Transmitter with a stereo jack cable
  • Transmitter is wirelessly connected to Receiver
  • Receiver is connected to pedals from its audio out and MIDI out

 



The RTX Sheerlink technology inside the Noatronic Wireless Guitar System is an unmatched digital wireless bridge.

 


Takes 2 AA batteries, safely stored behind a steel battery door.
2 slide switches secure the door in place and power on the system.


The Noatronic Transmitter holds a strap clip that fits any strap.
Our patent-pending design allows for a highly secure fit on most leather straps.


Assign custom MIDI messages, set cable tone filters, engage pairing, and more using the rotary switch and a high contrast OLED display of the Receiver.


 

  • Power the Receiver with a standard pedal PSU (Center negative 30 mA.)
  • 1/4 inch audio output
  • MIDI output
     

Available in standard and long version.
The standard version is for mounting through pickguards (Fender style) while the long version is for mounting through wood (Les Paul style).

The system comes with a standard length Controller - you can add extra (standard or long) Controllers at checkout.


Install it yourself or drop your guitar along with this schematic at your Local Guitar Shop. They'll do the install faster than swapping pickups.

The example above is a standard Strat configuration with the Controller on the bridge tone knob.


"My name is Michael. I'm a guitarist and electronics engineer. If you've been engaging with Noatronic before you've probably already met me - either in person or online."

"Noatronic started as a passion project, as I wanted a simpler experience when performing.
I hope you'll join me on this mission."

 

We have working betas but need support to ramp up our production.
As a thank you for supporting our campaign, we offer the product at a huge discount.

Take a look at our Production Timeline below.



A highly skilled team with industry experts, top engineering skills, and business experience, topped with a great partnership with our wireless technology provider RTX A/S.

 

The Noatronic Wireless Guitar System is the successor to our award-winning first-generation product, Onboard Expression, using the same patented Onboard Control Technology.

story:
Why CUBUND?

Because many audio systems are able to play music from USB flash drive, but cannot play music from smartphone, tablet or laptop wirelessly.

Cubund solve this problem. You won't need cables anymore.

These days all of our music files are in clouds, or on online media streaming services like Spotify, YouTube, SoundCloud, iTunes, Google Music, etc. Who wants to copy music files to flash drives day after day...

How does it work?

Cubund is easy to use. You don't have to install a specific application or program to make it work. Simply plug Cubund into the USB port then turn the Bluetooth on on your phone/tablet/laptop. Select Cubund on Bluetooth list of devices, start the music player, that's all. Next time Cubund will remember your smartphone, and automatically connects when your audio system is powered up.


Cubund makes your audio system's USB port Bluetooth compatible, establishes a high quality live music stream between your handheld devices and audio systems for example your car, or devices in your home, like your hi-fi or home theatre system. Cubund can play high quality music, due to its AAC/ Apt-x codec technology over Bluetooth A2DP profile. Thanks to integrated handsfree function you can manage incoming/outgoing calls and redirect them to your hifi system.



Features:

Cubund also improves driving safety thanks to bidirectional communication. You can change tracks and answer/reject incoming calls by using your car's radio or steering wheel buttons. Of course functions above work with your home audio system's remote also.

Finally the additional USB socket on Cubund makes it possible to charge other devices when you use it.

Cubund has input for external microphone for perfect sound quality in hands free mode.


If we'll reach $200,000, integrated micro SD card slot will be available.
Cubund and USB flash drive in one.



What We Need & What You Get

Our goal is to make a professional product with high quality materials. Since it’s an audio device the sound quality is the one of the most important things.  Thanks to 10 years of experience in development of embedded industrial / car electronic products we can do it. We’re on the finish line, that’s the reason why we can dispatch your Cubund with 2 years of warranty on January of 2015. To this we have to make deals with suppliers who are able to manufacture metal, leather, wood and plastic parts. Make PCBs and assembly the parts. We have to buy licenses which enable CD-quality audio, echo cancellation, and noise suppression in hands free mode. That’s why we need your help.

The Impact

Development, and making something useful and new is our passion. Cubund is inspired by our first successful project  ( Loudlink ) at in car entertainment (ICE) segment. Your help is very important to bring this idea to production. Solve the problem of wireless, platform independent, easy to use streaming in USB capable only cars and audio systems.

Risks & Challenges

We can not test Cubund with all hifi devices on market. But if You report any trouble with your paired device, we’ll find the solution. Thanks to firmware upgrade possibility you can simply upload the newest firmware to Cubund to keep it up to date.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you think Cubund is a great idea, You can help us by sharing our campaign regardless of if you donated us or not.

Referral Contest:

story:
Klipsch's USA Taekwondo Edition T5 II Wireless Earphones, 

Only available through IndieGoGo.

The USA Taekwondo organization has a wonderful history and outstanding legacy. 

We are partnering with Klipsch to produce for a limited time Klipsch's USA Taekwondo Edition T5 II Wireless Earphones, only available through IndieGoGo.

Wherever you are, Klipsch headphones set the soundtrack for your life with unrivaled comfort, a long-lasting battery life, noise isolation, acoustic clarity, and crisp bass. That's why USA Taekwondo is honored to associate our brand with a great organization like Klipsch's to provide a great product to those people who want to support our USA Taekwondo team and organization. 

USA Taekwondo is dedicated to preparing American athletes to win Olympic and Paralympic medals, promote the self-defense sports throughout the U.S. Your support of the USA Taekwondo Edition of the T5 II Wireless Earphones will help to continue the success and excellence of our organization and help our USA Athletes to continue to achieve the American Dream.

Product Features

Fit for any adventure, the T5 II True Wireless Sport is rugged, weather-resistant, comfortable, and comes built with a long-lasting battery.

Designed to stay in place and protect from anything life throws at them, both the earphones and case are water and dust-proof (IP67-rated) and include a unique moisture removal system to keep them dry.

story:
Do you need to experience fun every time of day? 

Music Planet is the type of Bluetooth speaker you need to hype up the fun at all the occasions where you need to blow the audience away.

Music Planet reproduces the astonishing beauty of the cosmos. With its colorful and bright planet ring, the device syncs your playlist with its lights keeping you ablaze. Designed as sophisticated and lightweight, Music Planet guarantees its users a deep bass sound and sharp treble that is just perfect for your entertainment. 

 

The splendor of the universe is breath-taking and always fascinates us. The twinkling light from the stars makes us want to have a feel of the outer world. It’s the place where human curiosity and the spirit of adventure gather.

 

Saturn is one of the most beautiful planets in our solar system, surrounded by a beautiful and bright planet ring. The exceptional ring is composed of millions of disordered suspended particles under the influence of gravity. The mystical suspension of particles on the rings and the different luminous rings makes Saturn a sight to behold. This distinctively beautiful planet is the inspiration of our beloved Music Planet.

 

Music Planet displays the beauty of Saturn by lighting up the planet’s translucent ring plate with programmed LED. With unlimited combination of colors sparkled by a fixed eight color cyclic gradient, it re-creates the multi-layered ring around Saturn.

 

 

The translucent texture structure is applied on the planet ring to perfectly depict the floating ring. With the colorful light, we can see the ring hovering over the planet’s sparkling surface.

 

 

Music Planet is your perfect music companion to create the most preferable atmosphere for you. It has two lighting modes – breath and party; designed to match your mood at different occasions and functions.

 

 

In breath mode, the lighting ring flashs slowly in a fixed color or an eight-color loop. The lighting changes perfectly match with soft music. It helps to create a romantic atmosphere for you and your lover, and to sleep easily by capturing your attention and making you at ease.

 

 

In party mode, the lighting ring flashs quickly in a fixed color or an eight-color loop. Its shinning lighting is perfect for pop, hip-hop, RnB music. It revitalizes the mood around to be ecstatic and dynamic, to offer a happy and passionate moment to you and your friends.

 

Vincent van Gogh’s “The Starry Night” is a great art work showing the changes and fluidity of the starry sky. In 2016, famous Turkey artist Garip AY reproduced this masterpiece using the “Ebru” art painting. This method made“The Starry Night” stand out distinctly.

 

EBRU, the art of "Painting on Water"

“Ebru”, aka “The Turkish art of Marbling”, is the painting art by sprinkling and brushing pigments on the oily water, and then transforming this pattern to paper. In the 14th century, Ebru art was introduced to Anatolia from Iran via the Silk Road and flourished in the Ottoman Empire.

Ebru painting is a free art creation following the natural flow of water. However, it’s actually a great challenge for a painter to control the flow of water and pigment. The result of this process is unique and it’s never possible to achieve the same design.

 

 Unique Fluid Art, Unique Planet 

 

The design of Music Planet was fueled by curiosity and imagination about the planet. From the photos taken by NASA, each of the planets has its distinct landscape, which is similar with Ebru art. 

It leds us to carry out simulations on how our device’s design could bear the uniqueness of the Ebru fluid art. As you rightly guessed, it was successful.

 

 

 

Music Planet has a Dual neodymium motor that creates symmetrical magnetic field in control of full range applications with a dedicated design. Having a tr-band equalization, it is suitable for all genres of music.

 

 A Custom-Made Interior Design

In order to minimize unwanted interference, our designers researched on creating a “nuclear reactor” interior structure. We thickened the speaker’s cover, added multiple impression to the interior wall, tune chips and circuit board. This interior design perfectly improved the experience of space and sound quality.

 

 Adjustable Speaker, Directional Sound

Most of audio speakers are placed and directed forward. However, Music Planet’s speaker is positioned downward. The design allows the speaker to be adjusted at any time in the direction of the listener. The device’s speaker can turn 360° producing sound at each turn. Consistent and uniform sound coverage .

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Cosmic Island Studio was founded by senior designer Mr. Ming Pang in 2013, aim to provide simple design to express the beauty of the universe. Mr. Pang graduated from Domus Design Academy in Milan, and has worked with Lancia, Alfa Romeo and FIAT Doblo MPV.

As cosmic-enthusiast designer, Mr. Pang consisted to work on universe-themed artwork, exploring the perceptual relationship between human beings and the universe.

story:
Meet Hai

The first high-end stereo earphones made for you － a user with hearing aids, cochlear implants, or none of them.

 

How Hai Works

As Simple as a Streamer
But Beyond a Streamer

1. Connect

Connect your Hai to any of your Bluetooth audio sources (e.g. mobile phone, Bluetooth adapter of your Switch player).

2. Turning on T-mode

Turn on the T-mode of your aids. Hai's DBC technology will clear the buzzing sound of the T-mode.

3. Enjoy and be fashionable

Hai's neckcoil sends a high-quality audio signal to your hearing aids and/or cochlear implants. All while looking good!

Switch made easy

✅ If you use a single hearing aid, attach one Hai earbud for your hearing side, and use telecoil for the side with hearing aid.

✅ If you want to use Hai without hearing aids and/or implants, just plug in two earbuds and modify the sound with our app.

 

What Makes Hai Stand Out

Made for hard-of-hearing, made by hard-of-hearing

Adapt to All Conditions

Hai is compatible with all hearing aids and cochlear implants with T-mode. It can receive audio from all Bluetooth sources and send it to your device.


Born for Flexible Use

Now you can switch between earbuds and neckcoils to match the aids and ears!
Hai beats most of the streamers by providing stereo sound to single-sided users or users of two different brands.


Create Superior Sound Quality

Most streamers don’t allow their users to enjoy stereo sound with single-sided aids or aids by different brands.

We advanced telecoil, an established and versatile technology, to provide outstanding sound quality for diverse aid usage scenarios.


Advance with Hai App

Change and save your preferred equalizer settings to move across occasions with the Hai app. Let speech stand out clearer when you make a phone call.

The app also gives guidance for changing the stereo balance of your phone to fit your hearing condition.

 

Stop The Buzz

To even further improve your listening experience, we developed the technology that pioneers cancellation of all bothering interference from nearby electrical infrastructures.

We call it DBC (Dynamic Buzz Cancellation), the key for you to enjoying the music without buzzing on a flight or near power systems.

 

Open Smooth Communication

Call your loved ones, friends, or business clients with the built-in microphone — integrated with the technology for clear voice and low latency.

 

Keep Everything Intuitive and Linked

Take it easy with the three-button operation — answering calls, changing tracks, and adjusting volume.

Hai helps you realize seamless digital life, passing what you want to your Google Assistant or Siri.

 

Show Your Style

Customize your Hai with a bunch of colored surfaces and stickers!

Unchain your creativity. Let Hai speak for your style.

 

Accompany You, Rain or Shine

Bring Hai anywhere with you, no matter raining or sunny.

With the lightweight design, all you have to do is a clip to your clothes — or simply wearing it like a necklace!

Water-resistant and neat, Hai is your best companion for exercising, working, or just relaxing with your favorite songs.

 


Comparing Hai with Others

Unique and Outstanding, Hai benefits users with what others haven’t achieved:

✅ Stereo for single-sided hearing aids

  • For the hearing side, attach one earbud to the Hai neckcoil to use. 
  • For your other side with a hearing aid or cochlear implant processor, just use the Hai neckcoil with T-mode of your aid or processor.

✅ Stereo for different aids on each side

  • Hai works even when you have one side with hearing aid and the other side with a cochlear implant.
  • Compatible with all aids and processors with T-mode (telecoil mode).

✅ Buzz cancellation for T-mode of aids

  • We developed the first technology to cancel any bothering interference from nearby electrical infrastructures for your amazing listening experience.

✅ Sound personalization

  • Change and save your preferred equalizer settings for various occasions
  • Take a rest from using your aid(s). Just plug in two earbuds and modify the equalizer to fit your audiogram with our app. 

✅ Full Bluetooth connectivity

  • Compatible with all Bluetooth audio sources so you don’t have to stick with iOS! 
  • Connect Hai to your TV, laptop, audio player, mobile phone, and other gadgets

✅ Style personalization

  • Play your style with Hai of colored surfaces and stickers!
  • More stickers are coming up with our crowdfunding launch.

 

Key Features

Universal design​

  • Modular and interchangeable coils and earbuds for hearing aids, cochlear implants, and hearing people
  • Applicable to single-sided hearing aids

Superb sound quality

  • Designed by Hi-Fi experts for maximum sound quality
  • Produce quality sound with hearing aids and/or cochlear implants with T-coil mode

Dynamic Buzz Cancellation

  • Reduce noise from electrical equipment nearby for hearing aid users with telecoil

Handy App to Adjust EQ​

  • Easily adjust your equalizer settings and save them as favorites for different listening situations with Hai app

High-quality microphone

  • Built in to accomplish crystal tone, clear voice, and low latency

Intuitive Operation

  • Change volume and tracks, answer calls, or wake up your smartphone assistant with only three buttons

Wear-N’-Go Mobility

  • Lightweight and water-resistant, no burden around your neck

6 Hours Wireless Playtime

  • Enjoy music wirelessly up to 30 hours with Hai earbuds

 

Why We Launch Hai

A Feasible Access to Music for Most People

None of the existing earbuds or earphones works with hearing aids. Since hearing aids already sit within ears, fitting another device into the ears isn't possible.

Our modular earphone is the solution.

Hai makes it possible for everyone to freely enjoy excellent sound quality and boldly show their personal styles.

Beyond any other audio device, Hai is completely universal and accessible in usability but outstanding and flexible in style.

Most of all, it frees streamers from medicalized images. 

 

About Us

We’re a cross-disciplinary team with diverse backgrounds in design, engineering, marketing, and social sciences. Our members are from Taiwan, Finland, and Ireland. Two of us are hearing aids and cochlear implant users, who are also using Hai.

Both of us, Ansin and Kevin, were the first two founders of the team. We share a deep love for music and tech, and the passion brought us together in 2017, when we finally decided to pursue our dream.

Now we've been working on this project for three years and have come a long way. Finally, our product is ready. We call it Hai, a universal earphone with everything we dreamed of from the beginning, and we’re so happy/ready to share it with you!

 

Rewards

We offer two types of rewards: Hai and Hai complete kit.

Check out the perks for more info!

Hai

Hai Complete kit

 

Timeline

 

Shipping Policy

 

We are able to ship to United States, Canada, UK, EU, Australia, New Zealand, Japan, Singapore, Korea, and Taiwan. You can check the shipping rate to your country in the checkout process when entering your shipping information.

Please note that every backer is responsible for clearing or paying any VAT (Value Added Tax) , GST (Goods and Service    s Tax), import taxes, customs duties and any other fees or taxes levied by their delivery destination countries depending on the country's policy when shipping. 

 

Risks and Challenge

 

It has been a long journey for us to overcome obstacles and develop Hai. No project is without risks and challenges, but we promise to mitigate them with our best efforts. On this page, what you see in the pictures and videos are working prototypes. We’ve successfully completed all the necessary preliminary work, but we still have plenty of work to do as we proceed to the pilot and mass production phases. Thanks to your contribution and support, we’re able to keep our production cost affordable and bring Hai to users sooner.

By March 2021, we should be giving out rewards as the progress goes as planned. There might be chances of delay due to force majeure events － typhoons, or cargoes stuck in customs, etc. We’ve put potential risks into consideration and have had backup plans to accommodate possible shifts. If there’s any expected change to the delivery progress, we’ll immediately update our backers on the latest information.

We also want to acknowledge the severity of the COVID-19 pandemic that alarms all in the world, including us. To launch Hai to let more conversations happen and consolation be found in music amid the pandemic is important, but most of all, health and safety of people involved in the production are what we prioritize. Plans might be subject to change if the situation becomes severer. We’ll keep you posted on the progress along the way.

Refund Policy

You can always request a refund before the campaign ends. For more information, please check the guide from Indiegogo. Once our campaign has ended, we will move on to the next production stage. The request for a refund is not available after we start shipping. If you have further question, please contact service@rearia.io.

 

Looking for more information? Check the FAQ ?

story:
Nature Meets Audiophile Sound Quality with Rockit Logs

 

**All prices in USD**

Reclaimed, Reused & Repurposed in British Columbia by Jay DeMerit.

Rockit Logs are created from acoustic quality wood once abandoned by logging operations, then re-purposed into handcrafted works of visual and audio art by Jay DeMerit.

 

 

A funky shape, knot, pattern or crooked grain means no two are alike.

$199 House Designed Rockit Log in Clear or Dark Stain

Choose between Clear Stain or Dark Stain with silver accents via a backer survey at the end of the campaign.

 

Each Rockit Log has a story to tell: reclaimed from a neglected forest off-cut, left to rot in a pole yard, or part of a fallen tree in an old logging block.

 

 

These Western Cedar, Fir and Hemlock trees are recovered in a beautiful valley along British Columbia's Sea to Sky Corridor where logging is prevalent and much waste exists.

 

Dream Pursuer Turned Professional Athlete.

Jay's incredible journey is outlined above in the documentary film, 'Rise & Shine: The Jay DeMerit Story.' To help catapult his philanthropist efforts, Jay is bringing it back to where it all started: his training in industrial product design.

 

Audiophile Quality, Soft Tone Acoustic Wood, Portable, Customizable. 

With high end Bluetooth audio, a powerful amplifier, and a long battery life, Rockit Logs were designed with powerful sound in mind.

 

Powerful High Quality Audio

 

Each log is custom tuned to deliver both timeless style and premium sound quality. While most Bluetooth speakers have a power output of between 1 and 5 watts, Rockit Logs boom at 60 watts of pure audio power.

 

Soft Tone Wood Acoustic Profile

Western Cedar, Fir and Hemlock soft tone woods are used to create a sound profile unlike anything you've heard before. These same woods are used in guitars and violins to deliver full acoustic profiles that provide warmth and amplify quieter tones.

 

Long Lasting Battery Power

With advanced lithium battery technology, Rockit Logs boast over 10 hours of battery life at full volume! An accompanying USB port lets you charge your devices so you'll never go quiet.

 

Designed to be Portable

 

At around 12 inches in diameter, Rockit Logs are made to be easily portable with grab and go handle.

 

Customize Your Own Design

 

Choose from one of our staple designs, celebrity showcases, or completely design your own!

 

Bluetooth or Aux Connection

 

 

Rockit Logs don't require any setup and can be paired with any Bluetooth compatible device or connected through an AUX cord for home audio systems.

 

 

Jay DeMerit's Celebrity Partnerships with Rockit Log Speakers

Limited Edition Rockit Logs - These partners have specially designed their own Rockit Log to reflect their style and personality. These special designs are only available for the crowdfunding campaign.

 

Check out below for images and descriptions of the Rockit Log rewards:

 

Rise and Shine by Jay DeMerit 

Get an exclusive Rockit Log Speaker designed by Pro Soccer Player Jay DeMerit for $299! 

Jay DeMerit has one of the most unique success stories the sport of soccer has ever seen; a story that was crowdfunded into a documentary film called "Rise and Shine: The Jay DeMerit Story" back in 2011. 

An MLS reject that backpacked to Europe and climbed the English soccer pyramid from the 12th tier to become the captain of Watford FC in the English Premier League, he also represented the US Mens National Team, playing every minute of his team's games throughout the World Cup of 2010 in South Africa. 

He finished his career in 2014, after captaining the Vancouver Whitecaps in their first four seasons in MLS. Then he started his own stereo company and now looks to finish the Rise & Shine Foundation.

THE DESIGN: The burn of the grain represents the phoenix rising from the flames, as Jay had to do through many challenges and adversities he has faced to make it in his 10 year professional career. The black on black cone and speaker adds a sleekness to the design and the gold screws represent the diamonds in the rough that Jay is now trying to find and polish at his Rise & Shine youth mentorship/camp-out soccer camps that he has started for teenagers in the mountains of Pemberton, BC.

PROCEEDS: After Indiegogo, proceeds from every "Rise and Shine" log will be donated to the Rise and Shine Foundation, helping people to Dream Big and find their passions through unique experiences and mentorship.

 

The Snow Queen by Ashleigh McIvor

Get an exclusive Rockit Log Speaker designed by Gold Medalist Skier Ashleigh McIvor for $299! 

Ashleigh McIvor DeMerit is one of Canada’s golden girls. Born and raised in the ski town of Whistler, BC. she grew up chasing her friends over cliffs and through gullies. She thrived on pushing the limits, which helped her become the 1st ever Olympic Gold Medalist in the sport of Ski Cross at her home games in Vancouver 2010.

THE DESIGN: The whitewash of the wood is sign of the snow that has brought her so much success on skis. The gold back cone, the front screws, and speaker mark the color of the medal around her neck, as she stood on the top of the Olympic podium in front of her friends and family, hearing the national anthem of her proud country.

PROCEEDS: After Indiegogo, proceeds from every sale of "The Snow Queen" will be donated to the Rise and Shine Foundation, helping people to Dream BIG and find their passions through unique experiences and mentorship.

 

The Keeper by Tim Howard

Get an exclusive Rockit Log Speaker designed by Pro Soccer Keeper Tim Howard for $299!

Tim Howard is one of the most decorated and fierce characters to ever grace a soccer goal. Once voted the Premier League’s Best Keeper for Manchester United, he found his true home wearing the blue of Everton FC in the English Premier League. 

He has also represented the US Mens' National Team over 110 times and in 3 World Cups. He is now leading the Colorado Rapids of the MLS. Tim see’s the power in detail, a fashionable thinker that expresses a lot of his passions through the art on his body.

THE DESIGN: The grey wash is a reflection of the rocky mountains of his new home in Denver, CO. The black speaker and cone adds subtlety and style, two things he always tries to live his life with. The blue screws represent the stripes of the American flag, a country he has always been so proud to represent, and also in honor of Everton FC, the club that was the staple point for his undeniable legacy in the sport.

PROCEEDS: After Indiegogo, proceeds from "The Keeper" logs will be donated to America Scores Denver. Providing its innovative soccer, poetry and service learning programming to nearly 320 DPS students in ten west Denver elementary schools.

 

The MVP by Steve Nash

Get an exclusive Rockit Log Speaker designed by Pro Basketball Steve Nash for $299! 

Steve Nash is a true basketball hero. Proud Canadian and 2 time NBA MVP. Not only does he have an affinity for behind the back passes, he also likes natural wood products reclaimed from the back yards he grew up in, in beautiful British Columbia.

THE DESIGN:  The clear stain shows the grain of the reclaimed British Columbia wood. The black on black speaker & back cone speak to the silkiness that he graced the hard court with. Each screw color represents a team he represented during his illustrious 19 year career. Canada. Lakers. Suns. Mavericks. All teams that helped create a legacy that will forever remain in the lore of basketball greats.

PROCEEDS: After Indiegogo, proceeds from every sale of "The MVP" will be donated to the Steve Nash Foundation, assisting underserved children in their health, personal development, education & enjoyment of life.

 

Boston Strong by Eliza Dushku

Get an exclusive Rockit Log Speaker designed by Actress Eliza Dushku for $299! 

At the heart of Watertown, MA, you’ll find an actress with a true sense of community. She back flipped in Bring it On, killed vampires on Buffy, and also starred in many other hit series such as Tru Calling and Dollhouse. Eliza appreciates hand made goods and lives life against the grain, while always representing her craft.

THE DESIGN: The clear stain shows the true nature of the wood. The lips icon that is burned into the wood along with the red screws is the way that she usually signs off to her fans around the world, showing her appreciation and love. The black cone represents the sultry characters she has rocked the screen with, and the gold screws are a sign of her character. Strong, hard working, and as good as gold.

PROCEEDS: After Indiegogo, proceeds from every sale of "Boston Strong" will be donated the Camp Hale Girls Program, creating a stronger sense of community through youth development in Boston’s historic South End.

 

Don't Fake the Funk by The Funk Hunters

Get an exclusive Rockit Log Speaker designed by Music Duo The Funk Hunters for $299!

Based in Vancouver BC, Nick Middleton and Duncan Smith elevate their signature bass heavy sound with their own stunning custom-curated visuals and animated stage presence. Spend an evening with this charismatic duo, and you'll see that their lifestyle is as relaxed as the west coast, but their sound is global and booming.

THE DESIGN:  The black wash is a reflection of the night, and of the bat mobile, which helps save the souls of the cities, much like the music coming out of the speakers when these guys hit the decks on a nightly basis. Orange is the color of funk, bringing brightness and some extra flavor to the dance floor. FUNK isn’t just part of their name, it’s a part of their lifestyle, so this log has it burned right into the face, so you always know what to bring when you press PLAY.

PROCEEDS: After Indiegogo, proceeds from "Don't Fake the Funk" will be donated to the Music Heals Charitable Foundation, supporting a wide range of music therapy services to communities in BC and across Canada.

 

 

Cream of the Crop by Sean Pettit

Get an exclusive Rockit Log Speaker designed by Pro Skier Sean Pettit for $299!

Sean Pettit is only 24 years old, but since Red Bull signed him as their youngest ever athlete at 13, he is already a legend in his sport. A big mountain skier that has won countless competitions over an incredible career so far, Sean has an affinity for going big and beyond. 

He has been featured in many of the top ski films and has taken home silverware at the prestigious Powder Awards for "Best Male Performance" twice, as well as "Best Natural Air", and "Best Man Made Air". 

THE DESIGN: The dark brown stain matched with the cream mixes a classic style with a modern sound. The gold screws and bullet add flair and prestige, both qualities that Sean tries to bring to the mountain everyday.

PROCEEDS: After Indiegogo, proceeds will go to the McMorris Foundation, creating a more affordable, accessible, and inclusive sport culture in Canada.

 

El Heffe by Jeff McConnell

Get an exclusive Rockit Log Speaker designed by Portmanteau Stereo cofounder Jeff McConnell for $299! 

Portmanteau Stereo Co.'s co-founder and resident party professional Jeff "El Heffe" McConnell brings you a design with Karats in mind. He'll beat you in a scooter race, out pace you on the dance floor, and make you laugh until you cry, the "El Heffe" design will confirm your party "Boss" status.

THE DESIGN: This log represents the staple point colors of Portmanteau Stereo Co., black & gold. The black wash of the wood is mixed with a 18k gold plated speaker grill, for the extra protection that the party boss needs, but with the prestige only a boss should have. The metal handle accents are also plated in gold, making sure this party log is ready for the best of times.

PROCEEDS: After Indiegogo, proceeds will go to his charity.

 

The Stork by Eddie Lack

Get an exclusive Rockit Log Speaker designed by Pro Hockey Goaltender Eddie Lack for $299! 

Eddie Lack is from Sweden. The Swedish are known for being innovative, smart, and creating sustainable design-combining form + function better than most. His love of music stems from the many nights he has been on the decks as DJ Lacklustre. 

He laughs at that nickname as the only night he got booed off stage was the night that Chuck Norris cried. And we all know that never happened.

EDDGIF

THE DESIGN: His real nickname is "The Stork", so the whitewash of the log represents the feathers of the birdman. The red back cone brings the storm as he currently graces the net of the Carolina Hurricanes in the NHL. Eddie started his career in Vancouver, so the blue screws represent his love for the Canucks fans and the city that he still holds close to his heart. Finally the gold of the bullet speaker represents his home country of Sweden, a country full of hockey greats he hopes to one day become.

PROCEEDS: After Indiegogo, proceeds from every sale of "The Stork" will be donated to Canuck Place Children’s Hospice, aiding in the care of sick children across British Columbia.

 

 Pemby Fest by Pemberton Music Festival

Mountain air & the best musical acts on the planet come together once a year in the valley of Pemberton. BC for the Pemberton Music Festival.

Pearl Jam, Snoop Dogg, and Kendrick Lamar are just a few that have stood on the main stage in awe of the beautiful country views that Pemberton Music Festival has to offer. We want to you to experience one of the best and brightest music festivals around with an exclusive opportunity to take in the festival as a VIP. 

 

$199 - House Designed Rockit Log - Clear or Dark Stain

Choose between Clear Stain or Dark Stain with silver accents via a backer survey at the end of the campaign.

 

$249 - Customize Your Own Rockit Log

Choose the color of your back cone, screws, and the bullet in the center of the speaker to make a Rockit Log totally your own.

[GIF]

 

$499 - Suitcase Stereo by Portmanteau Stereo Co. + Custom Rockit Log  

The first product of Portmanteau Stereo Co. was the retrofitted vintage suitcase stereos. We built our reputation for quality through delivering vintage suitcase stereos to customers around the world.

To maintain portability, we've upgraded our battery to a high quality Lithium pack that delivers 10+ hours of constant playback at high volume. Plus, we've reduced the weight by half, making it easier than ever to tote with you. Recharge time has been cut down to under 2 hours so you can keep rocking all weekend long. The latest Bluetooth module uses AptX technology to deliver crystal clear sound at ranges up to 15m. Our new 2 x 100 watt amps deliver the power and sound quality you expect from Portmanteau.  

Get your Suitcase Stereo with your new Rockit Log. Backers will be able to choose their color and style of suitcase. Please reach out with additional questions.

 

$1,999 Coffee Table by Portmanteau Stereo Co. + Custom Rockit Log

Not only does the Bluetooth Coffee Table Stereo look amazing, but it packs some serious sound- enough to rock your entire room!

Each table was designed from the ground up, with elegant style and superior sound. The central base of the table is specifically crafted to produce deep bass response with a powerful 10" subwoofer. Flanking the subwoofer are four full range stereo speakers chosen to deliver clear full range sound at all volume levels. The amp delivers 160W to the subwoofer and 80W to each of the stereo channels. 

The brand new Bluetooth module enables connectivity with smartphones and computers at ranges beyond 15 meters with crystal clear sound for anything from Jazz to Electronic Dance music. 

 Get your Coffee Table with your new Rockit Log. Backers will be able to choose their stain and accent color of coffee table. Please reach out with additional questions.

 

$1,750 - Beer Pong Table by Portmanteau Stereo Co. + Custom Rockit Log

We can't think of a better pairing for your tailgate party, bar, man cave, or games room than this one-of-a-kind Beer Pong Table Stereo!

 

Complete with inlayed holes for your cups, a plexi-glass roof & inlayed moat for your friends that spill, and 350W of pure music power to make sure your beer pong games are always ROCKIN! The system comes complete with four 6" full range speakers boasting 60W of power each, customizable w accent colors of your choice. 

Comes standard with 4.1 Bluetooth connectivity and a 100W subwoofer for that extra bass kick, so no matter where you put it, you'll have yourselves a party! One side comes complete with a CNC'd Portmanteau Stereo Co. logo, but the other side is free for a logo of your own! 

Whether its a company logo, fraternity or sorority, your favorite sports team, or just your name, we can personalize it just for you. Shipping will be to Canada and US only; prices to be announced.

 

The Technology Behind Rockit Logs

With the funds raised from this campaign, we will be updating Rockit Logs with even more features, including USB charging, batter indicator lights, built in volume control, and aux plug.

  • 12 hr + Lithium Ion Rechargeable Battery  

  • 6" Full Range Speaker  

  • Stands Approximately 12" Tall  

  • Weighs Approximately 12 lbs  

  • Power Amplifiers: 60W Class D  

  • High Performance Bluetooth Audio (V4.0+, NFC)  

  • Long Battery Life: 10+ hours on a single charge  

  • Battery Gauge

  • USB port for charging  

  • 3.5mm Aux in

 

Proceeds from this campaign will be used to fund the initial hardware investment needed to mass produce the audio technology behind Rockit Logs.

Upon fulfillment to our backers, going forward, Rockit Logs will donate profits to the Rise & Shine Foundation which was founded during the first crowdfunding campaign that brought the documentary film to life at the request of fans everywhere.

 

Rise & Shine Foundation Mission Statement: 

To empower young athletes by helping them identify their strengths and providing them with the tools they'll need to Rise & Shine through whatever their passions may be.

Inspired by the award winning documentary film 'Rise & Shine: The Jay DeMerit Story,' the Rise & Shine Foundation will promote the key messages of the film such as hard work, perseverance, self-belief, and a DREAM BIG mentality.

Funds managed by the Rise & Shine Foundation will eliminate financial and logistical roadblocks faced by many and enable the Rise & Shine Retreat to open its doors to more participants, inviting them to join in on the wide variety of skill-building activities in addition to sports camps, in an all-encompassing mountain retreat.

The 3 Goals of the Rise & Shine Foundation

Goal 1: Facilitate Rising & Shining: Every kid should have dreams and aspirations, whether they are sport-focused or related to their passion for arts, music, or food! As former professional athletes, Rise & Shine Retreat founders Ashleigh and Jay DeMerit recognize the valuable life lessons and sense of empowerment that can come from sports and recreation. Most importantly, the contribution these activities make to overall emotional, mental, and physical health allows participants to be productive, happy members of society.  

Goal 2: Be Inclusive: We want to make sure that every kid has the opportunity to take part in our program, so we have created the Rise & Shine Foundation -- our charitable element to enable those who would not have access to the funds required to join in, with the help of our favorite supporters and various fundraising initiatives.

Goal 3: Get the Community Involved: Part of the Rise & Shine project is focused on creating a strong sense of community. Jay grew up in the tight knit community of Green Bay, WI and Ashleigh was raised on the spirited family values within the ski town, Whistler, BC.   It is important to them to help enrich their communities, and the two of them look forward to doing that in Pemberton for the entire surrounding area. Whether it is using the food from the farms produced next door, running free clinics in sport for the local kids, or promoting local businesses, community is key.
story_txt:
Nature Meets Audiophile Sound Quality with Rockit Logs **All prices in USD**Reclaimed, Reused & Repurposed in British Columbia by Jay DeMerit.Rockit Logs are created from acoustic quality wood once abandoned by logging operations, then re-purposed into handcrafted works of visual and audio art by Jay DeMerit.  A funky shape, knot, pattern or crooked grain means no two are alike.$199 House Designed Rockit Log in Clear or Dark StainChoose between Clear Stain or Dark Stain with silver accents via a backer survey at the end of the campaign. Each Rockit Log has a story to tell: reclaimed from a neglected forest off-cut, left to rot in a pole yard, or part of a fallen tree in an old logging block.  These Western Cedar, Fir and Hemlock trees are recovered in a beautiful valley along British Columbia's Sea to Sky Corridor where logging is prevalent and much waste exists. Dream Pursuer Turned Professional Athlete.Jay's incredible journey is outlined above in the documentary film, 'Rise & Shine: The Jay DeMerit Story.' To help catapult his philanthropist efforts, Jay is bringing it back to where it all started: his training in industrial product design. Audiophile Quality, Soft Tone Acoustic Wood, Portable, Customizable. With high end Bluetooth audio, a powerful amplifier, and a long battery life, Rockit Logs were designed with powerful sound in mind. Powerful High Quality Audio Each log is custom tuned to deliver both timeless style and premium sound quality. While most Bluetooth speakers have a power output of between 1 and 5 watts, Rockit Logs boom at 60 watts of pure audio power. Soft Tone Wood Acoustic ProfileWestern Cedar, Fir and Hemlock soft tone woods are used to create a sound profile unlike anything you've heard before. These same woods are used in guitars and violins to deliver full acoustic profiles that provide warmth and amplify quieter tones. Long Lasting Battery PowerWith advanced lithium battery technology, Rockit Logs boast over 10 hours of battery life at full volume! An accompanying USB port lets you charge your devices so you'll never go quiet. Designed to be Portable At around 12 inches in diameter, Rockit Logs are made to be easily portable with grab and go handle. Customize Your Own Design Choose from one of our staple designs, celebrity showcases, or completely design your own! Bluetooth or Aux Connection  Rockit Logs don't require any setup and can be paired with any Bluetooth compatible device or connected through an AUX cord for home audio systems.  Jay DeMerit's Celebrity Partnerships with Rockit Log SpeakersLimited Edition Rockit Logs - These partners have specially designed their own Rockit Log to reflect their style and personality. These special designs are only available for the crowdfunding campaign. Check out below for images and descriptions of the Rockit Log rewards: Rise and Shine by Jay DeMerit Get an exclusive Rockit Log Speaker designed by Pro Soccer Player Jay DeMerit for $299! Jay DeMerit has one of the most unique success stories the sport of soccer has ever seen; a story that was crowdfunded into a documentary film called "Rise and Shine: The Jay DeMerit Story" back in 2011. An MLS reject that backpacked to Europe and climbed the English soccer pyramid from the 12th tier to become the captain of Watford FC in the English Premier League, he also represented the US Mens National Team, playing every minute of his team's games throughout the World Cup of 2010 in South Africa. He finished his career in 2014, after captaining the Vancouver Whitecaps in their first four seasons in MLS. Then he started his own stereo company and now looks to finish the Rise & Shine Foundation.THE DESIGN: The burn of the grain represents the phoenix rising from the flames, as Jay had to do through many challenges and adversities he has faced to make it in his 10 year professional career. The black on black cone and speaker adds a sleekness to the design and the gold screws represent the diamonds in the rough that Jay is now trying to find and polish at his Rise & Shine youth mentorship/camp-out soccer camps that he has started for teenagers in the mountains of Pemberton, BC.PROCEEDS: After Indiegogo, proceeds from every "Rise and Shine" log will be donated to the Rise and Shine Foundation, helping people to Dream Big and find their passions through unique experiences and mentorship. The Snow Queen by Ashleigh McIvorGet an exclusive Rockit Log Speaker designed by Gold Medalist Skier Ashleigh McIvor for $299! Ashleigh McIvor DeMerit is one of Canada’s golden girls. Born and raised in the ski town of Whistler, BC. she grew up chasing her friends over cliffs and through gullies. She thrived on pushing the limits, which helped her become the 1st ever Olympic Gold Medalist in the sport of Ski Cross at her home games in Vancouver 2010.THE DESIGN: The whitewash of the wood is sign of the snow that has brought her so much success on skis. The gold back cone, the front screws, and speaker mark the color of the medal around her neck, as she stood on the top of the Olympic podium in front of her friends and family, hearing the national anthem of her proud country.PROCEEDS: After Indiegogo, proceeds from every sale of "The Snow Queen" will be donated to the Rise and Shine Foundation, helping people to Dream BIG and find their passions through unique experiences and mentorship. The Keeper by Tim HowardGet an exclusive Rockit Log Speaker designed by Pro Soccer Keeper Tim Howard for $299!Tim Howard is one of the most decorated and fierce characters to ever grace a soccer goal. Once voted the Premier League’s Best Keeper for Manchester United, he found his true home wearing the blue of Everton FC in the English Premier League. He has also represented the US Mens' National Team over 110 times and in 3 World Cups. He is now leading the Colorado Rapids of the MLS. Tim see’s the power in detail, a fashionable thinker that expresses a lot of his passions through the art on his body.THE DESIGN: The grey wash is a reflection of the rocky mountains of his new home in Denver, CO. The black speaker and cone adds subtlety and style, two things he always tries to live his life with. The blue screws represent the stripes of the American flag, a country he has always been so proud to represent, and also in honor of Everton FC, the club that was the staple point for his undeniable legacy in the sport.PROCEEDS: After Indiegogo, proceeds from "The Keeper" logs will be donated to America Scores Denver. Providing its innovative soccer, poetry and service learning programming to nearly 320 DPS students in ten west Denver elementary schools. The MVP by Steve NashGet an exclusive Rockit Log Speaker designed by Pro Basketball Steve Nash for $299! Steve Nash is a true basketball hero. Proud Canadian and 2 time NBA MVP. Not only does he have an affinity for behind the back passes, he also likes natural wood products reclaimed from the back yards he grew up in, in beautiful British Columbia.THE DESIGN:  The clear stain shows the grain of the reclaimed British Columbia wood. The black on black speaker & back cone speak to the silkiness that he graced the hard court with. Each screw color represents a team he represented during his illustrious 19 year career. Canada. Lakers. Suns. Mavericks. All teams that helped create a legacy that will forever remain in the lore of basketball greats.PROCEEDS: After Indiegogo, proceeds from every sale of "The MVP" will be donated to the Steve Nash Foundation, assisting underserved children in their health, personal development, education & enjoyment of life. Boston Strong by Eliza DushkuGet an exclusive Rockit Log Speaker designed by Actress Eliza Dushku for $299! At the heart of Watertown, MA, you’ll find an actress with a true sense of community. She back flipped in Bring it On, killed vampires on Buffy, and also starred in many other hit series such as Tru Calling and Dollhouse. Eliza appreciates hand made goods and lives life against the grain, while always representing her craft.THE DESIGN: The clear stain shows the true nature of the wood. The lips icon that is burned into the wood along with the red screws is the way that she usually signs off to her fans around the world, showing her appreciation and love. The black cone represents the sultry characters she has rocked the screen with, and the gold screws are a sign of her character. Strong, hard working, and as good as gold.PROCEEDS: After Indiegogo, proceeds from every sale of "Boston Strong" will be donated the Camp Hale Girls Program, creating a stronger sense of community through youth development in Boston’s historic South End. Don't Fake the Funk by The Funk HuntersGet an exclusive Rockit Log Speaker designed by Music Duo The Funk Hunters for $299!Based in Vancouver BC, Nick Middleton and Duncan Smith elevate their signature bass heavy sound with their own stunning custom-curated visuals and animated stage presence. Spend an evening with this charismatic duo, and you'll see that their lifestyle is as relaxed as the west coast, but their sound is global and booming.THE DESIGN:  The black wash is a reflection of the night, and of the bat mobile, which helps save the souls of the cities, much like the music coming out of the speakers when these guys hit the decks on a nightly basis. Orange is the color of funk, bringing brightness and some extra flavor to the dance floor. FUNK isn’t just part of their name, it’s a part of their lifestyle, so this log has it burned right into the face, so you always know what to bring when you press PLAY.PROCEEDS: After Indiegogo, proceeds from "Don't Fake the Funk" will be donated to the Music Heals Charitable Foundation, supporting a wide range of music therapy services to communities in BC and across Canada.  Cream of the Crop by Sean PettitGet an exclusive Rockit Log Speaker designed by Pro Skier Sean Pettit for $299!Sean Pettit is only 24 years old, but since Red Bull signed him as their youngest ever athlete at 13, he is already a legend in his sport. A big mountain skier that has won countless competitions over an incredible career so far, Sean has an affinity for going big and beyond. He has been featured in many of the top ski films and has taken home silverware at the prestigious Powder Awards for "Best Male Performance" twice, as well as "Best Natural Air", and "Best Man Made Air". THE DESIGN: The dark brown stain matched with the cream mixes a classic style with a modern sound. The gold screws and bullet add flair and prestige, both qualities that Sean tries to bring to the mountain everyday.PROCEEDS: After Indiegogo, proceeds will go to the McMorris Foundation, creating a more affordable, accessible, and inclusive sport culture in Canada. El Heffe by Jeff McConnellGet an exclusive Rockit Log Speaker designed by Portmanteau Stereo cofounder Jeff McConnell for $299! Portmanteau Stereo Co.'s co-founder and resident party professional Jeff "El Heffe" McConnell brings you a design with Karats in mind. He'll beat you in a scooter race, out pace you on the dance floor, and make you laugh until you cry, the "El Heffe" design will confirm your party "Boss" status.THE DESIGN: This log represents the staple point colors of Portmanteau Stereo Co., black & gold. The black wash of the wood is mixed with a 18k gold plated speaker grill, for the extra protection that the party boss needs, but with the prestige only a boss should have. The metal handle accents are also plated in gold, making sure this party log is ready for the best of times.PROCEEDS: After Indiegogo, proceeds will go to his charity. The Stork by Eddie LackGet an exclusive Rockit Log Speaker designed by Pro Hockey Goaltender Eddie Lack for $299! Eddie Lack is from Sweden. The Swedish are known for being innovative, smart, and creating sustainable design-combining form + function better than most. His love of music stems from the many nights he has been on the decks as DJ Lacklustre. He laughs at that nickname as the only night he got booed off stage was the night that Chuck Norris cried. And we all know that never happened.EDDGIFTHE DESIGN: His real nickname is "The Stork", so the whitewash of the log represents the feathers of the birdman. The red back cone brings the storm as he currently graces the net of the Carolina Hurricanes in the NHL. Eddie started his career in Vancouver, so the blue screws represent his love for the Canucks fans and the city that he still holds close to his heart. Finally the gold of the bullet speaker represents his home country of Sweden, a country full of hockey greats he hopes to one day become.PROCEEDS: After Indiegogo, proceeds from every sale of "The Stork" will be donated to Canuck Place Children’s Hospice, aiding in the care of sick children across British Columbia.  Pemby Fest by Pemberton Music FestivalMountain air & the best musical acts on the planet come together once a year in the valley of Pemberton. BC for the Pemberton Music Festival.Pearl Jam, Snoop Dogg, and Kendrick Lamar are just a few that have stood on the main stage in awe of the beautiful country views that Pemberton Music Festival has to offer. We want to you to experience one of the best and brightest music festivals around with an exclusive opportunity to take in the festival as a VIP.  $199 - House Designed Rockit Log - Clear or Dark StainChoose between Clear Stain or Dark Stain with silver accents via a backer survey at the end of the campaign. $249 - Customize Your Own Rockit LogChoose the color of your back cone, screws, and the bullet in the center of the speaker to make a Rockit Log totally your own.[GIF] $499 - Suitcase Stereo by Portmanteau Stereo Co. + Custom Rockit Log  The first product of Portmanteau Stereo Co. was the retrofitted vintage suitcase stereos. We built our reputation for quality through delivering vintage suitcase stereos to customers around the world.To maintain portability, we've upgraded our battery to a high quality Lithium pack that delivers 10+ hours of constant playback at high volume. Plus, we've reduced the weight by half, making it easier than ever to tote with you. Recharge time has been cut down to under 2 hours so you can keep rocking all weekend long. The latest Bluetooth module uses AptX technology to deliver crystal clear sound at ranges up to 15m. Our new 2 x 100 watt amps deliver the power and sound quality you expect from Portmanteau.  Get your Suitcase Stereo with your new Rockit Log. Backers will be able to choose their color and style of suitcase. Please reach out with additional questions. $1,999 Coffee Table by Portmanteau Stereo Co. + Custom Rockit LogNot only does the Bluetooth Coffee Table Stereo look amazing, but it packs some serious sound- enough to rock your entire room!Each table was designed from the ground up, with elegant style and superior sound. The central base of the table is specifically crafted to produce deep bass response with a powerful 10" subwoofer. Flanking the subwoofer are four full range stereo speakers chosen to deliver clear full range sound at all volume levels. The amp delivers 160W to the subwoofer and 80W to each of the stereo channels. The brand new Bluetooth module enables connectivity with smartphones and computers at ranges beyond 15 meters with crystal clear sound for anything from Jazz to Electronic Dance music.  Get your Coffee Table with your new Rockit Log. Backers will be able to choose their stain and accent color of coffee table. Please reach out with additional questions. $1,750 - Beer Pong Table by Portmanteau Stereo Co. + Custom Rockit LogWe can't think of a better pairing for your tailgate party, bar, man cave, or games room than this one-of-a-kind Beer Pong Table Stereo! Complete with inlayed holes for your cups, a plexi-glass roof & inlayed moat for your friends that spill, and 350W of pure music power to make sure your beer pong games are always ROCKIN! The system comes complete with four 6" full range speakers boasting 60W of power each, customizable w accent colors of your choice. Comes standard with 4.1 Bluetooth connectivity and a 100W subwoofer for that extra bass kick, so no matter where you put it, you'll have yourselves a party! One side comes complete with a CNC'd Portmanteau Stereo Co. logo, but the other side is free for a logo of your own! Whether its a company logo, fraternity or sorority, your favorite sports team, or just your name, we can personalize it just for you. Shipping will be to Canada and US only; prices to be announced. The Technology Behind Rockit LogsWith the funds raised from this campaign, we will be updating Rockit Logs with even more features, including USB charging, batter indicator lights, built in volume control, and aux plug.
