story:
The Partnership Begins

Valencia fans worldwide can look forward to an amazing way to enjoy their audio very soon.

Spanish League giant Valencia CF has teamed up with Creative to create the Sound BlasterX H5 Valencia CF Edition Entertainment Headset. The premium special edition headset exclusively customized for Valencia CF fans will proudly feature the Valencia Crest laser-etched on its earcups.

The headset is based on Creative’s high-performance Sound BlasterX pro-gaming series and comes with a professionally tuned audio signature for music, movies and games, as well as a software suite for different gaming audio profiles. 



A unique customized profile only available for this headset, specially tuned for EA SPORTS™ FIFA 16 to capture a football stadium’s soundscape, allows users to feel as if they were seated at an actual Valencia match in a football stadium.



Why Indiegogo?

We are delighted to be able to offer Valencia CF and its fans our audio expertise and technologies in this crowdfunding project. This Indiegogo project also represents a unique opportunity for fans to actually drive this product to realization. In many ways it’s a project for the fans by the fans.

Now with the Sound BlasterX H5 Valencia CF Edition, fans can have the chance to wear their club’s crest proudly everywhere they go while enjoying their music, movies, and games.

And because this project is on Indiegogo, fans can expect to enjoy really attractive savings. This also allows Valencia CF and Creative to reach out to fans worldwide, giving them to a chance to get their hands on the headset before it hits the stores.

We're delighted to  be awarded in the following Spanish media: El Chapuzas Informatico and Hardzone. 

Here's what they have to say about us: 

Hardzone: "Creative did it again. The Sound BlasterX H5 is one of the best headsets we have tested in our lab because it's comfortable with great sound quality." 

Awards: Platinum Award for Best Performance and Best Design 

El Chapuzas Informatico: "It offers high quality sound and its design is really good. We can't ask for more." 


 Sound BlasterX H5 Valencia CF Edition



Be a Part of the Heritage

Show your loyalty to Valencia CF! Wear the Valencia Crest as a badge of honor. Proudly laser-etched on the sides of the Sound BlasterX H5 Valencia CF Edition, the raw metallic finishing of Valencia CF logo. Be a part of the heritage with Sound BlasterX H5 Valencia CF Edition. 



Enhance your hearing with BlasterX Acoustic Engine Lite Software

The Sound BlasterX H5 Valencia CF Edition comes with the BlasterX Acoustic Engine software for Windows. It features a unique customized profile only available for this headset that is specially tuned for FIFA 16 that captures the soccer stadium’s soundscape profile. The special "Stadium" audio profile allow players to feel as if they were seated at an actual Valencia match at a soccer stadium when playing FIFA 16.

The Acoustic Engine software comes with four other pre-set profiles allowing gamers to customize their audio profile to the game genres that they are playing. For instance, ‘First-Person Shooter’ increases spatial reality and perception with virtual surround, ‘Action & Adventure’ enhances realism for a cinematic experience, ‘Real Time Strategy’ boosts clarity and reduces distractions so that gamers stay focused when pitched against time, and ‘Driving’ magnifies details such as tire noises as the car races along–enabling gamers to hear subtle differences while racing.

Click here to download the Sound BlasterX Acoustic Engine Lite software.




Engineered to Be Lightweight, yet Durable

Designed with a durable steel and aluminium architecture, the Sound BlasterX H5 Valencia CF Edition is light to wear, and bring around, yet tough enough to maintain its structural integrity from everyday wear and tear.


 
Responsive Audio Cues for High Performance Gameplay

Experience your game the way it's meant to be heard. The Sound BlasterX H5 Valencia CF Edition is equipped with large, responsive 50mm FullSpectrum™ drivers that deliver astounding sound.

Rated at 118dB/mW, the Sound BlasterX H5 Valencia CF Edition is among the loudest gaming headsets of its class. Feel the tremor of every bone-shattering explosion and hear the rattle of gunfire in your gameplay, like no other.



Ergonomic Design for the Ultimate Comfort

The Sound BlasterX H5 Valencia CF Edition is made for long gaming sessions. Featuring a premium blend of soft-touch plastics, memory foam and plush leatherette that complements its sturdy metallic architecture, the Sound BlasterX H5 Valencia CF Edition boasts superior comfort and ergonomics to keep you focused on your game all day, even if you are a gamer who wears eyewear.

Through the clever use of physics and mechanical engineering, the highly flexible, single-piece reinforced steel band bends all the way around the head with optimal clamping force and ample flexibility for a snug fit—on heads of all shapes and sizes—for a comfortable fit without compromising stability and sturdiness.

Tilt Driver Design

The Sound BlasterX H5 Valencia CF Edition is designed with a tilt driver implementation that creates a mini acoustic chamber to minimize resonance within the earcups. The result is that you experience extra clarity across the frequencies and better sound separation where every detail crisp and clear.


Hear Only Your Voice

The detachable noise-reduction microphone filters ambient sounds so you can be heard clearly, even in a noisy environment.

When you're not gaming, detach your microphone from the headset and you'll get a pair of compact headphones that's ready for great music on the go.


One-touch Convenience

With the inline remote, you're in control of your music, volume and voice calls - easy and convenient!

  

Braided Cables for Lasting Durability

The Sound BlasterX H5 Valencia CF Edition comes with a detachable cable that fits snugly and is well protected from accidental tugs and pulls. It reduces tangling, fraying and ensures long-lasting durability for rigorous gameplay.



Seamless Connectivity

The Sound BlasterX H5 Valencia CF Edition offers a wide range of connectivity options for a holistic gaming experience. The 3.5mm 4-pole jack cable can be used with any smart device such as your iPhone and iPad, as well as today's gaming consoles such as PlayStation®4 and XBOX® One.

There's an included 1.2m Y-splitter cable (that fits the older 3-pole plug-in implementation) where one jack is used for microphone input, and the other for audio output.


Where Style Meets Function



This exquisite crystalline capsule package is a head-turner where design is concerned. Use this as a carry case to protect your entertainment headset from bumps and knocks. The best of both worlds!


What's In The Box?



Product Specifications



Production Timeline



Limited Edition Sound BlasterX Valencia CF T-shirt!

Be the first 100 to claim the Early Bird + FREE T-shirt perk to receive this exclusive T-shirt!

Limited Edition Valencia CF pouch - US$100k Stretch Goal!

Help us achieve a goal of US$100k!

Each headset purchaser will get a limited edition Valencia CF pouch worth US$24.90! Contribute now!


Valencia CF Dream Visit - US$150k Stretch Goal!

Help us achieve a goal of US$150k!

We will pick 10 lucky winners to enjoy the dream visit to Valencia CF. Here's your chance to meet Valencia players personally, take a tour around the historic Mestalla Stadium. Plus, your hotel accommodation and transportation from hotel to stadium will be provided. *More details will be announced soon! 


Frequently Asked Questions


1. What’s the Dream Visit’s itinerary like?

It’s happening in early 2016! It’s going to be two days and one night of action, packed with fun and excitement.

*More details will be announced soon! 

2. How/where do I make a purchase?

Currently, Indiegogo is the channel for you to purchase the Sound BlasterX H5 Valencia CF Edition headset. Simply choose the perk that you like! You’ll be among the first in the world to receive your headset! 

3. I don't want to pay using Paypal, can i just pay using a credit or debit card?

 Yes you are able to. Once you get to the payment page, click the "Go to Paypal" button. Once you arrive on the Paypal page, choose "Pay with a credit or debit card" on the middle of the screen. You can pay using your credit/debit card without having a Paypal account.

4. Where do you ship?

We try to make it available worldwide! If we’re unable to ship to your country, we will make full refund to your account.Click here to see the list of countries we ship to.

5. What is the shipping cost?

FREE shipping to Singapore and Spain.

 For the rest of the international orders, we cap your shipping cost at US$9.(Shipping cost of Gaming Buddy orders are capped at US$15, shipping cost of VCF Fan Club Pack orders are capped at US$70).

6. When will I receive my shipment?

We are targeting to ship out the headsets to you before February 2016.

7. What is the warranty period?

The headset comes with a one-year warranty period. 

8. Can I change or cancel my perk?

Indiegogo’s policy dictates that campaign owners have no ability to adjust perk selections. That means we cannot upgrade your perk, we cannot change your perk and we cannot cancel your perk. Pre-orders are non-refundable. By making a contribution to this campaign, you acknowledge that you understand that you are contributing to a work-in-progress and not making a direct purchase. For more details, please see Indiegogo’s Terms of Use.

9. There was an error with my contribution. What happened?

Please refer to this article on common contribution errors and steps to resolve: Common Contribution Errors.

10. I have other questions that are not here – where do I go?

You can ask questions at any time in the comment section of this campaign or by emailing us at indiegogo@customercare.creative.com

11. How can I choose the size of the T-shirt in the Early Bird + FREE T-shirt perk?

Just before shipping out we will contact all contributors to confirm the size of the T-shirt.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Terms & Conditions for Dream Visit Contest

THE DREAM VISIT CONTEST ONLY KICKS IN WHEN CAMPAIGN GOAL RAISED EXCEEDS US$150,000.00

All contributors of US$99.00 and above will automatically be entered for the Dream Visit "Contest", unless prohibited or restricted by law. This is offered only to all natural persons aged 18 and older. All federal, state, and local laws and regulations apply.

Contest period starts from 2 November to 11 December 2015. All entries must be logged by 11 December 2015, 2359 hrs (GMT+1), to qualify.

The results will be published after 21 December 2015, 0700 hrs (GMT+1). Each winner is only entitled to one visit and all winners will be notified via email.

Entry into this contest confirms your acceptance of these Terms and Conditions and your agreement to be bound by the decisions of Sponsor "Creative".

The winners will be selected at random from all the entries received.

Winners will be notified by email within 14 days of the closing date.

Should Creative be unable to contact the winners, or the winners fail to accept the prize by email within 14 days, another winner will be selected by random.

The winners agree to the use of their name, photograph and disclosure of country of residence and will co-operate with any other reasonable requests relating to any post-winning publicity.

Dream Visit Contest covers the cost of hotel accommodation and transfers between the hotel and Mestalla Stadium. 

Creative reserves all rights in its sole discretion, to amend or modify the rules, make prize substitutions and/or cancel this Contest without any notice. 

Employees, officers and directors of Sponsor, its parent company, affiliates, subsidiaries, advertising, promotion and fulfillment agencies, their immediate family members and persons living in their same household, are not eligible to participate in the Contest. Void where prohibited. All federal, state, and local laws and regulations apply.

Creative's decisions are final and binding.



Media Kit

Feel free to download our media kit at www.creative.com

It contains our press releases and visual collateral you can use. We would also love to talk to you or help in any way we can. From answering questions, offering unique pictures and setting up interviews with our representatives. Reach us at indiegogo@customercare.creative.com


----------


Comienza la colaboración

Los fans del Valencia CF de todo el mundo están a punto de disfrutar de otra forma el sonido muy pronto.

El Valencia CF, uno de los equipos más grandes de la liga de fútbol española, se ha asociado con Creative para crear los auriculares Sound BlasterX H5 Valencia CF Edition. La edición especial de estos auriculares está personalizada en exclusiva para los fans del Valencia CF, que podrán llevar con orgullo el escudo del Valencia impreso a láser en sus auriculares. 

Los auriculares están basados en la serie Creative Sound BlasterX pro-gaming y vienen con un audio profesional listos para dar la mejor calidad en música, películas y juegos, así como su propio software para personalizar los diferentes perfiles de audio. 

Para obtener a un perfil de audio único, solo disponible para estos auriculares y diseñado especialmente para EA SPORTS™ FIFA 16, se ha capturado el sonido ambiente de Mestalla y permitirá a los usuarios sentirse como si estuvieran sentados dentro del estadio viendo un partido del Valencia. 


¿Por qué Indiegogo?

Estamos encantados de poder ofrecer al Valencia CF y a sus seguidores nuestra experiencia en tecnología y audio en este proyecto. Este proyecto de Indiegogo representa una oportunidad única para los fans que quieran formar parte del desarrollo de este producto. De alguna manera es un proyecto para los fans creado gracias a los fans. 

Ahora con los auriculares Sound BlasterX H5 Valencia CF Edition, los seguidores pueden tener la oportunidad de llevar el escudo de su equipo con orgullo mientras escuchan música, ven películas o juegan. 

Y gracias a que este proyecto está en Indiegogo, los fans pueden esperar suculentos descuentos. Esto también permite al Valencia CF y a Creative llegar a los aficionados de todo el mundo, dándoles la oportunidad de hacerse con estos auriculares antes de que lleguen a las tiendas. 

 Sound BlasterX H5 Valencia CF Edition

Forma parte del Legado

¡Muestra tu lealtad al Valencia CF! Lleva el escudo del Valencia como una marca de honor. El logo del Valencia CF está serigrafiado en metal con láser en los laterales de auriculares Sound BlasterX H5 Valencia CF Edition. Forma parte del legado valencianista con los Sound BlasterX H5 Valencia CF Edition. 



Mejora tu audio con el software BlasterX Acoustic Engine Lite 

Los auriculares también traen disponible un perfil específico para los jugadores de EA SPORTS™ FIFA 16 con el que podrán disfrutar de todo el sonido ambiente. Este nuevo perfil de audio “Stadium” se creó mediante un proceso en el que se colocaron micrófonos en puntos estratégicos del estadio de Mestalla, el campo del Valencia CF. La información que se generó fue usada para definir el perfil de audio que permitirá a los usuarios disfrutar al máximo del sonido ambiente mientras juegan a FIFA 16 en el estadio de su equipo.

El software Acoustic Engine viene con cuatro perfiles predefinidos que permiten a los jugadores personalizar el audio en función del género al que jueguen. Por ejemplo, en los juegos de disparos en primera persona, ‘First-Person Shooter’, se incrementa la percepción del entorno que nos envuelve, en los juegos de acción y aventuras, ‘Action & Adventure’ se mejora el realismo para obtener una experiencia cinematográfica, en el modo de estrategia en tiempo real, ‘Real Time Strategy’, se potencia la claridad y se reducen las distracciones para que los jugadores estén concentrados en todo momento, y en los juegos de conducción, ‘Driving’, se magnifican los detalles como los sonidos de las ruedas mientras el coche compite, permitiendo a los jugadores notar el agarre en las carreras. 

Haz clic aquí para descargar el software Sound BlasterX Acoustic Engine Lite.




Creados para ser ligeros, pero resistentes

Diseñados con una resistente arquitectura de acero y aluminio, los Sound BlasterX H5 Valencia CF Edition son ligeros, de fácil transporte y aún así mantienen su integridad estructural con el uso del día a día.

 

Gran respuesta de audio para partidas de alto nivel

Disfruta el sonido de tu juego de la manera que se diseñó para que se escuchase. Los Sound BlasterX H5 Valencia CF Edition están equipados con unos grandes altavoces de 50mm FullSpectrum™ y entregan un sonido espectacular.

Con 118dB/mW, los Sound BlasterX H5 Valencia CF Edition están entre los auriculares que pueden alcanzar niveles de audio más elevados. Escucha y siente las explosiones y los disparos en tus partidas como nunca antes. 

Diseño ergonómico para obtener el mejor confort 

Los Sound BlasterX H5 Valencia CF Edition han sido creados para largas sesiones de juego. Construidos con materiales premium, espumas con con memoria y un recubrimiento de cuero, están acabados con una única estructura metálica. Los Sound BlasterX H5 Valencia CF Edition potencian el máximo confort y ergonomía para que puedas centrarte en tus juegos todo el día, incluso si eres un jugador con gafas. 

Gracias a un ingenioso uso de la ingeniería física y mecánica, los auriculares cuentan con un diseño simplificado: menos piezas significa menos peso, y contando con una sola pieza de acero reforzado altamente flexible que se adapta alrededor de la cabeza para un ajuste preciso y cómodo. 

Diseño de los auriculares

Los Sound BlasterX H5 Valencia CF Edition implementan unos altavoces que crean una pequeña cámara acústica que reduce la resonancia en los auriculares. El resultado es que puedes disfrutar de un audio de gran claridad en todas las frecuencias y de una mejor separación del sonido donde cada detalle se escucha alto y claro.

Escucha solo tu voz

El micrófono desmontable viene con reducción de eco y un filtro para el sonido ambiente por lo que se te estuchará perfectamente, incluso si estás en un entorno ruidoso. 

Cuando no estés jugando, puedes quitar tu micrófono y tener así unos auriculares compactos listos para escuchar música allá donde vayas.

Comodidad en un clic

Con su control remoto, tu puedes controlar la música, el volumen y las llamadas de una manera cómoda y sencilla.

Cables trenzados para mayor durabilidad

Los auriculares Sound BlasterX H5 Valencia CF Edition vienen con un cable desmontable que encaja perfectamente y está bien protegido contra tirones y enganches. Este cable reduce los enredos y asegura que aguanten perfectamente durante las sesiones de juego más exigentes.



Conectividad total

Los Sound BlasterX H5 Valencia CF Edition ofrecen una amplia gama de opciones de conectividad para una experiencia de juego total. Su conexión jack de 3.5mm se puede usar en cualquier dispositivo móvil, como tu iPhone e iPad, así como en las consolas actuales como por ejemplo PlayStation®4 y XBOX® One.

También se incluye un conector de 1.2 m dividido en Y que encajará perfectamente en los antiguos conectores de 3 polos, y separará la señal: uno de los jacks se usará para la entrada del micrófono y el otro para la salida del audio. 


Donde el estilo se da la mano con la funcionalidad



Una exquisito diseño de packaging. Usa esta caja para transportar y proteger tus auriculares de golpes e impactos. ¡Lo mejor de ambos mundos!



¡Camisetas de edición limitada Sound BlasterX Valencia CF!

¡Se de los primeros de 100 en comprar y consigue el logro Early Bird + FREE T-shirt para recibir esta exclusiva camiseta!


Bolsa de edición limitada del Valencia CF - ¡Al llegar a la meta de 100.000 dólares!

¡Ayúdanos a conseguir la meta de los 100.000 dólares!

Cada una de las compras recibirá una bolsa de transporte del Valencia CF edición limitada valorada en 24,90 dólares. ¡Contribuye ahora!


¡Visita de ensueño al Valencia CF al alcanzar los 150.000 dólares!

¡Ayúdanos a conseguir la meta de los 150.000 dólares!

Elegiremos 10 afortunados ganadores que disfrutarán de una visita al Valencia CF. Aquí tenéis vuestra oportunidad para conocer a los jugadores del Valencia en persona y hacer un tour por el histórico estadio de Mestalla. Además, el hotel y el transporte está pagado. *Se anunciarán nuevos detalles pronto. 


Preguntas Frecuentes

1. ¿Cómo será el itinerario de la visita a Valencia?

Se realizará a principios de 2016. Serán dos días y una noche de acción, llena de diversión y emociones.

*Se anunciarán nuevos detalles pronto. 

2. ¿Dónde y cómo hago la compra?

Ahora mismo, Indiegogo es el único lugar donde comprar los auriculares Sound BlasterX H5 Valencia CF Edition. Simplemente elige el paquete que tu quieras. Estarás entre los primeros del mundo en recibir vuestros auriculares.

3. No quiero usar PayPal, ¿puedo usar una tarjeta de crédito o débito?

Sí, claro que puedes. Una vez llegues a la página de pago, haz clic en el botón “Ir a Paypal”. Una vez llegues a la página de Paypal, elige “Pagar con una tarjeta de crédito o débito”. El mensaje aparecerá más o menos por la mitad de tu pantalla. De este modo podrás pagar utilizando una tarjeta de crédito o débito sin necesidad de utilizar una cuenta de Paypal. 

4. ¿Dónde se envían?

Intentamos que estén disponibles en todo el mundo. Si no somos capaces de enviar a tu país te haremos un reintegro del dinero a tu cuenta. Haz clic aquí para ver la lista de países a los que hacemos envíos.

5. ¿Cuánto son los gastos de envío?

GRATIS para Singapur y España.

 Para el resto de países, el envío será de 9 dólares. (Los envíos del programa Gaming Buddy serán de un máximo de 15 dólares, y el coste del envío para el VCF Fan Club Pack tendrán un máximo de 70 dólares).

6. ¿Cuándo recibiré mi envío?

Esperamos poder enviar los auriculares antes de febrero de 2016.

7. ¿Cuál es el periodo de garantía?

Los auriculares vienen con una garantía de un año. 

8. ¿Puedo cambiar o cancelar mi logro?

La política de Indiegogo dicta que los propietarios de la campañana no pueden cambiar tu elección. Esto significa que no podemos cambiar o cancelar tu pedido. Las pre compras no son reembosables. Al hacer una contribución a esta campaña, lees y entiendes que estás contribuyendo a un trabajo en curso y que no estás haciendo una compra directa. Para más detalles, por favor visita los términos y condicinoes de Indiegogo.

9. Hay un error con mi contribución. ¿Qué ha pasado?

Por favor para leer y encontrar soluciones sobre los errores más comunes en las contribuciones podéis entrar en: Common Contribution Errors.

10. Tengo otras preguntas que no están aquí, ¿Dónde puedo ir?

Puedes hacer tu pregunta cuando sea en la sección de comentarios o mandándonos un email a indiegogo@customercare.creative.com

11.¿Cómo elijo la talla de mi camiseta del logro Early Bird + FREE T-shirt? 

Antes del envío te contactaremos y confirmaremos la talla de tu camiseta.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Términos y condiciones del sorteo Dream Visit

EL SORTEO DE DREAM VISIT SE EFECTUARÁ SOLAMENTE SI LA CAMPAÑA LLEGA A RECAUDAR MÁS DE 150.000 dólares.

Todos los que contribuyan con 99 o másde 99 dólares tomarán parte automaticamente del concurso para la Dream Visit, a menos que sea prohibido o restringido por ley. Esto se ofrece a todas las personas mayores de 18 años. Se aplicarán todas las leyes y regulaciones federales, estatales y locales.

El concurso empezará el 2 de noviembre hasta el 11 de diciembre de 2015. Para participar, todas las entradas deberán estar registradas el 11 de diciembre a las 23:59 horas (GMT+1).

Los resultados se publicará después del 21 de diciembre del 2015 a las 7:00 horas (GMT+1). Cada ganador tiene derecho a una visita y todos los ganadores serán notificados vía email.

Participar en este concurso confirma que aceptas estos términos y condiciones y que aceptas el acuerdo con el patrocinador "Creative".

Los ganadores serán seleccionados de manera aleatoria de entre todas las entradas recibidas.

Los ganadores serán notificados por email en los 14 días siguientes al término del sorteo.

Si Creative no puede contactar a los ganadores, o los ganadores no aceptan el premio en esos 14 días, otro ganador será seleccionado de manera aleatoria.

Los ganadores aceptan que se use su nombre, fotografía y lugar de resudencia, así como cooperar con cualquier otra petición razonable en cualquier mensaje de publicidad sobre los ganadores.

El sorteo Dream Visit cubre los costes del alojamiento en el hotel y el desplazamiento entre el hotel y el estadio de Mestalla.  

Creative se reserva el derecho de modificar o enmendar las reglas, sustituir los premios y/o cancelar este sorteo sin previo aviso.

Está prohibida la participación en el concurso de los empleados, oficiales y directores de la compañía matriz, afiliados, subsidiarios, asociados, las agencias publicitarias, promotores y resto de agencias, así como los miembros de sus familias o con quienes convivan. Se aplicarán las leyes y regulaciones federales, estatales y locales.

Las decisiones de Creative son finales y vinculantes.


Media Kit

Siéntete libre para descargar nuestro media kit en www.creative.com

Contiene nuestras notas de prensa y visuales adjuntos que puedes usar. También nos encantaría hablar contigo o ayudaros en cualquier forma que nos sea posible. Desde respondiendo preguntas, hasta ofreciendo fotos únicas o preparando entrevistas con nuestros representantes. Podéis encontrarnos en indiegogo@customercare.creative.com

story_txt:
The Partnership Begins
Valencia fans worldwide can look forward to an amazing way to enjoy their audio very
soon. 
Spanish League giant Valencia CF has teamed up with Creative to create the Sound BlasterX H5 Valencia CF Edition Entertainment Headset. The premium special edition headset exclusively customized for Valencia CF fans will proudly feature the Valencia Crest laser-etched on its earcups.The headset is based on Creative’s high-performance Sound BlasterX pro-gaming series and comes with a professionally tuned audio signature for music, movies and games, as well as a software suite for different gaming audio profiles. A unique customized profile only available for this headset, specially tuned for EA SPORTS™ FIFA 16 to capture a football stadium’s soundscape, allows users to feel as if they were seated at an actual Valencia
match in a football stadium.Why Indiegogo?
We are delighted to be able to offer Valencia CF and its
fans our audio expertise and technologies in this crowdfunding project. This
Indiegogo project also represents a unique opportunity for fans to actually
drive this product to realization. In many ways it’s a project for the fans by the
fans.
Now with the Sound BlasterX H5 Valencia CF Edition, fans can
have the chance to wear their club’s crest proudly everywhere they go while
enjoying their music, movies, and games. 

And because this project is on Indiegogo, fans can expect to enjoy really
attractive savings. This also allows Valencia CF and Creative to reach out to
fans worldwide, giving them to a chance to get their hands on the headset
before it hits the stores.





We're delighted to  be awarded in the following Spanish media: El Chapuzas Informatico and Hardzone. 

Here's what they have to say about us: 
Hardzone: "Creative did it again. The Sound BlasterX H5 is one of the best headsets we have tested in our lab because it's comfortable with great sound quality." 
Awards: Platinum Award for Best Performance and Best Design 
El Chapuzas Informatico: "It offers high quality sound and its design is really good. We can't ask for more." 

 Sound BlasterX H5 Valencia CF Edition



Be a Part of the Heritage

Show your loyalty to Valencia CF! Wear the Valencia Crest as
a badge of honor. Proudly laser-etched on the sides of the Sound BlasterX H5
Valencia CF Edition, the raw metallic finishing of Valencia CF logo. Be a part
of the heritage with Sound BlasterX H5 Valencia CF Edition. 



Enhance your hearing with BlasterX Acoustic Engine Lite Software
The Sound BlasterX H5 Valencia CF Edition comes with the
BlasterX Acoustic Engine software for Windows. It features a unique customized
profile only available for this headset that is specially tuned for FIFA 16
that captures the soccer stadium’s soundscape profile. The special "Stadium" audio
profile allow players to feel as if they were seated at an actual Valencia
match at a soccer stadium when playing FIFA 16.
The Acoustic Engine software comes with four other pre-set
profiles allowing gamers to customize their audio profile to the game genres
that they are playing. For instance, ‘First-Person Shooter’ increases spatial
reality and perception with virtual surround, ‘Action & Adventure’ enhances
realism for a cinematic experience, ‘Real Time Strategy’ boosts clarity and
reduces distractions so that gamers stay focused when pitched against time, and
‘Driving’ magnifies details such as tire noises as the car races along–enabling
gamers to hear subtle differences while racing.
Click here to download the Sound
BlasterX Acoustic Engine Lite software.



Engineered to Be Lightweight, yet Durable

Designed with a durable steel and aluminium architecture, the Sound
BlasterX H5 Valencia CF Edition is light to wear, and bring around, yet tough
enough to maintain its structural integrity from everyday wear and tear.


 
Responsive Audio Cues for High Performance Gameplay

Experience your game the way it's meant to be heard. The Sound BlasterX H5 Valencia CF Edition is equipped with large, responsive 50mm FullSpectrum™ drivers that deliver
astounding sound.

Rated at 118dB/mW, the Sound BlasterX H5 Valencia CF Edition is among
the loudest gaming headsets of its class. Feel the tremor of every
bone-shattering explosion and hear the rattle of gunfire in your gameplay, like
no other.



Ergonomic Design for the Ultimate Comfort
The Sound BlasterX H5 Valencia CF Edition is made for long gaming sessions.
Featuring a premium blend of soft-touch plastics, memory foam and plush
leatherette that complements its sturdy metallic architecture, the Sound
BlasterX H5 Valencia CF Edition boasts superior comfort and ergonomics to keep
you focused on your game all day, even if you are a gamer who wears eyewear.


Through the clever use of physics and mechanical engineering, the highly
flexible, single-piece reinforced steel band bends all the way around the head
with optimal clamping force and ample flexibility for a snug fit—on heads of
all shapes and sizes—for a comfortable fit without compromising stability and
sturdiness.



Tilt Driver Design

The Sound BlasterX H5 Valencia CF Edition is designed with a tilt driver
implementation that creates a mini acoustic chamber to minimize resonance
within the earcups. The result is that you experience extra clarity across the
frequencies and better sound separation where every detail crisp and clear.



Hear Only Your Voice
The detachable noise-reduction microphone filters ambient sounds so you can
be heard clearly, even in a noisy environment.


When you're not
gaming, detach your microphone from the headset and you'll get a pair of
compact headphones that's ready for great music on the go.





One-touch Convenience

With the inline remote, you're in control of your music, volume and
voice calls - easy and convenient!


  
Braided Cables for Lasting Durability
The Sound BlasterX H5 Valencia CF Edition comes with a detachable cable that fits snugly and is well protected from accidental tugs and pulls. It reduces tangling, fraying and ensures long-lasting durability for rigorous gameplay.






Seamless Connectivity
The Sound BlasterX H5 Valencia CF Edition offers a wide range of
connectivity options for a holistic gaming experience. The 3.5mm 4-pole jack
cable can be used with any smart device such as your iPhone and iPad, as well
as today's gaming consoles such as PlayStation®4 and XBOX® One.
There's an included 1.2m Y-splitter cable (that fits the older 3-pole
plug-in implementation) where one jack is used for microphone input, and the
other for audio output.




Where Style Meets Function



This exquisite crystalline capsule package is a head-turner where design is concerned. Use this as a carry case to protect your entertainment headset from bumps and knocks. The best of both worlds!


What's In The Box?




Product Specifications






Production Timeline








Limited Edition Sound BlasterX Valencia CF T-shirt!

Be the first 100 to claim the Early Bird + FREE T-shirt perk to receive this exclusive T-shirt! 





Limited Edition Valencia CF pouch - US$100k Stretch Goal!




Help us achieve a goal of US$100k!
Each headset
purchaser will get a limited edition Valencia CF pouch worth US$24.90! Contribute now!



Valencia CF Dream Visit - US$150k Stretch Goal!


Help us achieve a goal of US$150k!

We will pick 10
lucky winners to enjoy the dream visit to Valencia CF. Here's your chance to meet Valencia players personally, take a tour around the historic Mestalla Stadium. Plus, your hotel accommodation and transportation from hotel to stadium will be provided. *More details will be announced soon! 


Frequently Asked Questions




1. What’s the Dream Visit’s itinerary like?
It’s happening in early 2016! It’s going to be two days and one night of action, packed with fun and excitement.
*More details will be announced soon! 
2. How/where do I make a
purchase?

Currently,
Indiegogo is the channel for you to purchase the Sound BlasterX H5 Valencia CF Edition headset. Simply choose the perk that you like! You’ll be among the first in the world to receive your headset! 
3. I don't want to pay using Paypal, can i just pay using a credit or debit card?
 Yes you are able to. Once you get to the payment page, click the "Go to Paypal" button. Once you arrive on the Paypal page, choose "Pay with a credit or debit card" on the middle of the screen. You can pay using your credit/debit card without having a Paypal account.
4. Where do you ship?
We try to make it available worldwide! If we’re unable to ship to
your country, we will make full refund to your account.Click here to see the list of countries we ship to. 
5. What is the shipping cost?
FREE shipping to Singapore and Spain.
 For the rest of the international orders, we cap your shipping cost at US$9.(Shipping cost of Gaming Buddy orders are capped at US$15, shipping cost of VCF Fan Club Pack orders are capped at US$70). 
6. When will I receive my
shipment?
We
are targeting to ship out the headsets to you before February 2016. 
7. What is the warranty
period?
The
headset comes with a one-year warranty period. 
8. Can I change or cancel my
perk?
Indiegogo’s
policy dictates that campaign owners have no ability to adjust perk selections.
That means we cannot upgrade your perk, we cannot change your perk and we
cannot cancel your perk. Pre-orders are non-refundable. By making a
contribution to this campaign, you acknowledge that you understand that you are
contributing to a work-in-progress and not making a direct purchase. For more
details, please see Indiegogo’s
Terms of Use. 
9. There was an error with my contribution. What
happened?
Please refer to
this article on common contribution errors and steps to resolve: Common
Contribution Errors. 
10. I have other questions that are not here – where do
I go?
You can ask
questions at any time in the comment section of this campaign or by emailing us
at indiegogo@customercare.creative.com


11. How can I choose the size of the T-shirt in the Early Bird + FREE T-shirt perk?

Just before shipping out we will contact all contributors to confirm the size of the T-shirt.

Los fans del Valencia CF de todo el mundo están a punto de disfrutar de otra forma el sonido muy pronto.
El Valencia CF, uno de los equipos más grandes de la liga de fútbol española, se ha asociado con Creative para crear los auriculares Sound BlasterX H5 Valencia CF Edition. Para obtener a un perfil de audio único, solo disponible para estos auriculares y diseñado especialmente para EA SPORTS™ FIFA 16, se ha capturado el sonido ambiente de Mestalla y permitirá a los usuarios sentirse como si estuvieran sentados dentro del estadio viendo un partido del Valencia. 

¿Por qué Indiegogo?
Estamos encantados de poder ofrecer al Valencia CF y a sus seguidores nuestra experiencia en tecnología y audio en este proyecto. Este proyecto de Indiegogo representa una oportunidad única para los fans que quieran formar parte del desarrollo de este producto. De alguna manera es un proyecto para los fans creado gracias a los fans. 
Ahora con los auriculares Sound BlasterX H5 Valencia CF Edition, los seguidores pueden tener la oportunidad de llevar el escudo de su equipo con orgullo mientras escuchan música, ven películas o juegan. Y gracias a que este proyecto está en Indiegogo, los fans pueden esperar suculentos descuentos. Esto también permite al Valencia CF y a Creative llegar a los aficionados de todo el mundo, dándoles la oportunidad de hacerse con estos auriculares antes de que lleguen a las tiendas. 



 Sound BlasterX H5 Valencia CF Edition

Forma parte del Legado
¡Muestra tu lealtad al Valencia CF! Lleva el escudo del Valencia como una marca de honor. El logo del Valencia CF está serigrafiado en metal con láser en los laterales de auriculares Sound BlasterX H5 Valencia CF Edition. Forma parte del legado valencianista con los Sound BlasterX H5 Valencia CF Edition. 



Mejora tu audio con el software BlasterX Acoustic Engine Lite 
Los auriculares también traen disponible un perfil específico para los jugadores de EA SPORTS™ FIFA 16 con el que podrán disfrutar de todo el sonido ambiente. Este nuevo perfil de audio “Stadium” se creó mediante un proceso en el que se colocaron micrófonos en puntos estratégicos del estadio de Mestalla, el campo del Valencia CF. La información que se generó fue usada para definir el perfil de audio que permitirá a los usuarios disfrutar al máximo del sonido ambiente mientras juegan a FIFA 16 en el estadio de su equipo.
El software Acoustic Engine viene con cuatro perfiles predefinidos que permiten a los jugadores personalizar el audio en función del género al que jueguen. Por ejemplo, en los juegos de disparos en primera persona, ‘First-Person Shooter’, se incrementa la percepción del entorno que nos envuelve, en los juegos de acción y aventuras, ‘Action & Adventure’ se mejora el realismo para obtener una experiencia cinematográfica, en el modo de estrategia en tiempo real, ‘Real Time Strategy’, se potencia la claridad y se reducen las distracciones para que los jugadores estén concentrados en todo momento, y en los juegos de conducción, ‘Driving’, se magnifican los detalles como los sonidos de las ruedas mientras el coche compite, permitiendo a los jugadores notar el agarre en las carreras. 
Haz clic aquí para descargar el software Sound BlasterX Acoustic Engine Lite.



Creados para ser ligeros, pero resistentesDiseñados con una resistente arquitectura de acero y aluminio, los Sound BlasterX H5 Valencia CF Edition son ligeros, de fácil transporte y aún así mantienen su integridad estructural con el uso del día a día.
 
Gran respuesta de audio para partidas de alto nivel
Disfruta el sonido de tu juego de la manera que se diseñó para que se escuchase. Los Sound BlasterX H5 Valencia CF Edition están equipados con unos grandes altavoces de 50mm FullSpectrum™ y entregan un sonido espectacular.Con 118dB/mW, los Sound BlasterX H5 Valencia CF Edition están entre los auriculares que pueden alcanzar niveles de audio más elevados. Escucha y siente las explosiones y los disparos en tus partidas como nunca antes. 



Diseño ergonómico para obtener el mejor confort 
Los Sound BlasterX H5 Valencia CF Edition han sido creados para largas sesiones de juego. Construidos con materiales premium, espumas con con memoria y un recubrimiento de cuero, están acabados con una única estructura metálica. Los Sound BlasterX H5 Valencia CF Edition potencian el máximo confort y ergonomía para que puedas centrarte en tus juegos todo el día, incluso si eres un jugador con gafas. 
Gracias a un ingenioso uso de la ingeniería física y mecánica, los auriculares cuentan con un diseño simplificado: menos piezas significa menos peso, y contando con una sola pieza de acero reforzado altamente flexible que se adapta alrededor de la cabeza para un ajuste preciso y cómodo. 



Diseño de los auricularesLos Sound BlasterX H5 Valencia CF Edition implementan unos altavoces que crean una pequeña cámara acústica que reduce la resonancia en los auriculares. El resultado es que puedes disfrutar de un audio de gran claridad en todas las frecuencias y de una mejor separación del sonido donde cada detalle se escucha alto y claro.

Escucha solo tu voz
El micrófono desmontable viene con reducción de eco y un filtro para el sonido ambiente por lo que se te estuchará perfectamente, incluso si estás en un entorno ruidoso. 
Cuando no estés jugando, puedes quitar tu micrófono y tener así unos auriculares compactos listos para escuchar música allá donde vayas.




Comodidad en un clicCon su control remoto, tu puedes controlar la música, el volumen y las llamadas de una manera cómoda y sencilla.




Cables trenzados para mayor durabilidadLos auriculares Sound BlasterX H5 Valencia CF Edition vienen con un cable desmontable que encaja perfectamente y está bien protegido contra tirones y enganches. Este cable reduce los enredos y asegura que aguanten perfectamente durante las sesiones de juego más exigentes.




Conectividad total
Los Sound BlasterX H5 Valencia CF Edition ofrecen una amplia gama de opciones de conectividad para una experiencia de juego total. Su conexión jack de 3.5mm se puede usar en cualquier dispositivo móvil, como tu iPhone e iPad, así como en las consolas actuales como por ejemplo PlayStation®4 y XBOX® One.
También se incluye un conector de 1.2 m dividido en Y que encajará perfectamente en los antiguos conectores de 3 polos, y separará la señal: uno de los jacks se usará para la entrada del micrófono y el otro para la salida del audio. 

Donde el estilo se da la mano con la funcionalidad
Una exquisito diseño de packaging. Usa esta caja para transportar y proteger tus auriculares de golpes e impactos. ¡Lo mejor de ambos mundos!


¡Camisetas de edición limitada Sound BlasterX Valencia CF!


¡Se de los primeros de 100 en comprar y consigue el logro Early Bird + FREE T-shirt para recibir esta exclusiva camiseta!


Bolsa de edición limitada del Valencia CF - ¡Al llegar a la meta de 100.000 dólares!

¡Ayúdanos a conseguir la meta de los 100.000 dólares!
Cada una de las compras recibirá una bolsa de transporte del Valencia CF edición limitada valorada en 24,90 dólares. ¡Contribuye ahora!

¡Visita de ensueño al Valencia CF al alcanzar los 150.000 dólares!


¡Ayúdanos a conseguir la meta de los 150.000 dólares!

Elegiremos 10 afortunados ganadores que disfrutarán de una visita al Valencia CF. Aquí tenéis vuestra oportunidad para conocer a los jugadores del Valencia en persona y hacer un tour por el histórico estadio de Mestalla. Además, el hotel y el transporte está pagado. *Se anunciarán nuevos detalles pronto. 

Preguntas Frecuentes

1. ¿Cómo será el itinerario de la visita a Valencia?
Se realizará a principios de 2016. Serán dos días y una noche de acción, llena de diversión y emociones.
*Se anunciarán nuevos detalles pronto. 
2. ¿Dónde y cómo hago la compra?
Ahora mismo, Indiegogo es el único lugar donde comprar los auriculares Sound BlasterX H5 Valencia CF Edition. Simplemente elige el paquete que tu quieras. Estarás entre los primeros del mundo en recibir vuestros auriculares.
3. No
quiero usar PayPal, ¿puedo usar una tarjeta de crédito o débito?
Sí, claro que puedes. Una vez llegues a la
página de pago, haz clic en el botón “Ir a Paypal”. Una vez llegues a la página
de Paypal, elige “Pagar con una tarjeta de crédito o débito”. El mensaje
aparecerá más o menos por la mitad de tu pantalla. De este modo podrás pagar
utilizando una tarjeta de crédito o débito sin necesidad de utilizar una cuenta
de Paypal. 
4. ¿Dónde se envían?
Intentamos que estén disponibles en todo el mundo. Si no somos capaces de enviar a tu país te haremos un reintegro del dinero a tu cuenta. Haz clic aquí para ver la lista de países a los que hacemos envíos.
5. ¿Cuánto son los gastos de envío?
GRATIS para Singapur y España.
 Para el resto de países, el envío será de 9 dólares. (Los envíos del programa Gaming Buddy serán de un máximo de 15 dólares, y el coste del envío para el VCF Fan Club Pack tendrán un máximo de 70 dólares).
6. ¿Cuándo recibiré mi envío?
Esperamos poder enviar los auriculares antes de febrero de 2016.
7. ¿Cuál es el periodo de garantía?
Los auriculares vienen con una garantía de un año. 
8. ¿Puedo cambiar o cancelar mi logro?
La política de Indiegogo dicta que los propietarios de la campañana no pueden cambiar tu elección. Esto significa que no podemos cambiar o cancelar tu pedido. Las pre compras no son reembosables. Al hacer una contribución a esta campaña, lees y entiendes que estás contribuyendo a un trabajo en curso y que no estás haciendo una compra directa. Para más detalles, por favor visita los términos y condicinoes de Indiegogo.
9. Hay un error con mi contribución. ¿Qué ha pasado?
Por favor para leer y encontrar soluciones sobre los errores más comunes en las contribuciones podéis entrar en: Common Contribution Errors.
10. Tengo otras preguntas que no están aquí, ¿Dónde puedo ir?
Puedes hacer tu pregunta cuando sea en la sección de comentarios o mandándonos un email a indiegogo@customercare.creative.com

11.¿Cómo elijo la talla de mi camiseta del logro Early Bird + FREE T-shirt? 
Antes del envío te contactaremos y confirmaremos la talla de tu camiseta. 
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Términos y condiciones del sorteo Dream VisitEL SORTEO DE DREAM VISIT SE EFECTUARÁ SOLAMENTE SI LA CAMPAÑA LLEGA A RECAUDAR MÁS DE 150.000 dólares.

Todos los que contribuyan con 99 o másde 99 dólares tomarán parte automaticamente del concurso para la  Dream Visit, a menos que sea prohibido o restringido por ley. Esto se ofrece a todas las personas mayores de 18 años. Se aplicarán todas las leyes y regulaciones federales, estatales y locales.
El concurso empezará el 2 de noviembre hasta el 11 de diciembre de 2015. Para participar, todas las entradas deberán estar registradas el 11 de diciembre a las 23:59 horas  (GMT+1).
Los resultados se publicará después del 21 de diciembre del 2015 a las 7:00 horas (GMT+1). Cada ganador tiene derecho a una visita y todos los ganadores serán notificados vía email.
Participar en este concurso confirma que aceptas estos términos y condiciones y que aceptas el acuerdo con el patrocinador "Creative".
Los ganadores serán seleccionados de manera aleatoria de entre todas las entradas recibidas.
Los ganadores serán notificados por email en los 14 días siguientes al término del sorteo. 
Si Creative no puede contactar a los ganadores, o los ganadores no aceptan el premio en esos 14 días, otro ganador será seleccionado de manera aleatoria. 
Los ganadores aceptan que se use su nombre, fotografía y lugar de resudencia, así como cooperar con cualquier otra petición razonable en cualquier mensaje de publicidad sobre los ganadores.
El sorteo Dream Visit cubre los costes del alojamiento en el hotel y el desplazamiento entre el hotel y el estadio de Mestalla.  
Creative se reserva el derecho de modificar o enmendar las reglas, sustituir los premios y/o cancelar este sorteo sin previo aviso. 
Está prohibida la participación en el concurso de los empleados, oficiales y directores de la compañía matriz, afiliados, subsidiarios, asociados, las agencias publicitarias, promotores y resto de agencias, así como los miembros de sus familias o con quienes convivan. Se aplicarán las leyes y regulaciones federales, estatales y locales.

Las decisiones de Creative son finales y vinculantes.


Media KitSiéntete libre para descargar nuestro media kit en www.creative.com


Contiene nuestras notas de prensa y visuales adjuntos que puedes usar. También nos encantaría hablar contigo o ayudaros en cualquier forma que nos sea posible. Desde respondiendo preguntas, hasta ofreciendo fotos únicas o preparando entrevistas con nuestros representantes. Podéis encontrarnos en indiegogo@customercare.creative.com
----------

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
Perks Guaranteed to Ship!

Pre-order Today!

Sick of those bulky and heavy bluetooth speakers?
Searching for the perfect bluetooth speaker that's tiny, portable and weighs practically nothing?
Say hello to The Shot.


The Awesome Features


The Shot is an ultra portable bluetooth speaker that connects wirelessly with your smartphone, tablet or computer. Use The Shot to listen to your music and even answer calls with the built in mic.

The Shot is so tiny it will fit anywhere:
  • In your pocket
  • In that small center console between the driver seat and passenger seat in your car
  • In your clutch
  • On your keychain

Yup, it's just that small!


Uses a standard Micro-USB charging cable (the one you use for your smartphone).


Who we are

We're two guys and a gal who love and are obsessed with innovative products and beautiful design. We started DnJ Design after 20 years of actual experience in the wireless industry. Over the years we've seen and interacted with thousands of wireless products. Sometimes they inspired us and other times they disappointed, but through it all we learned the trade and figured out what people love and want.  The Shot is DnJ's first product and we're super excited to share it with you. It's truly something that we always envisioned for ourselves and it's finally here. The Shot is a tiny and very chic Bluetooth speaker with amazing sound quality. We're extremely proud of The Shot and can't wait for you to try it. When you purchase our product and give us your seal of approval, you'll enable us to finalize production and packaging of The Shot.


What We Need

We only need $2,500 for final packaging for retail distribution.

  • The Shot is fully developed, tested and ready to go! All we need is packaging.

Here is a sample of the retail packaging that we designed:



What You Get

You get to help launch one of the coolest and tiniest bluetooth speakers into the market! And you get to be the first to own The Shot.

  • We guarantee that you will receive your perks fast and in perfect condition.
  • Our utmost gratitude and thanks for believing in us and supporting our product.



The Perks


The Impact

The Shot is an awesome product and we can't wait to share it with as many people as we can.

But this is just the beginning for us. We have so many more amazing new gadgets to share with the world, but it all depends on this very first and very special campaign being successful.

Basically, if you help us succeed, you'll allow us to bring even more amazing products to you!


Product Specs

  • Product size: 26.8 x 26.8 x 28.5mm or 1 x 1 x 1.2 inches
  • Product weight: 26g or 0.7oz
  • Battery: 3.7V / 180mAh
  • Speaker: 23mm, 4Ω 2W
  • Frequency Response: 180HZ-16KHZ

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that some people just can't contribute monetarily and we totally get that. But if you like what we are doing you can still help us be successful by sharing The Shot with everyone you know. We'd love to get to know what you think about The Shot and our campaign in general so please reach out to us on Facebook or Twitter.

story:
Have you always been feeling a desire to customize your earphones, so they reflect your personal style? Are the black or white earphones not matching your current outfit or did you always wanted to have something different than everyone else? There are several manufacturers who customize your earphones according to your current needs. But what if your style changes over time, would you make another customized purchase, or would you simply stick with your current ones?

Style is not the only thing that changes over time, technology is another critical aspect. Have you also been annoyed that manufacturers update their headphones and you have to buy an entire new set? Wouldn`t it be easier to just replace the updated parts? And what if some parts have manufacturing issues and break after a certain time period? Now imagine you would have the possibility to simply replace the updated or broken part for a fraction of the entire price?

The InTec In-Ear Headphones addresses all of those limitations and enables you to customize the way you listen to your music and therefore revolutionizes the entire headphone market.


With the InTec earphones you can express your personal style and customize them the way you always wanted to. The basic set will be available in four different colors, while all parts and colors are interchangeable.


All InTec earphones are divided into three separate parts:

- The In-Ear piece,

- the speaker, and

- the cable

All parts can be easily exchanged by simply twisting the specific part and pulling it out. This method guarantees a “new” pair of earphones within a minute.


Once the product is funded and established on the market, additional parts will be available. This will eventually lead to a wide scope of interchangeable parts. Since not everyone’s ear canal is the same, the InTec In-Ear piece will have three different dimensions. This will guarantee, that almost everyone will be able to comfortable wear the earphones and enjoy music to its fullest. Additionally, with almost no extra costs you will have the possibility to customize your InTec earphones with your own or even your company’s logo, while also being able to switch between different sound setups (e.g. bass intensive, high treble, etc.) according to your personal choice. The customizing possibilities are almost endless.


One of the first available customizations will be an illuminated logo which is placed on the back of the speaker component. With an easy turn on/off method you can decide if you want the logo to enlighten the night or stay off. 


And now let’s turn off the lights!


New technologies are introduced almost on a daily basis. With the InTec Earphones you simply replace the updated part for a fraction of the entire price. So let’s assume the speakers will be updated and have a crispier sound. You than only have to get your new speakers and enjoy the brilliant new sound without having to replace the entire set. And don’t worry, all parts will be available in every color ever produced.

 

And what if something breaks? You guessed right, this part will simply be replaced within seconds without having to purchase an entire new set of earphones for a fraction of the regular price.

 


SHIPPING:

EU – Free

US and Canada – $10 (one pair) and $20 (wholesaler)

All other international – $15 (one pair) and $30 (wholesaler)


The first step has already been accomplished by setting up this Crowdfunding campaign and gathering funds for the InTec earphones. Once the goal is reached, the first prototypes will be produced with a clear focus: easy customizability and high quality. All steps during this process will be displayed within this campaign. After heavily testing all prototypes and improving those to fully satisfy our (including the community) needs, this prototype will be mass produced and afterwards shipped out to you. The design might change to accomplish a satisfying quality and interchangeability of all parts.

 

If you like the project but don’t have the possibility to fund it, simply share this project with your family, friends or colleagues. Everything counts and is well appreciated. 


Thanks to all communities for featuring the InTec earphones on their platforms.


If you have any questions in regards of the InTec earphones, feel free and ask right away.

Thanks to all communities for featuring the InTec earphones on their platforms. 


If you have
any questions in regards of the InTec earphones, feel free and ask right away.

story:
ADVANCED Alpha planar magnetic headphones have been critically acclaimed by numerous audiophile reviewers around the globe during its first production run.  See the reviews below and judge for yourself.

The Master Switch

Z Reviews

Resonance Reviews

Everyday Listening

Headfonics

 

Alpha is built with the proprietary 96mm planar magnetic driver in a beautiful stainless steel chassis that feature self-adjusting head band, user-replaceable earpads and detachable cable.

 

Alpha 1.2 is an upgraded version of Alpha that has been fine-tuned and improved based on the feedback we received in the first production run.  Its fundamental sound-tuning has been left unchanged as we still believe that the Alpha achieves high in that regard. Following are the list of changes made to Alpha 1.2:

  • Headband strength has been loosened from 880g -> 770g (12.5% reduction).
  • Headphone cable length has been increased from 1.5m -> 2m (33% increase).
  • Compact carrying pouch has been added for convenient storage.

Alpha has been an ongoing development from the ground-up for over 2 years.  Each component has been hand-picked to provide the ultimate audiophile listening experience. Our development never stopped after the initial production run was made.  We have since opened a new tooling for the revised head band, and secured the details of longer cable and developed a compact carrying case.  We now need capital to enter production of Alpha 1.2.

Alpha 1.2 has already gone through prototype stage of development and is in its final stage of development.  The fund from Indiegogo will allow us to secure raw material in order kick off the production.

It was for the love of music.  It was the respect for all musicians of the past, present and future. It was for the struggling instrumental buried under the heavy bass line. It was for the audiophiles craving that crystal clear and mind-blowing detail.

We began as a small crowdfunding campaign in 2015 and naturally grew into a bigger body that thrives on the enthusiasm and passion for music. We design, develop and produce ground-breaking audio products that span widely from earphones, headphones, DAC / amp to musical instruments. We are focusing on staying forefront with the latest proprietary audio technology, while continuing to explore creative ways to allow everyone to experience the audiophile-grade sound.

We have an open mind and open doors for new ways to collaborate with musicians, audio engineers, manufacturers and brands - as we strive to mature into a platform where the advanced sound converge.

ADVANCED SOUND GROUP - Designed for Musicians

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
A Wireless Musical Device to Meet Your Audio Satisfaction


MusicFreedom is a stereo wireless in-ear headphone provided the best audio quality for users, it is the next generation of high-end earphone. This unique device is a dual drivers system consisting of balanced armature driver for high fidelity middle and upper end frequencies; and also composing a moving coil driver for bass.

One of our uniqueness is the first dual drivers system of which uses DSP with digital filters to deliver sound to the different drivers instead of using analog passive filters; and therefore it can ensure the best acoustic performance.

MusicFreedom is compact in size (only weight 6g) but it is specially designed with two acoustic chambers, one hemi-mixing chamber for mixing the sound wave from drivers; whilst the second chamber is placed behind the drivers as air buffer. Mechanically the drivers are mounted on a solid piece of plastic device which provides air tight between chambers. Also MusicFreedom is ergonomically designed to fit in your ear comfortably which you can use it for whole day long.

There will also have a free apps for user to control and fine tune the MusicFreedom; and it will support both android and ios device. The MusicFreedom’s apps can be used to setup voice notification too, for example you can set speed, distance, navigation while you are riding bicycle. In case, if you want to write your own apps, there will also be a set of API provided to meet your requirement.





The Features

 

  Balanced armature + moving coil dual drivers configuration

  Engineered for the best audio performance


No cables

Easy to use, multi-functions single button design

  Ergonomically design for comfortable wear

  Smartphone apps to configure your MusicFreedom,setup notifications and API for developer

The System

MusicFreedom connects the phone, left-hand-sided and right-hand-sided earbud using Bluetooth.  High fidelity codec-aptX® is used to transfer Digital audio data, where the digital data is encoded with CD quality. Either one of the unit can act as a receiver as well as a relay for passing data to the second unit. Also three control profiles will be used, AVRCP will use to send link control data; whereas the advance EQ and voice notification data  will send by SPP (for Android) or Bluetooth Low Energy Profile (BLE 4.0 for iPhone).

There also has a voice menu, in which MusicFreedom will tell you the current status of the device; such as current connection state, battery level and etc.

The man-machine-interface has only one single button and two LEDs on each side. The multiple functions button is easy to use but powerful, you can control everything  at your finger tip.

Left Hand Side

Right Hand Side

Single Press

Power on (off state)

Volume down (music state)

Power on (off state)

Volume up (music state)

Double Press

Start playing (idle state)

Previous song (music state)

Start playing (idle state)

Next song (music state)

Press and Hold

Pair with phone (off state)

Pair with the right hand side unit (off state + long press)

Power off (idle state)

Pair with phone (off state)

Pair with the left hand side unit (off state + long press)

Power off (idle state)


The Hardware

The heart of MusicFreedom consists of both moving-coil + balanced-armature drivers. This combination can deliver a relatively flat and wide frequency response.

Moving-coil

“The moving coil driver, more commonly referred to as a "dynamic" driver, is the most common type used in headphones. The operating principle consists of a stationary magnetic element affixed to the frame of the headphone which sets up a static magnetic field...The alternating magnetic field produced by the current through the coil reacts against the static magnetic field in turn, causing the coil and attached diaphragm to move the air, thus producing sound..."(from wikipedia.org)

Pros

  • Sound signature is more coherent

  • Better bass response

  • More durable and cheaper

Cons

  • Not as detailed as balanced armature drivers

  • Larger

  • Slower response

Balanced armature

“A balanced armature is a sound transducer design primarily intended to increase the electrical efficiency of the element by eliminating the stress on the diaphragm characteristic of many other magnetic transducer systems…when there is electric current through the coil, it magnetizes the armature one way or the other, causing it to rotate slightly one way or the other about the pivot thus moving the diaphragm to make sound…

The design is not mechanically stable; a slight imbalance makes the armature stick to one pole of the magnet. A fairly stiff restoring force is required to hold the armature in the 'balance' position. Although this reduces its efficiency, this design can still produce more sound from less power than any other…” (

from wikipedia.org).

Pros

  • Drivers can be tuned for specific frequency ranges

  • Smaller in size

  • Better treble performance

  • Faster response and more detailed sound

Cons

  • Bass response is not good

  • Narrow frequency range

  • More expensive

There is no doubt that both technologies have their pros and cons. It is hard to say which one is better because they both excel in different situations. In summary, balanced armature drivers typically offer a more detailed sound. Dynamic drivers offer a more coherent and powerful sound, and are often described as warm-sounding.

The Maths

The main processor in MusicFreedom is by CSR, which it has high resolution DAC. The SNR of the DAC is 98Db. The processor has a dual-core architecture with embedded DSP + MCU core.

 The balance armature driver provide treble frequency response of 200-200kHz and the moving coil driver is responsible for the lower frequency of 5-20kHz.

Detailed Specifications:

  • Type: In-Ear dual drivers

  • Frequency response bandwidth: 5-200kHz

  • Total harmonic distortion: 0.003% (1 KHz, 1 mW)

  • SNR: 98Db

  • Audio format: 16 bit stereo

  • Dimension: 19mmx19mmx23mm (LxWxH)

  • Lightweight (6 gram), shock resistant, waterproof

  • Battery: 100 mAh Lithium Polymer

  • Play time: 5 hours

  • Standby time: 250 hours

  • Charging time: 30-60 mins fast charging

  • Charging: Micro USB (power plug not included)

  • Dual Mode Bluetooth 4.0  (with Bluetooth LE GATT profile)

  • Audio compatibility with classic Bluetooth devices (A2DP profile, CSR aptX® audio codec, AVRCP, SPP)

  • iOS / Android Apps controls audio, LED and notification settings

  • Full compatibility with Apple: iPhone® 4S and later, iPod® Touch 5th generation and later, iPad® 3rd generation and later

  • Full compatibility with Android

  • CSR True Wireless Stereo audio

  • CSR aptX® audio codec

  • Up to four paired devices (One at a time)

  • The package includes: left and right MusicFreedom, carrying case, charging dual micro-USB cable, user manual, 3 fitting silicon rings and 4 different size ear tips.

    •  


The Physics

Mechanically, MusicFreedom uses solid plastic housing and it is designed with two acoustic chambers. At the front of the drivers, there is a hemi-mixing chamber, its hemisphere-like-design reflects sound wave to a single point and results in a solid and better defined sound location. The opening at that chamber has a trumpet design, this will reduce any interference waves propagate to your ear. The positioning for two difference type of drivers are carefully designed so as to enhance the bass response.


MusicFreedom is ergonomically designed to fit in your ear comfortably, and this allows you to use it whole day long or even during exercise. There is three silicon rings + four ear tips which securely fits in your ear and providing grip.


The Design

For  hardware, the PCB is designed with 4 layers in which there has a full ground plane. The component placements are carefully designed and fully separated between the analog audio, RF and digital parts to avoid interference. Also traces between the DACs and the drivers are kept as short as possible. High precision solid-state capacitors and high quality inductors are used. All the above results in an electronically clean and noise proof environment.


As this is a dual drivers system, each driver is responsible for different frequency range, therefore filters are needed. Unlike other systems, we are the first dual drivers system making use of DSP with digital filters instead of using analog passive filters. The problem of analog passive filters is their cut off frequency is not sharp and not accurate. Another problem is that hardware components need to be placed at the audio path of the circuit, any component, even a single wire, at the audio path will definitely affect the acoustic performance. Therefore we use digital filters so that we can accurately control the frequency delivered to each driver and also provide a direct, non-interrupted audio pathway in the circuitry. Also there have two separated DACs in each unit, and each driver powered by its own DAC . This maintains the impedance of different type of driver.


The Apps

With the MusicFreedom apps, user can directly control the device through a user-friendly GUI.

User can setup different voice notifications by using the text-to-speech engine. Also with the sensors at your phone, you can have notifications such as speed, distance, navigation, rotation, g-force, time, date, altitude and much more.

Also, advance user can fine tune the EQ for their own music favorite. 

We will provide an API for developer who may want to create their own apps sending voice or control the device.


The Results

As for any high quality audio system, the ultimate goal is to 100% reproduce what is recorded in the media. Although “acoustic performance” is a subjective statement but we can still quantify a system by using mathematical model. Here, the MusicFreedom is benchmarked with a famous wired triple balanced armatures earphone. And the result is as followed.


As shown, MusicFreedom (in purple color) has a relatively flat and wider frequency range. (Please note that due to imperfect of our testing equipment, the above testing is for reference only)

The Project

The design started in 2013 summer. As a music lover, I own several high end multi balanced armatures earphones. One day when I was listening to music while running, I found that there have serious noise problem when wind passing through the wires of my earphone. Also mechanical noises from the wires disturbed my music whenever I moved my head. Therefore I started this project, and it has only one goal: to create an in-ear headphone that provides the best sound quality. Therefore we removed any wire, added two different types of driver and carefully engineered in both electronically and mechanically.

Throughout the last few months, intensive design works have been done. With the help of CAD, our engineers simulated more than three versions of PCB and enclosure. These simulations include PCB level EM wave interference, placement of the drivers, frequency response, resonance frequency, sound wave propagation, ergonomics study... and finally we came up with the current design. You must have to try it on, it re-defines the perfection of acoustic performance.

The Team

Our team consists of professionals from Bluetooth industry, and also a team of creative problem solvers. Our experts have been working in the Bluetooth industry for a decade. Now we are trying to solve a missing piece in the current market; and that is a no wire in-earphone with high end audio performance. The target is to replace the existing wired high-end earphone.

The Schedule 

The current status of the project is at the engineering sample stage. Firmware is ready, and interoperability tested with popular phones in the market. Hardware, production software, test jig, Bluetooth tester, spectrum analyzer and audio analyzer are all prepared. The Bluetooth qualification pre-tests are passed. The apps is under development and will be ready after the first mass production run.

The next phase for this project will be production, we plan to have the alpha pre-production run in October and first production run in December.

If this project success, we will continuous to develop a series of high-end wearable audio products.

The Timeline

 2013 July – Project start.

 2013 Sep – First version of PCB layout.

 2013 Oct – First industrial design.

 2013 Dec – Second industrial design.

2014 Jan – Third industrial design with acoustic simulation done.

 2014 Feb – Forth version of PCB ready for engineering sample.

 2014 Mar – Alpha firmware ready.

 2014 Apr – Mechanical mock up made by 3D printing.

 2014 May – First Engineering Sample.

 2014 Jun – All pre-tests and interoperability test finished. Prepares for Indiegogo.


2014 Jul to Sep - Fundraising campaign at Indiegogo.com.

2014 Oct - Alpha pre-production.

2014 Nov - Beta pre-production, Bluetooth qualification, FCC, CE, C-Tick and other testing qualifications.

2014 Dec - First mass production run.

2014 Jan - First shipment for Indiegogo supporters.


The Indiegogo

Now we need help to make it forward. We need fund for the manufacturing, tooling, testing and etc. Let's make this happen. We hope to get it onto the market before end of this year.

1. Mechanical, there will be around 9 plastic parts in the project and the total cost is around 150k.

2. The factory setup cost is around 60k.

3. Bluetooth qualification test, Bluetooth listing fee, FCC , CE, C-Tick and other testing fee is around 25k.

4. Indiegogo and payal fee around 5%.

In case, if we can get funded more than 160% of our target, then we will create three special color schemes for Indiegogo supporters.


The Special Perk

We create a special Perk for Indiegogo supporter, a clear snap case for smartphone with CNC engraved: "MusicFreedom" icon and "Indiegogo supporter" wordings. Hope you will like it!
