Bluetooth tester, spectrum analyzer and audio analyzer are all prepared. The
Bluetooth qualification pre-tests are passed. The apps is under development and
will be ready after the first mass production run.
The next phase for this project will
be production, we plan to have the alpha pre-production run in October and first production
run in December.
If this project success, we will continuous to develop a
series of high-end wearable audio products.The Timeline
 2013 July – Project start.
 2013 Sep – First version of PCB layout. 2013 Oct – First industrial design. 2013 Dec – Second industrial design.2014 Jan – Third industrial design with acoustic simulation done. 2014 Feb – Forth version of PCB ready for engineering sample. 2014 Mar – Alpha firmware ready. 2014 Apr – Mechanical mock up made by 3D printing. 2014 May – First Engineering Sample.
 2014 Jun – All pre-tests and interoperability
test finished. Prepares for Indiegogo.2014 Jul to Sep - Fundraising campaign at Indiegogo.com.2014 Oct - Alpha pre-production.2014 Nov - Beta pre-production, Bluetooth qualification, FCC, CE, C-Tick and other testing qualifications.2014 Dec - First mass production run.2014 Jan - First shipment for Indiegogo supporters.The Indiegogo
Now we need help to make it forward.
We need fund for the manufacturing, tooling, testing and etc. Let's make this
happen. We hope to get it onto the market before end of this year.
1. Mechanical, there will be around 9
plastic parts in the project and the total cost is around 150k.
2. The factory setup cost is around
60k.
3. Bluetooth qualification test,
Bluetooth listing fee, FCC , CE, C-Tick and other testing fee is around 25k.
4. Indiegogo and payal fee around 5%.
In case, if we can get funded more than 160% of our target, then we will create three special color schemes for Indiegogo supporters.The Special Perk

We create a special Perk for Indiegogo supporter, a clear snap case for smartphone with CNC engraved: "MusicFreedom" icon and "Indiegogo supporter" wordings. Hope you will like it!

story:
Musicon is a new musical instrument for the education of children ages 3 and up. Learning coding and musical composition couldn't be easier. It’s super intuitive.

 

Kids experiment with Musicon and quickly understand how it works. What they create is what they hear!

 

 
 
 
 

 

 

 

 

 

You are in charge. Choose a tempo from slow lullabies to 144 beats per minute.

 

 

The rotating barrel has 720 buttons – which gives you endless possibilities. This very simple system was designed to be accessible for children ages 3 and up.

 

 

Watch, enjoy and learn! The learning process is very effective because of the simple mechanics and interactive nature of Musicon.

 

Wood was the obvious choice as the primary material for Musicon (more than 90%), because of its warmth, soft touch and eco-friendly properties. Wood also has a long tradition as a material for toys and musical instruments and our finely crafted wood is used, both natural and stained white. The buttons are shaped from, easy to clean, environmentally friendly plastic.

 

 

Two independent clutch systems (mechanical and electronic) constantly ensure safety. Inside of a Musicon there are controllers, a step motor and an optical sensor which ensure safety and the consistency of any composition.

 

 

Sound accuracy, harmony, and tempo result from the highly precise tools used to build Musicon. It is a fusion of traditional materials and the latest production technology.

 

 

The overall size, soft edges, and light pressure necessary to push the buttons have been carefully designed with a child’s ergonomics in mind.

   

How it works?

 
 

 

 

While having great fun, children develop varied skills. They learn group cooperation, learn how to compose music and they begin coding and learning math while experimenting with the unlimited mechanics of Musicon.

Digital = Analog

Get started by creating any shape you like! You can now listen to that shape. This way children can combine three basic senses – they can touch, they can see and they hear the composition!

Beethoven has never been that easy ;)

With Musicon children can draw, count and design with buttons and then listen! In this process kids can also count sounds. This is how kids develop their selective composition of sounds and intervals.

Musicon is a wonderful instrument that sounds like a complete band!  

It contains three moveable instruments, each held by magnets on an acoustic frame. The holding system is simple and enables the addition of other instruments, including brasses, strings, and other percussion instruments.  

The possibilities are endless and the instrument set will grow with new additions.

It can create the most complicated rhythms out of the 3 instrument set and has two sound qualities: soft and strong.

 

 

The sound frequency was determined by research into the development of children’s hearing growth and abilities.

 

 

A rotating rainstick teaches about music and mechanics. Because all the moving parts are visible, a child can see how this instrument works.

 

Musicon is just the right size for a single child to play or group interaction.

 

 

1. Tempo Lever (tempo varies from 36 to 144 beats per minute)

2. Magnetic frame for movable instruments

3. Carrying handles

4. Tempo indicator (available in Musicon PRO and VIP)

5. Multi-directional wheels 

 

 

Musicon is not just a device. It is an integrated learning system.

To get the best out of Musicon, we’ve been working with skilled teachers, therapists, music experts and hundreds of children.

Experts about Musicon:

"It looked very simple but we knew that it had so much of the knowledge inside the material. (...) When you leave a child with it their imagination is endless."
Deborah Rajendran
Lead teacher at Montessori School Casa de Bambini

"Whenever we bring Musicon to hospitals and show it to children, the hospital vanishes, and is replaced with a space of creativity and fun."
Katarzyna Nowakowska
Ronald McDonald House Charities

"The design is great. There is no risk of anything breaking off or of a finger getting squashed. It is both extremely safe and interesting."
Jacek Kwapisz 
Teacher at Laski Center for Blind and Visually Impaired

"When we play with Musicon we can only succeed. There is no risk of failing. Whatever we do, the effect is always interesting. This is very important for people with autism. They often experience failure because so many things pose a challenge. (...) Musicon may be a very useful therapeutic tool. It can assist in therapy of children of all ages and functionality levels."
Kornelia Krajowska-Kukiel
Therapist at Synapsis Foundation for Autistic Children 

"Musicon has this great quality for people on the autism spectrum. It gives a sense of control."
Joanna Burgiełł
Therapist at Synapsis Foundation for Autistic Children 

"Our listening is the main way that we humans experience the speech development. Musicon is such a great tool for speech therapy, it has the highest quality of the sound. It is crucial in developing of hearing for our children."
Iwona Milerska
Speech Therapist, SWPS University

Workshop with Musicon are always fun :)

Specialists who we work with, so far:

  • National Audiovisual Institute 
  • Independent Public Children’s Clinical Hospital of the Medical University of Warsaw 
  • The Frederic Chopin Institute Warsaw 
  • Synapsis Foundation for Autistic Children 
  • Laski Center for Blind and Visually Impaired 
  • Helenow Centre for rehabilitation, education and care of the society of the friends of children 
  • Casa de Bambini Montessori School Warsaw
  • SWPS University, department of Speech Therapy

With Musicon you receive scripted lessons and expert knowledge which were created as a result of collaborations with experts.

 

  • Control of errors – children can try variations and immediately self-correct without adult intervention.
  • Child-centered – kids just need to learn that buttons up = sounds. After this initial discovery the composing and fun start!
  • It's non-prescriptive – children have freedom to express their creativity.
  • It's inviting – the wood and bright colors instinctively invite the child to play with it and learn from it.
 
 
 
These are just some of the places we know that Musicon fits perfectly.
 

 

We have tested Musicon with children on the autism spectrum and children with various physical, social and cognitive disabilities. After many test workshops we are confident that Musicon has great potential as a therapeutic learning tool.

 

All the experts we’ve met, found Musicon to be a high quality, professional device which would support the therapeutic process and make the positive changes easier and fun.

 

 

 

“The Musicons” is a band that accompanies Musicon.

They were created as another way of interacting with children. Children are fascinated by puppets and will interact with them very easily.

The puppets help in the following ways:

  • overcoming shyness,
  • greater use of speech,
  • encouragement of focus and interplay,
  • encouragement of using the child’s imagination.

“The Musicons” can help children and adults enter the creative world of music and will assist  them through the processes of learning about music, coding and math.

More videos with The Musicons: www.musiconclub.com/theband

Each member of the band is also an avatar of kids' personalities:

  • Charlie, the Saxophone – the leader of the Musicons, who is very emotional and sensitive.
  • Ringo, the Drum – who is very energetic, fast and active.
  • Jaco, the Doublebass – who is very smart and intelligent and loves to count.

"The Musicons" were designed by our favorite creature designer Luiza Kwiatkowska :) Check how Luiza brought The Musicons to life: Behance

 

 

 

 

Musicon as a professional instrument :)

 

 
 

Kamil Laszuk developed Musicon as a graduation thesis in 2011 at the Academy of Art and Design, Wrocław, Poland. It’s development was based on research into the impact that music has on children‘s psychophysical development.  

While Kamil was visiting a kindergarten with his double bass he met a 2 1/2 year old deaf girl. To listen to his music Jagoda came closer and hugged the instrument. She was listening to the music with her whole body!

This was a huge inspiration for Kamil’s future design work on Musicon.

 

 Want to know more about Kamil's design? Visit: www.kamillaszuk.pl

 

Musicon has family musical roots – Ida, Kamil & Filip are siblings. All of them are musicians but they work in various fields, using the skills that music has taught them.

They have been always a great team. And they became avatars of "The Musicons" band.

 

Kamil’s parents sold their home to make possible creating Musicon.  

The bonds and support in the Laszuk family have always been very strong. When Kamil’s design was recognized all over the world his parents decided to help make his design come true. They sold the home and became the very first investors.

 

 

It was a long journey from the idea to the real product:

 

 

Kamil has gathered the best specialists in their fields and this team worked intensively on a prototyp. Finally, in 2016, after 18 months a fully functional prototype was created and finished.

 

 

 

Why crowdfunding?

We already have great support from our family, friends and partners but there is still a huge part missing – YOU! Your pledges to Kickstarter will allow us to begin production.

We could not think of anywhere better to bring Musicon to life. Kickstarter gives us an incredible opportunity to meet people who want to help make the world more beautiful, creative and sustainable. This platform is a confirmation that when you create something you love, everything is possible.

We can create a revolution in musical education, together.

 

 

Many thanks to our family and friends for helping us make Musicon real! Thanks to Fundacja Synapsis, Towarzystwo Opieki nad Ociemniałymi w Laskach, Ronald McDonald House Charities, Zabawki Pilch, The Eugeniusz Geppert Academy of Art and Design Wrocław, NInA, Muzykoteka Szkolna, Teatr Małego Widza, The Brain Embassy, Square Pixel, Casa dei Bambini, Fakturownia, Hello my Sunshine, Jolanta i Witold Laszuk, Paweł Pych, Dagmara Krzesińska, Andrzej Pilch, Piotr Borucki, Jacek Miśkiewicz, Rajmund Kietliński, Michał Błaszczyk, Luiza Kwiatkowska, Marta Usk, Agata Kujda, Włodzimierz Dolatowski, Katarzyna Nowakowska, Krzysztof Daniluk, Magdalena Piotrowska, Natalia Ćwik-Obrębowska, Hubert Radoszko, Szymon Paduszyński (Pół Tonu Głośniej), Piotr Porębski, Michał Górczyński, Ray Martin, Mariusz Chudy, Michael Evans, Łukasz Hałas, Aleksandra Szkopek (facebook advertisement), Artur Kurasiński, Przemysław Brańka, Melissa Kennedy, Grzegorz Kubera, Barbara Swolkień-Słok, Piotr Słok. Your help and support means the world to us!

 

 

Risks and challenges:

Manufacturing is a complex and demanding process. Things can go wrong, and there will be challenges, both big and small. Our pledge is that we will rise to meet each and every one of them, working day and night, doing everything in our power to deliver on our stated promises. 
Our estimates for delivery are conservative, and our partnerships are reliable and solid, but in the event of unexpected issues, we will keep you posted on our progress. We vow to work with determination to minimize any impact on the delivery date. 
We will treat every backer as if they are our family, and we promise you a quality product and an honest partnership experience. We hope you will choose to join us on this creative MUSICON journey.

story:
He was free to enjoy his music without blocking out nearby emergencies, audio commands, calls, or alarms.

The Zulu Speakers use a thin, lightweight magnet that goes under your apparel, as well as another magnet in the speaker that goes on the outside of your apparel. The two magnets hold the speakers securely in place on your clothing.

The Zulu Speakers are made to give you fully immersive stereo sound without disturbing those around you. The speakers sit on your shoulders to send sound directly to your ears.

Rain or shine, they’re ready to go where you go

 

We’ve spent two years working with designers, manufacturers, and engineers perfecting the Zulu Speakers for you. Now, we’re ready to take it to the next level.

With your pledge, we plan to invest in the production of more speakers beyond the small initial inventory we currently have. By increasing production, we’ll be able to offer the Zulu experience to everyone looking for a safer way to listen.
story_txt:
Patented magnet-to-speaker technology keeps the speakers attached to your shirt or jacket so you can enjoy music or talk on the phone anytime, anywhere, without shutting out the world around you... 
 
Traditional headphones are dangerous to use in situations where you have to remain aware of your surroundings. It is important to be able to hear incoming dangers, such as traffic, someone approaching from behind, or simply a bell or a warning. Headphones block out these ambient sounds, making you vulnerable and prone to risk.
Because the Zulu Speakers don’t cover or plug your ear, you won’t be cut off from surrounding sounds. Enjoy listening to your music and talking on the phone while being safely aware of your environment.
 

 
When headphones were prohibited on military bases for safety reasons, Ari Polivy, a U.S. Marine and avid runner, designed a magnet-to-speaker technology.He was free to enjoy his music without blocking out nearby emergencies, audio commands, calls, or alarms. 
The Zulu Speakers use a thin, lightweight magnet that goes under your apparel, as well as another magnet in the speaker that goes on the outside of your apparel. The two magnets hold the speakers securely in place on your clothing.
The magnetic feature on these speakers is strong enough that you can even go skydiving!
 
The Zulu Speakers are made to give you fully immersive stereo sound without disturbing those around you. The speakers sit on your shoulders to send sound directly to your ears. 
This means you don’t have to blast your speakers to hear clear sound, letting you enjoy your music without sharing it with everyone else. 
And because the speakers are positioned in a stereo setup and played in an open space, you get a unique immersive listening experience unlike any you’ve heard before.
You’ll feel like the music is right next to you and all around you at the same time. The natural sounds of the environment mix with your playlist, making you feel like you’re at an outdoor concert.
 
 
The Zulu Speakers are IPX4 rated which means they are rain and sweat resistant.Rain or shine, they’re ready to go where you go
The Zulu Speakers use Bluetooth 4.1, giving an impressive 30m wireless range. Connect any Bluetooth compatible device and play music, podcasts, videos, anything you want from it.
The Zulu Speakers are also equipped with a microphone so you can talk hands-free on the phone.
 
  
Who said you had to choose between listening to nature and listening to music? The Zulu Speakers let you listen to your music along with the all the sounds around you. Giving you a safer way to listen.
So whether it’s a morning run, a bike commute, or an outdoor yoga session, your Zulu speakers will give you incredible sound without compromising your safety or enjoyment of your surroundings.  
 

 
Jeff, the owner and founder of Zulu Audio, met Ari, the US Marine who invented the magnet-to-speaker technology. Jeff immediately saw the amazing benefits that this new invention could offer the public and worked with the Marine to bring the concept to reality. Fast forward two years and here we are today with a finished product ready to be delivered to our early supporters on Kickstarter who want to listen in safety and liberate their ears.We’ve spent two years working with designers, manufacturers, and engineers perfecting the Zulu Speakers for you. Now, we’re ready to take it to the next level.With your pledge, we plan to invest in the production of more speakers beyond the small initial inventory we currently have. By increasing production, we’ll be able to offer the Zulu experience to everyone looking for a safer way to listen.

story:
Music Drone

The world's first levitating self-charging Bluetooth speaker
  • It levitates!
  • It contains wireless charging!
  • Once it goes up in the air, it NEVER comes down!

We are VERY CLOSE to the final stage of making the Music Drone a reality:

  • Visually delightful, wonderful to listen to.
  • Beautiful decoration to your home.


Building Music Drone

Problems we needed to solve during the process:

  • We spent the last year trying to figure out how to make QI charging function in the Music Drone

We successfully put the wireless charging system that used to work on smartphones into our Music Drone. So it can keeps on playing FOREVER!
  • We design different types of looks and we finally goes with this current one because we believe its simply but beautiful design can fit in to nowadays modern lifestyle.


We need your help

  • Tell your friends or share our project to your family and friends!
  • If we don't reach our goal, we will not be able to bring the final version of Music Drone to everyone.
  • Now, we need your help to fund the last stages of production, tooling, raw materials and manufacturing
  • We need $8000 to meet the minimum requirement to start manufacturing.

  • As a reward for backing us early, we are offering some awesome deal on the Music Drone


Please support us

If you like our Music Drone:

  • Please share our campaign straight in Indiegogo, let your family and friends know.
  • We appreciate every bit of help!

Thanks from all of us here at Music Drone!

Special offer: Perk for Music Drone Dual will get FREE shipping worldwide!!


Legal Disclaimer

"Delivery of rewards/perks are subject to best efforts and not guaranteed."

story:
This innovative  Wireless Bluetooth 3.0 Selfie Handsfree Phone Speaker is compatible with various of Bluetooth-enabled electronic products. Features with advanced Bluetooth, it sends great interference-free performance, excellent data rate, high quality and efficiency. This Bluetooth Speaker comes with rechargeable lithium battery for long time standby and run. What's more, the built-in Microphone will allow you to make and receive Hands-free calls and listen to the other person loudly through the speaker. TF card enables to expand its storage and download all kinds of music whatever you wanna. In addition, it features Bluetooth remote control self timer function, more convenient for life. In a word, it is time for you to invite everybody to join you and share the beautiful sound together with you.

Main Features: 
● Creative selfie handsfree phone speaker, using Bluetooth 3.0 + EDR technology, long transmission distance up to 10 meters
● Enjoy hands-free phone calls and music in the car, making your driving or trip more elegant and safer
● Compatible with all Bluetooth enabled digital devices
● Built-in high capacity 300mAh rechargeable lithium battery, charging by computer or other DC 5V
● Conveniently charged via USB cable
● With FM radio function, listen to world affairs
● Enable directly playing MP3 files in TF / micro SD memory card 
● Hand sling design, ideal for carry

Specification

Primary Features


Design: Portable,Stylish,Fun,Multifunctional,Mini,Sport 
Compatible with: Tablet PC,MP4,MP3,PC,Mobile phone,iPod,iPhone,MP5,PSP,Laptop,TF/Micro SD Card 
Supports: FM,Bluetooth,Microphone,Hands-free Calls,Volume Control,TF Card Music Playing,Loudspeaker 
Functions: Stereo,Songs Track 
Connection: Wireless,Wired 
Interface: Micro USB,TF Card Slot 
Audio Source: TF/Micro SD Card,Bluetooth Enabled Devices 
Color: Black,White,Red,Blue,Purple 
Speaker Impedance: 3 ohm

Technical Parameters

Bluetooth Version: V3.0+EDR 
Transmission Distance: W/O obstacles 10m 
Power Output: 2W

Other Parameters

Power Source: USB,Battery 
Charging Voltage: DC 5V 
Battery Capacity: 300mAh 
Operating Range: 10m

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
A stylish & functional solution for listening to music without covering your ears

Wouldn’t it be nice to be able to listen to music while you’re running, skateboarding, golfing, walking the dog… and still be able to hear everything that’s going on around you? Well, now you can with our ELEV8TE and DV8 Series hats and visors.

Headphones and earbuds block out your surrounding making it unsafe and almost impossible to hear the environment around you. That’s why we created hats and visors with speakers in the brim, allowing your ears to be unobstructed.

 

 

 

 

ELEV8TE and DV8 Series hats and visors offer clear immersive music WITHOUT covering your ears. They have low profile, high quality speakers hidden in the brim, which are virtually undetectable and are driven by an external high powered mini-AMP.

  

 

***IMPORTANT FUNDING GOAL INFORMATION***

When we reach our goal of $25,000 but less than $40,000; you will only be able to order/get the ELEV8TE Series (Running Hat and Running Visor).

When we surpass $40,000, than we will unlock the Flex Fit and Trucker hat and you will be able order/get any of the four styles.

Remember, if we don't reach our goal then NO credit cards will be charged.

You are able to contribute more when you choose a perk. For example, if you choose perk #2 for $40 and you want to contribute more you can change the amount.

*********************************************************

Everyone loves to be out and about; hiking, biking, gardening or just chillin’ on the beach… and many people listen to music during these activities because it provides motivation, entertainment and energy. Earbuds and headphones are obtrusive and annoying when you’re playing hard. Our hats and visors sit comfortably away from your ears, they won’t fall out like earbuds, or annoy you with bouncing around your face. The ELEV8TE and DV8 caps are safer than traditional headphones and earbuds because nothing is covering your ears allowing you to hear your surroundings. It’s not just more comfortable it’s safer for your ears – Studies now link hearing loss to headphones and earbud use. With our caps you will be able to hear traffic, animals, car horns, sirens, other people… and be much safer.

 

 

Why we need your support

We need your support to help us pay for the upfront tooling cost of the AMP and the upfront tooling cost for the hat/visor assembly. Also, your support will help get the first mass production run of hats and AMPs. In total, we need over $45k for this to moving forward. We are asking for about half of this here, and the remaining will come from our own investing.

By pledging now you are getting these at 10%-20% off retail!

By pre-ordering here you will be getting these hats and visors for about 10-20% off retail price and you will be the very first to receive them before they go to retail stores. Also, you will be helping us bring an amazing and much needed product to the market. You will be helping RESON8TE establish it's self so we can bring other incredible products we have been working on to market in the near future.  

Remember, if we don't reach our goal, you won't be charged and unfortunately the project won't move forward. So PLEASE help us out and pledge today, so you can be one of the first to have this product.

 

Where we are in the process of this project

Expected delivery to YOU is April 2013

Our designs are finalized.

Hats/visors

  • We have production intent prototypes - All the hats and visors shown in the video and images above are working prototypes and finalized designs.
  • We have been working with United Import Trading Corp. who is a trusted sourcing agent. The designs, materials and styles of the hats/visors are completed and documented. We’ve finalized assembly plan, Quality Control procedures, and production details with the manufacturers.

AMP

  • We have been working with the factory in Gauangzhou and gone over all production details for the AMP. The AMP in the video and the AMP images are production intent prototypes. We are still fine tuning the AMP design, trying to make it smaller, but other than that it is final.

 

Product details

ELEV8TE Running Hat

  • Water resistant - Can be hand washed (not meant to be fully submerged in water)
  • Made with Polyester fabric pulling moisture away from your skin and fast drying
  • Adjustable velcro strap in the back for a one size fits all
  • Reflective logo on the front for safer evening activities
  • Lightweight
 
 

ELEV8TE Running Visor

  • Water resistant - Can be hand washed (not meant to be fully submerged in water)
  • Made with Taslan Nylon fabric which is fully breathable and fast drying
  • Adjustable velcro strap in the back for a one size fits all
  • Reflective logo on the front for safer evening activities
  • Lightweight
 
 

DV8 Flex Fit Hat

  • Water resistant - Can be hand washed (not meant to be fully submerged in water)
  • For the initial product run this hat will be a L-XL fit
  • Made with Ripstop Cotton - very durable
  • Closed back for the fitted hat look
 
 

DV8 Trucker Hat

  • Water resistant - Can be hand washed (not meant to be fully submerged in water)
  • Adjustable snap strap for a one size fits all
  • Traditional 6 panel - Front 2 panels are cotton twill, 4 panel mesh back
 
 

AMP Mini Amplifier

  • Battery last about 4-6 hours
  • Dimensions - 64mm high x 36mm wide x 9mm thick
  • Standard USB charging (charger and cord NOT included)
  • Power on/off switch
 

 

Connectors

  • Connectors on hats/visors - 3.5mm TRRS male connector
  • Connectors on AMP - 0.3m input with 3.5mm stereo male connector to plug into standard headphone jack. 1.3m output with 3.5mm TRRS female to connect to hat

Who we are?

RESON8TE is a Park City, Utah based company, developing lifestyle products and hi-tech sports gear. Founder John Minahan partnered with Swarm to develop ELEV8TE and DV8 caps. Together they spent two years developing, testing, and refining this revolutionary product. This idea came to John while he was on the golf course; he got stuck behind a slow group, and was bored, so he played music on his iPhone and stuffed it under the sweat band of his hat. Voilà! Hats with speakers in the brim were conceived.

Swarm is product design consultancy located in Salt Lake City, Ut that designs cool products for interesting clients. They work with big and small clients alike to help bring great ideas to life. With experience in design, engineering, sourcing, branding, and product launches, Swarm knows how to make great products a reality. With their specialized experience in audio design, and their love for outdoor sports and music, Swarm was super excited to partner with RESON8TE on this project.

 

Thank you very much! Please pass this along to other people that might benefit from our hats and visors.

 

FAQ

What style(s) can I choose when I pledge/support?

When we reach our goal of $25,000 but less than $40,000; you will only be able to order/get the ELEV8TE Series (Running Hat and Running Visor).

When we surpass $40,000, than we will unlock the Flex Fit and Trucker hat and you will be able order/get any of the four styles.

When will I receive my product?

We are currently scheduled to receive them from the manufacture in March 2013, we will then ship them to you in April 2013.

What color options do I have?

Right now we are only offering the colors that are shown above.

  • Running Hat - White
  • Running Visor - Black
  • Flex Fit Hat - Black
  • Trucker Hat - Black

What sizes are available?

The Running Hat, Running Visor and Trucker Hats are "one size fits all". They have adjustable straps on the back.

Flex Fit Hat will be a Large/X-Large.

Are they waterproof?

All are water resistant. I would not submerge them under water but a hand wash is great, rain is no problem and sweat is encouraged (no problem).

Is there anything I can't/shouldn't do with these?

DO NOT BEND or FLEX the brim too much. There are speakers in the brim and flexing or bending will damage the speaker. DO NOT SUBMERGE UNDER WATER.

story:
Keymao is a new style of wireless Bluetooth headset that has been designed so that you’ll forget you’re wearing them. Keymao is essential to any activity you can imagine during every day life. 

Recall some common problems you’ve experienced with modern commercial headphones.

  • Do you struggle to fit bulky headphones in your backpack? 
  • Does your TWS headset get lost often because it’s too small?
  • Are you still bound by wired headphones?

 

Keymao’s design will reward you with a sense of freedom while still delivering superior sound quality. Combine Keymao with many different accessories and sports equipment ensuring that Keymao becomes an essential part of all daily and fitness focused activities. 

 

What do the Professionals think about keymao?

 

Larry Dickerson/5031 Media review:

In this review, Larry Dickerson from 5031 Media takes an in-depth look at the Keymao Magnetic Headphones and finds they’re not only “extremely easy to use” but also “sound amazing”.

 

Retro Core Review:

This unboxing review by Retro Core takes an in-depth look at Keymao’s Magnetic Headphones, a unique take on over ear headphones. Featuring Magnetic clasps the headphones can firmly attach to any headwear making them perfect for “going out jogging, or at the gym”.

With Keymao you are guaranteed the highest level of comfort possible. In order to avoid the inconvenience of bulky, wired headphones, and the discomfort of continued use of typical headphones altogether, Keymao is designed with a 5mm and clip-on magnetic functionality. 

Keymao's unique magnetic structure allows it to be attached to any material and held firmly

You don't have to worry about the headphones falling off even during the most intense workout.

It only takes a second to attach Keymao to your clothes or backpack making them easy to bring with you anywhere.

Free from the bulkiness that comes with other conventional headsets. Keymao is prepared to meet your every need.

The latest Bluetooth 5.0 technology and advanced acoustic components ensure brilliant sound quality with deep bass and crystal-clear treble.

The Keymo focuses on performance in the mid-high frequency range, especially the mid-range. The speaker has a good level of detail, and its semi-open cavity structure produces an impressively wide range of sound.

At the same time, sufficient package feeling can reduce noise, allowing you to abandon the noise of the outside world and immerse music.

The addition of Bluetooth 5.0 technology has significantly improved performance, effectively preventing various WIFI, Bluetooth and other signal interference. This ensures your music stream goes uninterrupted, so you can enjoy your music comfortably.

Keymao has a transfer rate of 2MB and audio latency less than 0.1s, providing remarkable sound delivery with no delay in gaming audio or music.

Keymao allows you to control your music without ever having to use your phone. 

Click to switch to from previous/next

Click pause/play

 

Click to connect to call / call SIRI /call Cortana /call Google

After you have paired Keymao for the first time, it will automatically connect to your device by simply turning it on.

The right ear is dividable from the left ear.

They can also connect to different devices to share music with your friends.

Keymao has a strong water-resistant performance that reaches IPX5.

IPX5 takes care of daily life waterproofing and sweat from activities; you can wear it in the rain or even when you take a bath.

 

Keymao's battery life is so long you may forget you need to charge it.

A single charge can provide up to 8 hours of continuous use.

The Keymao magic headwear is being manufactured in Keymao’s very own home of Shenzhen. Shenzhen has one of the world’s largest tech markets giving Keymao the opportunity to work with some of the highest skilled laborers. Consumer trust is very important and therefore we want our production process to be transparent for all of our supporters. 

 

Keymao’s team is currently based out of Shenzhen, residing in one of the world’s largest thriving tech markets. Despite the small size of their team, it has had seemingly no impact on their relentless ability to drive and deliver quality products for their consumers. Their core belief is that even the smallest innovations can lead to profound changes in our daily lives. It is with this belief that over the course of 700 days the Magnetic Headwear was created. Leading with the Magnetic Headwear as its forerunner, Keymao seamlessly integrates wearable tech into any active lifestyle.

story:
There is a calling from all music enthusiasts and creators to pair sight with sound. Viz is a powerful tool that makes this happen. Viz reveals the depth, nuance, and expression of the music by uniquely fusing visual creation with music production, allowing the music to reach its full potential.

Throughout the past year we have shown Viz to hundreds of people at clubs, parties, and art shows- and we have seen first hand how the use of audio-synchronization, performance, and virtual reality (VR) increase the intensity of sonic captivation. We want to share this experience with everyone, and this is why we made Viz.

We built Viz to be powerful, flexible, fast, and performable with features that suit the needs of the next generation media artist. We have designed a very compact and intuitive user interface that allows you to tightly control how the music impacts the visuals. You can easily monitor features of the music and tweak parameters on the fly, creating visuals that perfectly complement the soundscape. 

Much of our in-the-field research was spent determining what musical qualities are the most salient to visualizing sound. The result is that Viz actually looks deeper into the music than other visualization software available. Most applications are limited to simply using audio amplitude to animate graphics. This is where we start.

Viz extracts a highly refined control set of audio metrics from the music, beginning with amplitude then pitch tracking, noise, and brightness. In addition, we split the signal into its low, middle, and high frequency bands, allowing you to target specific instruments.

We dig into the pulse of the music, detecting the beat and listening for hits on the kick and snare. Each of these audio features is expertly extracted and utilized to animate graphics in Viz. It sounds complicated but using the simplified ensemble of audio controls allows visual animations to organically fuse with the flow of the music right out of the box.

Most audio visualization software is used in high end settings by professionals. It is expensive, heavy, and difficult to work with. We designed Viz to be as light and as flexible as possible. Most importantly, Viz enables distributed computing via the open sound control protocol (OSC). This is very powerful, as it releases Viz from the confines of a standard single controller/projector design.

Viz can easily be configured to broadcast to multiple projectors in various locations, or set up to interact with other tools- for instance interactive lighting, mobile devices, or even game engines!

Viz is perfect for the EDM scene, as visualizations can be either performed live or tightly choreographed to suit the music and energy of the crowd. We have been using Viz at clubs, parties, and art shows in Southern California, where the intensity in the venue reaches new levels as people party and dance to animations from Viz. 

Draw your audience even further into the music like never before through virtual reality. Because of the distributed design, you can run Viz in the Oculus Rift while simultaneously projecting it to the audience.  Create synergy between the virtual world and the club world, as you invite audience members to be fully immersed into a virtual landscape of color and sound.

Switching between flat and stereoscopic projection is as easy as hitting a button. You can also choose whether or not to synchronize the position and orientation of your virtual world between instances of Viz. This means that you can have someone in a VR headset looking around and the rest of the audience will see through their eyes as their point of view changes! This creates a uniquely intimate and interactive artistic experience. 

Viz operates as a standalone application. However, unlike any other visualization software it is also available in VST, Audio Units, and AAX formats, so it can be quickly dropped into practically any DAW. This is immensely powerful because with Viz in your DAW, you can now seamlessly fuse your sonic and visual creation. Each of Viz's step sequencers are tempo-synced to the plug-in host, and automation is supported so that you can build complex scenes. 

As you work on your audio tracks or DJ set, you can simultaneously create and refine the accompanying visuals. In turn, your visualizations give you feedback on the details of the audio. This audio/visual interplay allows for synchronization like never before.

Viz is built with performance and improvisation in mind, which is why we decided to include a live coding interface. This allows you to see and edit shader code in real-time, actually updating elements within the visualization.

We have included helpful features such as parameter highlighting and built-in uniforms so you can quickly and easily see what is going on and build complex geometries in a matter of minutes. The code editor lets you know if and where your code won’t compile, so you can always know what is going on while in front of the audience or when experimenting at home. 

For non-programmers, Viz is a perfect way to begin experimenting with code in a friendly environment since you can simply tweak and modify a library of example preset shaders that come with the software. While working with Viz shaders you will actually learn the same OpenGL code that powers many apps, games, and works of art. 

We want Viz to be used by a wide range of users, not just the professional VJ. We want the amateur artist/musician using Viz to create visuals for their music, so they can share it on YouTube. We want the low budget DJ using Viz for small venues like parties or weddings. We want the indie game developer using it to more closely tie music with gameplay, or the next gen coding media artist creating VR music videos!

The Viz community will be an online hub where users can create and share their work with other artists. You will be able to upload presets and visual content that others can use in shows or modify to make their own. Other purely visual applications, such as ShaderToy and Open Processing, have developed entire networks of active users. We plan to achieve this with Viz, especially since Viz is built for performances and events and is therefore inherently social.

We have developed a quick way to export shader parameters, code, and image/video content, so exporting and importing data is already a breeze. However, we do need funding to build the web portal that will enable this process. We know that such a community of collaboration and visual experimentation will help to push the boundaries of audio visualization in general.  

We already have a solid functional prototype of Viz, and we are very close to having a releasable version available for everyone. We have a strong vision for Viz, as we sincerely want everyone to experience the fun people have with it. We need help to raise awareness, and to build an online community for sharing user-generated content. In addition, we want to ensure Viz runs solid on all intended platforms. Thus we need some help adding support for the latest generation of VR headsets and help to ensure Viz is stable on both Mac and Windows operating systems. Finally, we want to put Viz in the hands of some talented artists to help us create inspiring content for our users to play with.

We know that Viz will make a huge impact in the world of audio-reactive art. It will help push the boundary of what is commonly used in terms of audio analysis which will create more interesting and tight couplings between sight and sound. It will also encourage the use of virtual reality and distributed computing in contemporary VJ practice. Most importantly, it will open up graphical creation and programming to an entire segment of the creative population that has previously been unable to create these types of works due to difficulty or cost of the software involved.

We are both media-artists, musicians, and composers with a long history of hacking things together and making experimental instruments and art. We have years of experience building commercial multimedia software that is used by thousands of consumers on a daily basis and have developed products for top companies in the industry such as Apogee Digital, Slate Media Technology, Zya, Sonimmersion, and Unfiltered Audio.

story:
There are currently over 6.500.000 people around the world who are deaf, and only 500.000 of them have had the financial possibility to proceed with a cochlear implant, which can cost anywhere between $50.000 and $150.000. 
With Audio-Feel these people can have the possibility to feel the sound and voices around them at a cost between $300 and $700. 

If 0.1% of people who can not hear buy this product in the devloped world and later 0.1% in the rest of the world, we will have made 6.500 peoples lives better!  Our goal is much higher!

Let's give them a chance by contributing to this project! 

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

I have called this project Audio-Feel, because it does what it says. It gives someone the possibility to feel sounds.  This is achieved by using a Tactile Vocoder.

The images shown are from a sample unit we designed and built as close to the final autonomous AudioFeel system as possible. 


Check out our Great Referral Program down the page!!!The idea of Audio-Feel came to us when a friend of ours lost his hearing from a viral infection, and after doing some research found that no commercial device has ever been produced which transforms speech to feel.  The only products available for the hearing impaired are hearing aids, and cochlear implants. In the first case, if someone is completely deaf, it does not work, and in the second case, it only works if the inner ear still functions. In other words someone who is born deaf, or has serious damage to his inner ear can not be helped.

A lot of research has been done on the transformation of sound to touch with great results and proof that such a system would work.  Actually, in the research published by P. L. Brooks and B. J. Frost, "Evaluation of a tactile vocoder for word recognition", after practicing for close to 55 hours, a person could clearly identify 150 words from the feel of a Tactile Vocoder.  

Please feel free to visit our site www.audiofeel.info for any further information or details.The concept of Audio-Feel is quite simple. The ear transforms sound into nerve stimulating pulses, which end up as neuron data in the brain. Why not create the same kind of nerve stimulating pulses through the skin, so that the brain can feel the sound through the skin, (according to research done by Martin Schurmann "Touch activates human auditory cortex").
Of course the ear creates a full spectrum range sound sensation while our system will only respond to 100 frequencies from the human speech sound spectrum. The frequency range of human speech covers from 200 Hz to 3500 Hz and vowels have most of their energy lower than 1000 Hz.  

From the research it has been shown that with the stimuli from less than 100 frequency’s at different intensities, someone who cannot hear, and practices a bit, will be able to understand someone who is talking to them, listen to music, and hear surrounding noises while at home or in the street, who otherwise would never have the opportunity to hear.  The main emphasis will be concentrated on frequencies between 200Hz and 3500Hz as to be able to cover speech as much as possible, as we believe communication is the most important aspect of being able to hear.The Audio-Feel technology is quite straight forward. We have designed two systems:

The first system will connect to a Smartphone through Bluetooth, and using the AudioFeel App, will send surrounding sounds, or phone conversation to a pin array.

The second system will be an Autonomous System, which will not need a Smartphone to work. A microphone will transfer the sound to a Tactile Vocoder.

In both cases the sound will be broken down into 100 different frequencies between 200Hz and 3500Hz, and each of these frequencies will be transferred to an array of 100 pins, one cm apart from each other. Each pin will vibrate when its particular frequency is sounded, and will vibrate more or less depending on the intensity of the sound, (you can imagine that it would look like a graphic equalizer, only the LED from the graphic equalizer are pins vibrating on your skin). This array can be strapped onto the skin, on the wrist (like a watch), or around the abdomen area, and with a little training, someone can learn what each sound feels like and means (it will actually be like learning a new language). Eventually the person using it will be able to repeat sounds and (feel) listen to themselves knowing the sounds they are making are correct. 

                                            

We have developed a first test prototype of a single line array which vibrates from 7 different frequencies, and now we want to develop the final system which will vibrate 100 actuators at different frequencies and intensities. We will be developing our own vibrating pin array with actuators, circuitry for the Tactile Vocoder, and App for most smart phones.

We estimate that we will have the first fully functioning prototypes ready in the middle of 2015.

This what will happen to the Funds that are raised with your help:

  • Materials and Designs.
  • Hardware design.
  • Hardware manufacturing.
  • Funding for materials cost.
  • Assembly.
  • Platform integration and support.
  • Casing and packaging.
  • App development.

After funding is complete, we will immediately invest the money to the above expenses. Detailed updates will be sent on completion of each stage, keeping all of you supporters up to date.The World Federation of the Deaf, who has 7 million members, estimates there are 6,5 million people world wide the are completely deaf.  Lets give these people a chance to, if not to hear sound and music, at least feel it!!!We are campaigning with Fixed Funding to inspire trust, as we can only complete the project if it is fully funded, so if you fund us, or help us get funded, you will be part of the community that will give people who can't hear, the possibility to feel sound, which i am quite sure will be quite amazing!!!  If we do not reach our goal of 130.000 Euro you will be fully refunded.

Even if you can't contribute a $1 or more yourself, but find the concept and idea interesting, please feel free to let others know that we are working on the Audio-Feel project, as we believe your contribution will help make many people around the world extremely happy!!! You can use the indiegogo share tools (just bellow the video at the top of the page) to let your friends know about the project!!!Join us and be part of it.We really want to hit 130.000 Euro so we can make this project come true, so from now and until April 28th, 2014, if you refer three people who buy an Audio-Feel*, we will give you an Audio-Feel device for free. 

Also, any referrals you bring us with contributions of 100 Euros, you will get a free black T-shirt, and;
Any referrals you bring us with contributions over 3.000 Euros, you will get a 7-days vacation, on the beautiful island of Santorini, Greece, all included, from anywhere in the world!!!   Take that to 5.000 Euros, and you will get the same vacation for two!

Please note: you must use your personal Indiegogo referral link (shown just below the video on the campaign page).

All referrals to date count so help us knock this out of the park!

* Your stats will show 3 contributions with a contribution total of $3.000 or more.

The Audio-Feel team decided to work together with one common goal, to make a product which will help people who have lost their hearing, or have never heard in their life, be able to feel sound, and listen to their own voice!

The team consists of 5 people, and we estimate will grow in number to eight people once we get funding for the project.

The five current members of the team are:

Markos Garras, Founder and CEO of Audio-Feel.  He is a practical physicist with a MSc in Hydro acoustics. That might sound complicated, but it is actually quite simple. Sound in liquids. He has developed many projects up to date, mainly in the field of underwater archaeology Hellenic Institute of Marine Archaeology, alternative fuels OilConvert, airport lighting, and container positioning systems, but now would like to spend some time on a project he has wanted to evolve for many years. He has called this project Audio-Feel, because it does what it says. It gives someone the possibility to feel sounds.

Foteini Vlachaki, an Architect with experience in 3D design, perfect for designing the Audio-Feel device.

Farzin Raissi, an Investor Consultant helping put the project together.

Alexis Kakouris, a mechanical engineer with experience in construction and design of high technology equipment.

Athanassios Protopapas, Professor and Voice Specialist.

Alexis Garras, a Biochemist with experience in Human Interaction in the Pharmaceutical industry.

story:
Car Playlist

My name is Nikolay Pelov and I'm the CEO of NickSoft Solutions. I was frustrated that I can't sort the songs in my car audio. I decided to make a software that physically organizes the order of files in the filesystem.

How do you play music on your car audio player? You copy it in a USB flash drive, you plug it in and you listen to the songs in the order they are copied. If you get tired of the order you press random. What if you want to add new really cool songs that you want to listen. They get at the end of the list and you never get to listen them. With CarPlaylist you can move the songs to the front of the list and sort them the way you want.

 

What We Need & What You Get

The program is almost ready and beta version is released. It will work just fine as it is, but I want to add new features. The funds that we get from this campaign will decide the time we will spend in developing new features.

You have the chance to buy the program at discount price by choosing some of the perks on the right. There is a limited amount of perks that will give you access to the beta version immediately - no waiting for campaign to finish.

Planned new features

  • Sort or randomize selection or folder
  • Prefix all file names with a incremental number for players that play files in alphabetical order
  • ID3 tag editing for MP3
  • We will consider feature requests from supporters.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

The program is quite stable as it is, but as people use it some bugs may be discovered. We will do our best to fix the bugs. The time spent on fixing bugs and adding new features will depend on the funds collected in this campaign. If there are not enough funds it may take more time to fix bugs.

We have ideas of a lot of new features, but we are not sure that they are all possible. One of them is adding one file to multiple directories (playlists) without taking more space. Windows will not be happy about that and may want to "fix" the filesystem.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute to the campaign you can help us by spreading the word - share the campaign in facebook, twitter and other social media or link/embed the campaign in your web site. We appreciate it!
story_txt:
Car Playlist
My name is Nikolay Pelov and I'm the CEO of NickSoft Solutions. I was frustrated that I can't sort the songs in my car audio. I decided to make a software that physically organizes the order of files in the filesystem.
How do you play music on your car audio player? You copy it in a USB flash drive, you plug it in and you listen to the songs in the order they are copied. If you get tired of the order you press random. What if you want to add new really cool songs that you want to listen. They get at the end of the list and you never get to listen them. With CarPlaylist you can move the songs to the front of the list and sort them the way you want.
 

What We Need & What You Get
The program is almost ready and beta version is released. It will work just fine as it is, but I want to add new features. The funds that we get from this campaign will decide the time we will spend in developing new features.
You have the chance to buy the program at discount price by choosing some of the perks on the right. There is a limited amount of perks that will give you access to the beta version immediately - no waiting for campaign to finish.

Sort or randomize selection or folder
Prefix all file names with a incremental number for players that play files in alphabetical order
ID3 tag editing for MP3
We will consider feature requests from supporters.


The Impact

Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
Why SpacePods?

Our team wanted to bring headphones to the market that provided a luxury wireless sound, at a fraction of the price. We got frustrated paying hundreds of dollars for name brand wireless headphones knowing that they cost a fraction of the price to make. We spent the past year working and building relationships with leading headphone manufacturers, to bring high quality, affordable headphones, without the hassle of the wires. 

 

With SpacePods, what am I getting?

  • The smallest and most portable headphones that you can conveniently take absolutely anywhere
  • A completely wireless high quality sound without the hassle of the wires.
  • A superb sound experience at less than a third of the cost of our competitors. 

A completely wireless experience

 

The most portable headphones on the planet!

So comfortable, you'll forget you're wearing them...

Charge them on the go in under an hour...

Use these headphones all day with the on the go portable charging case. The charging case can charge your headphones up to 4 times on a single charge.

Simple USB charging:

 

SpacePods Specifications:

Case Charge time: 1.5 hours using provided usb cable. Provides up to 12 hours of total use for single SpacePods Charge Time: 1 hours

Material: Premium ABS SpacePods:

Single SpacePods Battery: Up to 6 hours of use Paired SpacePods Battery: Up to 3 hours of use Material: Premium ABS and silicone Standby Time:120 hours How do I charge the charging case?

Bluetooth Version: 4.2
 Frequency: 2.4GHz
 Wireless range: above 10m
 Receive sensitivity: -90dBm
 Battery capacity: 65mAh
 Work time: 5-6 hours(single), 2-3 hours(paired)
 Stand-by time:120 hours
 Charging time: 1 hours
 Supports A2DP1.2/HFP1.6/HSP1.2/AVRCP1.4/DI1.3
 Advanced CVC6.0 active noise-cancellation
 Built-in superior HD microphone, provide clear and loud sound
 Charging Pod / Power bank Capacity: 260mAh

What comes with the package?

  1. The most portable on the go charging pod
  2. Two SpacePods headphones
  3. Charging pod charging cable

 

SpacePods are also backed with a warranty.

We are so confident with the quality and durability of our headphones, that if something were to happen within the first 2 years, we hope you will send it back to us.  

Warranty does not cover:  

The life of the battery 

Wear and tear and aging (e.g. scratched crystal; alteration of the color and/or material of non metallic straps and chains, such as leather, textile, rubber; peeling of the plating) 

Any damage on any part of the watch resulting from abnormal/abusive use, lack of care, negligence, accidents (knocks dents, crushing, etc.) 

Where are SpacePods headed after successful funding?

We want to develop a strong and trust branded in the technology space. This is the first step. We want to continue providing and releasing high quality products at an affordable price. So join with us on this journey and be apart of it every step of the way.  We will send out several updates throughout the entire process making sure our backers are up-to-date on any important information.  We want to create a bond with our backers, because ultimately you are the ones turning our dream into a reality.  

Test Customer Reviews:

"The sound is ridiculous! These better than my $200 headphones!"

"I used them for my workout. They're absolutely amazing. Without the wires, I can lift weights without a problem"

"I can't believe how small they are! The sound is incredible! My girlfriend will love these!"

Where can I use them?

  • Running
  • Cycling
  • Golfing
  • Weight Lifting
  • Studying
  • Office
  • Lounging
  • And much much more....

We Need Your Support!

In order to turn this dream of ours into a reality, we need your support. Not only does this mean pledging for one of our awesome SpacePods, but sharing the story with a friend. The important thing to remember with IndieGogo is, if we don't reach our full funding goal....we get nothing. 

We are going to do everything we can to spread the word in a variety of ways.  We hope through the use of social media and blogs we can drive enough outside traffic to our page which will result in us reaching our funding goal.  If you could do something as simple as tweeting about our page, or just liking our Facebook page, it can really go a long way. Simply click the Facebook and Twitter tabs at the top ^ of the page, right below the video.

If funded, how will you fulfill the orders?

Our manufactures have the product ready to ship. We just need your help in mass producing and bringing these amazing headphones to the market. Once Indiegogo releases the funds, we can pay the initial deposit to begin production.  Production time takes roughly 3-4 weeks depending on the total units.  Our team will then ship the orders to our awesome backers! We just had another successful campaign and we're fully familiar with the fulfillment process. This will be a smooth transition and our backers can start using their SpacePods as soon as possible!

story:
Short Summary

Sample Libraries are produced by big companies with huge orchestras, making an enormous sound. That's good, but... But what if a group of composers, producers, engineers and scripters made a boutique sample library that focuses not on the size of the sound, but on the details and liveliness of the samples and on having the best resources in the world involved in terms of Studios, Musicians  in recording a ultra-authentic, realistic, sample library?

You would get 1930's Strings.

Boutique, high quality, affordable and crowdfunded, Samples. No corners cut, no high profit margins. Just a community coming together to fund amazing sample work.

 

Listen to a Demo song made with 1930's Strings

 

Why you need 1930's Strings 

 

Download 1930's Strings prototype here

 

What We Need & What You Get

Our goal is to raise €30,000 in order to fund the completion of 1930's Strings which includes recording sessions, sample editing and scripting.

  • We are expecting to leave an impression on the Sample Library market with our first product 1930's our first product.
  • We are not expecting to make a profit on 1930's Strings.
  • We will not be recording at Abbey Road Studios.
  • If we don't hit our goal we will still produce 1930's Strings on schedule and will be recording in London. If we receive less funds than our goal we will still be recording 1930's strings, but we may record only the essential articulations like legato and staccato and we may use Angel Studios.

The Impact

1930's Strings is filling a gap in the market. There's a big need for a high quality sample library that focuses on vintage sounds and on smaller and authentic sounding groups, instead of huge orchestral masses.

  • We love the big sample brands and we want we just want to add more options to the sample library market. A uniquely branded sound. Vintage, recorded with the best with attention to details.
  • By supporting us you'll be able to participate in the making of 1930's strings if you like, by letting us know exactly what you want the sound to be like. So this is your sample library.
  • And because it's not a big company making it, we're able to make it much more affordable and still very high quality because we're not focusing on profit.

 

Risks & Challenges

The risks involved in this campaign are only 2 and we have mitigated both of them to near zero by recording and scripting our prototype. We know exactly what we will encounter, no surprises.

Risk 1 - Being able to record the Samples with the quality we promise and deliver a good product.

We went to the studio with the best musicians in London and recorded a prototype in a session that lasted around 30 minutes. We were rushing a bit and weren't able to get to fine details as you may imagine, but it was enough to understand how we get the sound we want. We think we did a pretty good job on our prototype run, but we also learned what we can improve, so we will be making a killer Sample Library. R&D at work!

Risk 2 - Controlling costs during the execution of the project so we can actually finish.

Our prototype run was also meant to mitigate this risk. We wanted to know exactly how many samples we would be able to record per hour of recording session and how to organize the recording and scores themselves in order to get the best results. We think we did well here too, but we already streamlined the way we write the samples down on the parts in order to both get an even better sound for editing and also to get a more efficient recording session.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute with money it's ok! Help us by sharing this page with friends! :)

story:
The first portable, smart speaker with extremely high-quality speakers and built-in subwoofers, ensuring maximum fidelity sound, and voice recognition for future-minded interfacing.

Our speaker cones are developed by engineers who have helped develop some of the best speakers in the world.

Aivia’s voice-recognition and activation abilities allow you to search and play any song with just the sound of your voice. Just say the words and Aivia can play the song you want to hear by instantly searching all your music apps.

 

Google Home and Amazon Echo are handy home assistants, but their music quality leaves a lot to be desired.

With Aivia, you’ve got the best of both worlds, a smart and high-quality sound experience that will change the way you listen to music forever.

 

We didn’t just want to make another speaker. We wanted to make the future of speakers. We knew it wouldn’t be easy. So we spent the last 2 years getting it right.

 

 

Two side speakers and a large dedicated subwoofer come together to create the high quality Aivia sound you crave.

You get 35 watts in a neat little package.

Just check out this fidelity graphs. You can almost hear the bass.

 

Aivia works with voice control and searches ALL your music from any enabled app or from the internal storage to find exactly the song you’re looking for. No restrictions. You don’t even have to lift a finger. Just ask.

Play your favorite playlists from your favorite music streaming apps. As long as it’s Google Now enabled, it’ll activate.

Aivia can also store music and apps on its own storage drive. So play even when you don’t have wifi or your phone nearby. No phone pairing needed.

 

 

Aivia has built-in touchscreen technology that works just like your favorite tablet. Watch your favorite music videos or pull up recipes while you cook.

You can also download and use most android apps.

 

 

For those who like the spotlight, Aivia has an 8-megapixel front-facing camera, perfect for video chatting, home security, or both.

 

We made the top of Aivia into a wireless charging station for your mobile devices. No more running out of juice or searching for an outlet.

 

 

 

When your party takes you somewhere new, feel free to take Aivia along with you.

 

Plus, it’s got sticky pads to keep it in place and scratch resistant coating, so it’s good on the go. 

 

 

 

 

We designed Aivia because the world needs it. And now we need your help to get it out there, so we can bring high quality music to homes all over the world. Good sound can work wonders.

 

 

We’re sound and tech enthusiasts like you. We started by doing visual effects in Hollywood, but wanted to go farther. We got a bunch of help and started making future tech that was more than just CGI.

We are dedicated to becoming the masters of premium portable entertainment. Aivia is just the first step in our plan. We’re trendsetters by nature. We’ve seen what’s out there and have a drive to make it better, whatever it takes.

We want to make innovative new tech for the things you do every day, like listen to music for instance.

story:
iBoxm-Bluetooth Hi-Fi Audio Receiver

You may have a favorite multimedia speaker or a hi-fi audio system already in your home. You do not want to compromise to buy a Bluetooth speaker with small audio output power or lousy audio quality. 

But you cannot fight the temptation of listening music without wire hassle and controlling the music from your smartphone, tablet, and computer by your finger.

There is a solution, meet iBoxm.

iBoxm –Upgrade your speaker into wireless

Just connect iBoxm from its rear interfaces to your favorite speaker or audio systems, with the cable attached;you can play music from your smart phone, tablet or notebook.

You also can use it to when you are:

  playing games

  listening to music or radio

  Watching movie or television

  Internet meeting

Enjoy the freedom and get rid hassle of wire!

Glance on iBoxm

  •  Glossy black painting
  •  Bluetooth 4.0
  • Support aptX/SBC
  • Support Bluetooth A2DP/AVRCP
  • Bottom rubber anti-sliding Pad

Digital Audio output for perfect music transfer

1. Optical (Toslink)

TOSLINK (from Toshiba Link) is a standardized optical fiber connection system, its most common use is in consumer audio equipment (via a "digital optical" socket), where it carries a digital audio stream from components such as CD and DVD players, DAT recorders, computers, and modern video game consoles, to an AV receiver that can decode two channels of uncompressed lossless PCM audio or compressed 5.1/7.1 surround sound such as Dolby Digital Plus or DTS-HD High Resolution Audio. 

2. Coaxial

You can connect iBoxm with your audio amplifier, set top box or speaker by coaxial or  optical digital audio cable to achieve perfect audio performance.

Analogue output

•  3.5 mm phone jack plug in

Plug the AUX cable to iBoxm output and aux input of your audio system or speaker.

Accessories


•  3.5 mm phone jack plug to RCA (R, L)X1

•  3.5 mm phone jack male to male X1

•  Universal AC power adapter with USB type A plug X1

•  Power cord with USB type A X1


iBoxm –Set free of Realistic Sounds

aptX: A professional codec company, their  products were heavily adopted by broadcast, professional audio and cinema sectors

CSR: World leading Bluetooth chipset and solution company, with strong technology in wireless field

July 2010 – aptX was acquired by CSR

aptX carry out wireless realistic sound

  • Low latency audio codec technology solve "lip sync" problem

Through aptX technology, with virtually no delay, a strong, robust connection, and providing excellent channel density, aptX enables real-time digital wireless audio in bandwidth constrained Bluetooth connection. When you are listening to music, playing games or watching movies by your Smart phone, notebook or Tablet, there will be no more lip synchronization problem.


  • CD Quality audio but no wire needed

iBoxm built in aptX technology, let you experience the other way music is to be enjoyed - wirelessly in excellent quality. Just sit back and feel an Audio connoisseur’s listening experience, choose songs from your smart phone instead of remote control. You can enjoy wireless Bluetooth audio and need not compromise to sound quality.

Platforms using aptX

htc smart phone

one series

  • Desire 300~601
  • Butterfly S and New Models

Apple Desktop /Laptop computer

  • Apple Mac Mini
  • Apple Macbook Air
  • Apple Macbook
  • Mac OS Xabove

Samsung smart phone /Tablet

Galaxy 7.0~Mega Plus

Samsung smart phone S3  S4 Galaxy Note 10.1

SONY Smart phone Xperia Z series

SHARP Smart phone DC50 SHL22
Motorola Smart phone Razr 

aptX will get into more and more platforms in the future!!


**Don't worry, if your mobile phone,tablet or notebook does not support aptX, you still can use iBoxm; iBoxm will go back to the standard Bluetooth SBC codec and let you stream music wireless from your devices.  


iBoxm Product Specification

Bluetooth standard:Bluetooth 4.0
Codec support: aptX, SBC
Memory of paired device number: 10 devices
Power supply:5V/2A
Effective distance:20m
Dimension 91*57*27mm
Audio output level:2+/-10% VRMS
Frequency response:20-20kHz
L/R channel isolation:-45dB
SNR>90dB
THD:0.08%
Optical output
Wave length:640~670nm
Optical  power output:-17Bm


What We Need 

We need $10000 for final tooling, certification, CIS design and packing design for retail distribution.

iBoxm had been developed and pretested by laboratory, we planned to finish CE,FCC certification and complete the commercial packing design in end of March.


What You Get

You get to be one of the creators for iBoxm, you may propose your packing ideas to us if we can make this campaign achieving the goal.

You will be one of the early birds that can get this Hi-Fi audio box by 50% off the MSRP! 

Perks will be shipped in 2~3 weeks from campaign ending successfully!

We are a professional Bluetooth speaker manufacturing and international trading company. Indiegogo is a good platform for us to collect market information and communicate with retailers, you can trust us, not only to deliver goods, we hope to create our own brand in the future.

Other Ways You Can Help

We have learned that Crowd Funding is a big trend in the future, we need every backer that believes in us and our products to share them on their social networks and with their friends and family in order for us to be successful.

You can use the Indiegogo share tools!

hi-fi audio system already in your home. You do not want to compromise to buy a
Bluetooth speaker with small audio output power or lousy audio quality.  
But you cannot fight the temptation of
listening music without wire hassle and controlling the music from your
smartphone, tablet, and computer by your finger.
There is a solution, meet iBoxm.iBoxm –Upgrade your speaker into wirelessJust
connect iBoxm from its rear interfaces to your favorite
speaker or audio systems, with the cable attached;you can play music from your
smart phone, tablet or notebook. 
You also can use it to when you are:

Enjoy the freedom and get rid hassle of wire!

anti-sliding Pad
Digital Audio output for perfect music transfer
1. Optical
(Toslink)


TOSLINK (from Toshiba Link) is a
standardized optical fiber connection system, its most
common use is in consumer audio equipment (via a "digital
optical" socket), where it carries a digital audio stream from
components such as CD and DVD players, DAT recorders,
computers, and modern video game consoles, to an AV receiver that
can decode two channels of uncompressed lossless PCM audio or compressed 5.1/7.1 surround
sound such as Dolby Digital Plus or DTS-HD High Resolution
Audio. 

2. Coaxial



You can connect iBoxm with your audio amplifier, set top box or speaker by coaxial or  optical digital audio cable to achieve perfect audio performance.

jack plug in
