story:
Henstong is a set of True Wireless Stereo earbuds that integrates a 10mm Dynamic Driver and supports Stereo Call and Native Volume Control. 

With a sleek and stylish dazzling design, choice of colors and IPX7 Water-proof function, Hnestong gives the excellent sound experience of TWS earbuds your ever have.

Henstong uses a state-of-the-art design that integrates a 10 mm dynamic driver, QCC3020 chip and metal vibration membrane that deliver true lossless sounds, it delivers the incredible stereo sound with strong bass, accurate mids and clear treble, achieving a balanced separation for Hi-Fi music and audio. Listen to music just the way it was recorded, with no interference, harmonized trebles, and undistorted bass.

The CVC8.0 MIC ANC feature of Henstong allows you to block any noise created outside the earphones, so you’re able to enjoy complete silence or listen to what you want uninterrupted. Henstong wireless TWS earphones with Active Noise Cancellation soundproof your life.

Qualcomm aptX proprietary audio codec, low latency, high encoding, retain more music 

details, bring CD-level sound quality to listeners

Bluetooth 5.0’s primary benefits are improved speed and greater range. In other words, it’s faster and can operate over greater distances than older versions of Bluetooth.

Henstong uses advanced acceleration sensors that allow the earbuds to achieve precise motion recognition. Whether it's answering a call, pausing music or switching songs, just tap the earbuds.

Henstong M3 is the world first TWS Earbuds that are using ML Plating Process to make the earbuds utterly natural and premium. With its special and excellent appearance, you’re the focus 

Henstong is the best choice for outdoor sports and fitness activities. Specially designed to fit comfortably in your ears and stay secure and even with the most active lifestyles. Included soft silicone ear-tips allow you to customize your earbuds for the best possible fit.

We spent thousands of hours and went through dozens of prototypes to to perfectly engineer the Hub to naturally fit into the human ear canal. After scanning hundreds of ears from internationally, we finally did it. Relax knowing that your Hub can go with you from your office right to the gym or hike.

 

With Hensong, your music never stops. The earbuds have an astounding 70 hours of standby battery life, also with its power charging case you can get up to 5 hours call and 4 hours music battery life on a single charge 

Founded in 2005, Henstong is one leading electronics brand. The company has been in the communications and electronics industry for 15 years. We are aiming to provide a reliable and high quality true wireless experience at an affordable price. Your contribution will help unlock the full M3 true wireless earbuds experience for everyone.

story:
Update for Backers who contributed to our first campaign:
We have already started to develop working prototype. Please refer the video in end of the campaign description , where we have showed the connectivity of Harsaa with iPhone. Still we are working on hardware and software side to complete a final working product.
As we haven't met our initial goal, we are starting a new campaign to raise funds to support the development. 
We are also planning to include Language Translation as a new feature. Once again Thank you for all the support we have received.
-----x-----x-----x-----x-----
 

Harsaa is a compact wireless Bluetooth earbud packed with all of today’s biggest tech features. While most wireless earbuds will play music, we find they are generally designed around just one or two specific features. 

 

Harsaa was not satisfied with that. We have designed our earbuds to take advantage of all the latest technology trends. Whether you are at work or play, Harsaa  has a mode designed to make your life easier, and more enjoyable.

Harsaa’s ergonomic design is so comfortable you can wear it anywhere, and small enough to be nearly invisible. 

 

Harsaa’s Bluetooth technology allows lightning fast and crystal clear communication between your mobile device and your Harsaa earbuds, in a package so small, comfortable, and easy to use, that you’ll never want to take them out. Listen to the music you like, or maybe your favorite audio book, anywhere and any time. 

 

But Harsaa are more than just great earbuds for talking on the phone or listening to music. They are much, much more.

 

Just look at our long list of features:

Safety and Awareness

 

 

 

Yes, we live in a dangerous, crazy world, and as much as we would like to drown it all out, we know that is not always the safest thing to do. Whether you are driving your car through traffic or walking down the sidewalk, it is essential that you are aware of what is going on around you. Believe it or not, the number of people who have suffered injury or death while wearing headphones has nearly tripled in the last six years. Why? This is because other earphones block out too much external noise. Wearers are unable to hear approaching traffic, warning shouts, car horns, or even an approaching train, causing them to have been badly hurt or even killed. Many lives could have been saved if the victim had heard the warnings. With Harsaa you can enjoy your tunes and still be safe. Simply tap your earpiece once and you can safely listen to your music and still hear traffic, car horns, or other warning signals.

 

Fitness Tracking

 

 

If fitness is an important part of your lifestyle, the waterproof and sweat resistant Harsaa is your perfect workout partner.

No more sweaty fitness bands to deal with. Harsaa’s Fitness Mode will track your steps, distance, speed, and time, along with calories and heart rate, all while listening to your favorite tunes.  Who could ask for more?

 

 

 

 

If biking or jogging is your thing, not to worry, Workout Mode still allows you to hear the cars and traffic noise that other earphone may block out. And with its comfortable ergonomic fit, Harsaa will stay put during the most rigorous of activities.

 

 

Noise cancellation

 

 

Who doesn’t need a good night sleep. Are noisy neighbors, or their dogs keeping you up? Hoping to sleep through a long plane trip? How about a snoring partner in your own bed? 

 

 

Harsaa's noise cancellation function will block outside noises and give you a peaceful sleep.

 

Sleep mode will also track your breathing, helping detect hidden sleep disorders.

 

After your great night of sleep, it is important to start your day off on a high note.

 

 

Each of us is born with an internal alarm clock. Without an external alarm you would wake up at the best time for you.

But that is not always practical. Harsaa is designed to monitor your sleep cycles and gently wake you during your lightest sleep phase just before your external alarm. 

NFC

 

 

Harsaa offers Near-Field-Communication (NFC) tap-and-go sharing. Simply swipe the ear-bud over your smart phone to transfer any information you choose. Meet a new friend while out? Simply remove your Harsaa earbud and tap it over the other person's phone and their contact details will instantly be transferred to you. 

Any electronic lock can be programmed so that you can gain physical access to it, like at a gym or commercial office building. Members or employees need only tap Harsaa to the door to unlock and open it.
 
You can also tap your ear-bud to automatically change the settings of mobile devices such as volume or Wi-Fi network, open an app, pair multiple Bluetooth devices, and more. 

 

 

Panic function

 

Most women keep their phone in their purse while men tend to keep them in a pocket, not always the easiest to access in a stressful emergency situation.  For example; what if you found yourself alone in a dark parking lot or park late at night, and are approached or attacked by a stranger. Finding your phone and dialling for help takes time and composure, something you probably won’t have in a stressful situation like this. We have the answer, simply tap your Harsaa and signal your mobile phone to sound an alarm. This will send your surprised attacker running fast. 

 

What if you are in an accident, or you’ve fallen and you can’t get up. What do you do? Easy, you tap your Harsaa to send an emergency “I need help,” message to a pre-programmed relative or friend. 

Charging:

 

We know how busy you are so each set of wireless Harsaa earbuds comes complete with its own stylish mobile charging case so you can re-charge your Harsaa anywhere and any time.

 

 

And each case is small enough to fit into a pocket or key chain for your convenience. 

Technical Specs
Weight : Earbuds - 4.75 Grams , Case - 60 grams
Dimensions : Earbuds - 13.5 mm Dia and 19mm Length
Battery Time : 12 Hours combined (Earbuds and Battery case)
Charging Time : 20 minutes
Compatibility : Android, iOS and Windows devices with Bluetooth 3.0 and 4.0
 
Testing Bluetooth connectivity with iPhone
 

 

FAQ's

Can I use my Harsaa earbuds to protect my hearing from loud volumes?

Yes, you can use it as a hearing protection device, allow you to reduce the outside noises entering your ears.

Can we control play / pause / next / back on the ear buds?

You can assign one earphone for ON/OFF (power function) and pausing music. By tapping Twice, it will ON and do same to OFF. By tapping once, we could pause the music.

Assign another earphone for Forward/Back function. Tap once or twice to activate the desired function.

Tap 4 times (any earphone) to activate panic function

How long can we use (non-stop playing music) for one full charge? How many times can the case charge the ear buds?

Play time is around 3 to 3.5 hours. The charging case delivers 3 times of full charging. The combines play time will be more than 12 hours.

What if my Harsaa falls out in the middle of the night? Would I still hear my alarm?

They should not fall out if inserted correctly. However, in the off chance that both falls out, the earplugs will know because the user will not turn off the alarm. After 30 seconds of the earplugs' alarm sounding without a response, the system will assume the earplugs have fallen out and begin to sound the smart phone's alarm - which the user should then be able to hear because the earplugs are no longer in the ears.

Can I use Harsaa as Bluetooth headset for phone calls?

Yes, It can be used similar to regular Bluetooth headsets.

Can I use in mono-mode?

Yes, you can use both ear buds individually.

Is there a warranty?

Harsaa will have a one year limited manufacturer warranty.

Is it waterproof?

Yes, Harsaa earbuds are waterproof and sweat proof with IPX-8 waterproof rating for 2 meters water depth.You can even swim with them in.

How many colour options are there?

At present we are planning to have two colors: Black and White. More colors will be introduced according to the demand from backers.

VentureBeat: "an interesting alternative to Apple’s own solution"

9-5 Mac: "creative battery strap"

KnowTechie: "This could come in handy"

01net.com: 'Moins encombrante que le boîtier des AirPods"

It's Undeniable, the AirPods are the best wireless earphones out there, but the charging case leaves a lot to be desired!

story:
After a successful Kickstarter campaign, the Lenco-MD record player is now launching on Indiegogo.

Vinyl is experiencing a renaissance, but current record player design is still based on 20th century concepts. Their design is often pre-set, unambitious and options are generally limited.

The Lenco-MD rethinks the classic concept of the record player. Although its design is inspired by classic Lenco record players, its characteristics are not. It is built by you, 3D printed, modular, feature rich, community driven, upgradable and mainly made of renewable resources. All this with great audio quality and an aesthetic design. 

We believe a 21st century record player should offer a general platform with the possibility to individualise, upgrade and customise. This vision is reflected in the swappable modules, as well as the open design and community activities surrounding the Lenco-MD.

The Lenco-MD record player is created at the knowledge-sharing community Qeske. It is a collaboration between Swiss quality hi-fi manufacturer Lenco and Qeske members: grassroots Dutch 3D printer producer RepRapUniverse, hardware expert group PCiD, media artist & researcher Tom Luyten and creative technology studio STRUQT.  

The first functional prototype of the Lenco-MD was first presented at the IFA Berlin 2018 (Consumer Electronics Faire) where it was ranked as top 3 best innovations.

  • 3ders.org: "Many records have been broken with 3D printed parts, from cycling to rocket thrust, and even a music record was 3D printed. Now, Lenco has designed a 3D printed record player to match." 
  • Hackster.io: "Lenco-MD Is a Modular 3D-Printed Record Player Kit You Can Build and Hack at Home" 
  • What-HIFI: "Now you can print your own turntable" 

Modularity – you pick the features

The Lenco-MD consists of multiple modular units. It is super easy to swap them and adapt the record player to suit your particular situation. On a sunny day, plug in the ‘Lenco-MD Solar Module’, combine it with the ‘Lenco-MD Speaker Module’ and you are set up to go outside. Plug in the ‘Lenco-MD Bluetooth Module’ and you are ready to go wireless.

How does the modularity work? Simple: All three 3D Printed frame legs of the Lenco-MD feature internal thread. The modules have external thread and can be easily swapped into any of the frame legs. 

The Lenco-MD modules do also have internal thread. This makes it easy to add electronics to the module by using the modular adapter plate. Plug the wiring into the pre-amp and you are all set up.

If you are a maker or into tinkering, create your own modules using our pre-set designs or start from scratch. Add your favourite tonearm, create a new damping system or alter the design. The only limit is your imagination.

The Kickstarter version of the Lenco-MD is shipped with two empty modular slots. Modules like the Lenco-MD Speaker and Bluetooth Modules are currently in development and will become available after the Kickstarter campaign.

 

Fits in every living room - 7 color options

The Lenco-MD Complete Set comes first in seven color variations. A great addition to ever living room. After the Kickstarter campaign a survey is send to specify your color preferences.

 

Build it yourself – A record player out of your 3D printer

The record player of the 21st century is made by you. You can simply 3D print it at home. Just add the quality Lenco hardware and electronics, and have fun building it yourself. No more limitations, you decide the features of your record player.

All Lenco-MD frame parts are specifically designed to be 3D Printed on FFF (Fused Filament Fabrication) 3D Printers. To 3D Print the entire set it requires a 3D printer with a minimal build volume of 330x330x100 mm.

You have a smaller 3D printer? No problem! We have a reward with the pre-printed Platter & Tonearm. All other parts can be printed on a standard FFF 3D printer with a minimal build volume of 200x200x100 mm.

No 3D printer? Also no problem! You can get a complete pre-printed Ready-To-Assemble Kit. All parts are printed with high-quality standards, by RepRapUniverse (RRU) at Qeske, The Netherlands.

 

The green record player - made of renewable resources

The record player of the 21st century leaves the smallest ecological footprint possible. It is made of PLA, a biodegradable and bioactive thermoplastic. PLA is derived from renewable resources, such as corn starch and sugarcane. Don’t worry, degradation of the material will only occur under certain conditions (right temperature, humidity, bacteria, enzymes).

 

 

Made with precision - Quality Lenco parts

Lenco has been synonymous with Swiss engineering precision in the Hi-Fi and consumer electronics field for more than 70 years. All mechanical and electronics parts in the Lenco-MD are genuine high quality Lenco parts, which results in the iconic and world renowned sound. 

 

Unipivot Tonearm

The Lenco-MD comes with a special tonearm, with a visually fascinating mechanical framework. Since the tonearm is perfectly balanced around a unipivot bearing, it does not skew or favor one groove side over the other. It reduces the ubiquitous resonances and frictions to an absolute minimum.

There is no need for complex adjustments (anti-skating): The suspended counterweight design and the proportions of the frame around the bearing perfectly balance the horizontal tracking angle. 

 

Cartridge Freedom - Install your favorite cartridge

Lenco-MD is shipped with the quality AT3600 cartridge from Audio Technica. You have however, complete freedom to install your favorite cartridge. The handle on the tonearm is flexible and can be equipped with almost any cartridge & stylus available on the market.

 

Vibration Damping Feet 

Vibration is the enemy of every record player. For the Lenco-MD we came up with a simple, yet effective solution for eliminating and isolating vibration: Soft golf balls. This gives the record player more stability, helps eliminate vibrations and needle skipping. 

 

Belt-drive system

The Lenco-MD record player uses a belt-drive to spin the platter. An elastic belt is directly attached to the record player’s motor, offering quick and precise movement. The player’s platter rests atop a bearing and is isolated from the devices’ motor. The system absorbs shock, and reduces harsh vibrations generated by the player’s motor.

 

Assembled in a few easy steps

The Lenco-MD record player is assembled in just a few quick steps. It is not only great fun to it by yourself, you also learn how the record player works.

 

Other

Speed change is electronic, switch from 33 ⅓ to 45 RPM with the press of a button. 

The Lenco-MD has a built-in stereo pre-amp and RCA line out port. This lets you connect it to your own audio setup or headphones. A Bluetooth module is set to be developed soon after the Kickstarter campaign. This enables you wireless streaming options.

The record player will come with a DC power supply, combined with a power plug that fits your countries’ standard and a battery clip. Additional powering options are currently being developed. You can expect an AccuPack and Solar Charging Module as upgrades soon.

 

 

  • 3D Printed Lenco-MD Frame
  • Swappable Modular Units
  • Mainly made of ecologial materials
  • Unipivot tonearm
  • Audio-Technica AT3600 cartridge 
  • Electric Belt-Drive System (33 1/3 or 45 RPM)
  • Conical Platter Bearing 
  • RCA Line Out 
  • Headphone Jack 
  • Pre-amplifier board
  • Universal AC to DC power supply compatible with European standard 50 Hz, 220/240 VAC or US standard 60 Hz, 110/120 VAC (Snap-in power plugs are included for operation in countries around the world)
  • 5V Battery Clip 
  • Vibration Damping Feet

 

 

Lenco-MD 3D Printing Kit 1 - €99

3D Print your own record player. This Kit comes with all the hardware and electronics. You get a license to 3D Print the STL Files for the Lenco-MD record player. Requires 3D Printer with minimum build volume of 330x330x100 mm to 3D Print all required parts.

 

Lenco-MD 3D Printing Kit 2 - €149

3D Print your own record player. This Kit comes with all the hardware and electronics. Includes largest 3D parts (Platter & Tonearm) that would require a large 3D printer. You get a license to 3D Print the STL Files for the Lenco-MD record player. Requires 3D Printer with minimum build volume of 200x200x100 mm to 3D Print all required parts.

 

Lenco-MD Full Kit - €199

Complete Ready-To-Assemble Kit with instructions. No 3D Printer required.

 

Lenco-MD Kit + 3D Printer Kit - €499

Special Maker Perk with the brand new 3D Printer (Kit) from RepRapUniverse with a build volume of a staggering 330x330x200mm. With this 3D Printer, you can 3D print all parts of the Lenco-MD in PLA. Create your own modules now or become a manufacturer and print all parts of the Lenco-MD yourself!

 

Become a creator – Create amazing modules

The launch of this IndieGoGo campaign only marks the exciting beginning of a new kind of record player. After the the campaign, we will launch an online community platform where creators can share their own Lenco-MD modules and designs. We cannot wait to to see your creations and challenge everyone involved to make the Lenco-MD a true modular and open system.

 

3D print and sell the Lenco-MD in your store (Contact us & become a manufacturer)

You own an audio/vinyl shop and like to offer a cool extra service to attract more traffic to your store? Contact us about becoming a manufacturer and print record players in your store! 

 

 

 

The team that is involved with the creation of the Lenco-MD record player is an experienced team of professionals and above all, vinyl lovers. The Lenco-MD turntable is created at the Qeske Community.

The Qeske Community is an innovative platform of inventors and creatives. A platform open to ideas, tinkering and education. A place where people, companies and ideas come together in an informal setting. Lenco is a synonym for Swiss engineering precision in the Hi-Fi and consumer electronics field for more than 70 years. RepRapUniverse, a grassroots Dutch 3D printer producer involved in this project has already launched a successful Kickstarter project in 2016 (1730 Full Metal Hotend) and delivering all rewards and most well ahead of schedule. PCiD, a member of Qeske, is a research and development group of experts who joined this project in order to develop a new board for the Lenco-MD.

 

 

The first functional prototype of the Lenco-MD was presented at the IFA 2018 Consumer Electronics Faire in Berin, Germany. We were honoured and humbled by the substantial interest for our record player, and by the overall public reaction. It was ranked as one of the top 3 best innovations.

story:
SPANISH NOTE: Usuarios lengua castellana pueden ver la campaña en :

http://www.soundfree.net/indiegogo.pdf


The  project

Soundfree is a HiFi, wireless and portable multi-protocol audio sender and receiver mini-box s for all your music streaming enjoyment at home or the office, without the hassle of wires or complex playing tasks.

Soundfree was created as a simple solution to send audio wirelessly, not only for short distances, like common Bluetooth A2DP speakers, but also for long distances  as houses, auditoriums, clubs, businesses, and large areas.

Once we met our first target, added extra audio protocols as Bluetooth A2DP stereo music,  ,Bluetooth Handsfree , FM  radio tuning,  and DLNA/UPNP, making  Soundfree an All-in-NEOne reception solution. An input jack was added  to send captured audio by Airplay(™), Bluetooth and DLNA too.


 Don't you have a wifi router ? don't worry ,, Soundfree includes a built-in wifi hotspot mode with own wifi network! , integration with your home router network option is possible too.


How it works ? 

1.Power on Soundfree.
2.Install smartphone application or use web server from any web explorer.
3.Connect your smartphone/computer to the built-in soundfreeXXX generated wifi.
4.Connect output jack to your HiFi/headphones/etc destination or input jack from the audio source which you want to capture and re-send by Airplay,bluetooth or DLNA.
5.Select your required receiver or sender audio mode.
6.Enjoy!


Use any iMac/PC/Android/iPhone/IOS system to send audio to any destination with a Soundfree unit linked or capture any audio source and send it via Airplay(™),Bluetooth or DLNA/UPNP protocols.




Soundfree is a small sized PORTABLE solution that you can power with a universal standard MicroUSB cable or standard 3.7v lithium battery (included on Mini box) . Future upgrade functions or protocols can be implemented (be tuned) .Standard version includes :


  • 100% finished solution&software :
    Prototype measures 5 cm x 5 cm,.Final unit measurements may increase by approximately  2cm per side.This size change is related to avoid problems massive production issues.
  • Wifi a/b/g/n built-in hotspot and home router integration modes :
    Wifi hotspot offers two different connection modes to stream any audio content or to create an intranet and transfer contents between specific devices.
  • AirPlay  is a proprietary protocolstack/suite developed by Apple Inc.that allows wireless streaming of audio on a wifi network with related metadata between devices , different devices as Android,PC,iOS,iMac,etc.. are able to send Airplay(™) audio contents.Soundfree includes the option of sending and receiving Airplay(™) audio to another Airplay(™) receiver devices/speakers or to a secondary Soundfree unit when it is on airplay receiver mode.
  • Bluetooth A2DP (Advanced audio distribution profile), allows multimedia audio stream from one device to another over a Bluetooth connection. For example, music can be streamed from a mobile phone to a wireless headset,etc.. Soundfree includes the option of receive or send captured audio to other bluetooth receiver devices or to a secondary Soundfree unit when it is on Bluetooth receiver mode.
        
  • Bluetooth handsfree voice profile, allows individuals who are driving or walking/footing to communicate hands-free with mobile phones or computers. 
                      
                                               
  • FM stereo radio tuner , uses frequency modulation (FM) to provide high-fidelity sound over broadcast radio




    •
  • Online radio player,is an audio service transmitted via the Internet (requires internet connection).


    •
  • DLNA/UPNP, enable sharing of digital media between multimedia devices,DLNA has two different types,server and renderer(player),Soundfree includes the option of receiving or sending captured audio to other DLNA receiver devices or to a Soundfree unit when it is on DLNA receiver mode.
  • Microsd for upgradeable firmware and Universal MicroUSB plug for power and charging.
                                        

                     

  • Web server control built-in/configurator and Android/iOS application


  • 1 output audio 3.5mm/4 rings jack 
  • 1 input audio 3.5mm/4 rings jack for audio capture and streaming

  • Box with 2 control buttons + status led
  • Expansion add-ons connector
  • Fast 400Mhz Freescale microcontroller
  • 32MB SDRAM
  • No extra cost for standard features
  • Powerfull scripts set/API  for open source developer add-ons (requires license)
  • External antenna for extra radio/Bluetooth/Wifi a/b/g/n coberture
  • Built-in battery or Direct DC MicroUSB power plug mode (fully PORTABLE)

Why Choose Soundfree and not Another Device ? 

Soundfree offers a ALLinOne solution for low price,It has the ability to upgrade your old HiFi/speakers/headphones or computer to new Wifi/Bluetooth/DLNA,etc.. technologies . Soundfree is PORTABLE , so you can enjoy every party, not only at your home , you can also easily put it at your pocket, transport it , play it and be the parties' hero! , examples of variety Soundfree uses are : 

  • Receive music from any Airplay(™) sender (iMac,iPhone,Android,PC iTunes,etc.)



  • Receive stereo music from any Bluetooth A2DP sender device



  • Receive stereo music from any DLNA/UPNP sender device 

  • Receive incoming stereo music via built-in FM radio tuner

  • Receive Bluetooth Voice incoming phone calls (handsfree)

  • Send Line-in and Microphone-in captured sound by Airplay(™)


  • Send Line-in and Microphone-in captured sound by Bluetooth A2DP&Voice

        Examples : Conferences,meetings,theatre,concerts,etc..


  • Send Line-in and Microphone-in captured sound by UPNP/DLNA

        Examples : Conferences,meetings,theathre,concerts,etc..



Here you've two real demonstration videos of our prototype  :



  • Change music and songs from your smartphone and computer in parties!!

  • Main differences with other expensive solutions are : 

    * PORTABLE using MicroUSB power plug and mini battery

    * SMALL SIZE 

    * UNIVERSAL MicroUSB power plug (no specific adapter required)

    * Airplay(™) , DLNA/UPNP wifi a/b/g/n 

    * Built-in wifi a/b/g/n hotspot

    * Ability to send local & external contents from any captured audio source

    * Bluetooth stereo music (A2DP) and Bluetooth Handsfree Voice receiver and sender modes

    * FM radio tuner built-in

    * Multiroom and Unit interconnection , to enjoy different music streaming to any of your rooms, each Soundfree has own unique unit name , which provides the option to send specific audio,songs and playlists to a different Soundfree (room) or chain them as a full streaming network.

    MULTIROOM

    INTERCONNECTION


    * Add-Ons
    Internal PCB expansion connector with built-in UART , SPI and more signals for extra future add-ons such as touchscreen,wifi HD,NAS converter,and more…..

    * The MAINBOARD,the proof of concept box,and the final box design
    Mainboard is the heart of Soundfree chipset.

    1.Expansion connector 
    2.MicroUSB connector (bottom side)
    3.MicroSD connector
    4.3.5mm. / 4 rings capture input jack
    5.3.5mm. / 4 rings output jack
    6.External battery connector



    FIRST FACTORY PROTOTYPE

    Initial 3D rendered box design including color led status.


    Future upgrades

    Send FM stereo radio by Bluetooth/Airplay(™) -> in development

    SPOTIFY radio standalone network Integration -> in development

    Receive & send by Bluetooth/Airplay(™))/DLNA, and any open internet radios (requires internet home router) -> in development

    RSTP conference and multiconference realtime voice protocol

    • Visit our official webpage,for English and Spanish user manuals and other information at the links below : 

         User manual (English) :            

         http://www.soundfree.net/soundfreeusermanual.pdf
        Manual de usuario (Español) : 
        http://www.soundfree.net/manualdeusuariosoundfree.pdf
         


Funds and rewards

Details :

  • Will be used for massive production including chipset+box
  • Rewards includes receive a discounted unit prior to retail selling  at the end of the campaign .. retail price will cost 95-99€ worldwide shipping included .
  • What do you will get ?
    Each Soundfree reward set will contain :
    - 1pc Soundfree Standard pcb
    - 1pc internal battery with minimum approximately 5 to 6h of playing capability
    - 1pc MicroUSB charge and power cable
    - 1pc High style design mini box
    - 1pc kernel MicroSD card


FAQ

* Do i need buy a new speakers/hifi/computer or headphones to use sound free ? No,sound free mini box will upgrade all of them to the new Wifi & Bluetooth technology by easily just connecting to the Sounfree output 3.5mm jack.
* Can i connect my wireless speakers to sound free ? Yes,use speakers' jack or connect by setting Soundfree as Airplay(™),Bluetooth or DLNA sender mode.
* Can i use sound free mini box as a audio receiver ?  Yes,sound free supports Airplay(™),Bluetooth A2DP,FM radio,online radio and DLNA receiver modes.


* Can i use Soundfree as a audio sender ? Yes,Soundfree includes an input 3.5mm jack to capture any sound from Line-in/Mic-in and send on Airplay(™),Bluetooth or DLNA mode. 

* Does sound free supports Bluetooth ? Yes,Soundfree includes Bluetooth 3.0+EDR , supporting A2DP and handsfree voice modes .
* Do i need a WIFI router to use Soundfree ? No,Soundfree has a built-in WIFI a/b/g/n hotspot that allows  to connect and link different devices.
* It's Soundfree portable ? Yes , MicroUSB direct power connection and standard 3.7v lithium battery are included on standard version.
* How many hours is Soundfree portable ? Battery plays aproximatelly 5 to 6h. 
* How do i control Soundfree and select audio modes ? You can use iOS/Android application or built-in web server tool from any computer. 
* Can i use Soundfree in multiple rooms ? Yes,each Soundfree has unique unit name , so you can send audio to each one of link all them creating a full network to sending or receiving,
* Can i use Soundfree to create a privated network and share my documents,datas and audio ? Yes,use the built-in a/b/g/n wifi hotspot for it.
* What are the technical specs ? These are the main ones.......

Freescale imx series 400Mhz processor
Memory: 32MB DDR2.
Storage: MicroSD card.
Audio: 44KHz DAC.
WiFi: 802.11bgn. WPA, WPA2, Mixed mode WPA/WPA2 compliant.
Bluetooth 3.0 + EDR.
FM radio receiver built-in.
Power consumption: 230mA/h.
Power input : 5v universal MicroUSB connector or standard 3.7v Litium battery.


The Team

Luis Maria Perez (CEO and developer)

Michael Tagli (Code and Hardware developer)

Jordan Díaz (Graphics editor,Webpage,3D & applications designer)

Winnie Perez (Public relations)


How to follow….

If you like this project please pledge , contribute to our campaign , hype it to all your network around and follow us at @soundfreenet
story_txt:
SPANISH NOTE: Usuarios lengua castellana pueden ver la campaña en :http://www.soundfree.net/indiegogo.pdfThe  project
Soundfree is a HiFi, wireless and portable multi-protocol audio sender and receiver mini-box s for all your music streaming enjoyment at home or the office, without the hassle of wires or complex playing tasks.
Soundfree was created as a simple solution to send audio wirelessly, not only for short distances, like common Bluetooth A2DP speakers, but also for long distances  as houses, auditoriums, clubs, businesses, and large areas.Once we met our first target, added extra audio protocols as Bluetooth A2DP stereo music,  ,Bluetooth Handsfree , FM  radio tuning,  and DLNA/UPNP, making  Soundfree an All-in-NEOne reception solution. An input jack was added  to send captured audio by Airplay(™), Bluetooth and DLNA too. Don't you have a wifi router ? don't worry ,, Soundfree includes a built-in wifi hotspot mode with own wifi network! , integration with your home router network option is possible too.How it works ? 1.Power on Soundfree.2.Install smartphone application or use web server from any web explorer.3.Connect your smartphone/computer to the built-in soundfreeXXX generated wifi.4.Connect output jack to your HiFi/headphones/etc destination or input jack from the audio source which you want to capture and re-send by Airplay,bluetooth or DLNA.5.Select your required receiver or sender audio mode.6.Enjoy!Use any iMac/PC/Android/iPhone/IOS system to send audio to any destination with a Soundfree unit linked or capture any audio source and send it via Airplay(™),Bluetooth or DLNA/UPNP protocols.Soundfree is a small sized PORTABLE solution that you can power with a universal standard MicroUSB cable or standard 3.7v lithium battery (included on Mini box) . Future upgrade functions or protocols can be implemented (be tuned) .Standard version includes :

100% finished solution&software :Prototype measures 5 cm x 5 cm,.Final unit measurements may increase by approximately  2cm per side.This size change is related to avoid problems massive production issues.


Wifi a/b/g/n built-in hotspot and home router integration modes :Wifi hotspot offers two different connection modes to stream any audio content or to create an intranet and transfer contents between specific devices.


AirPlay  is a proprietary protocolstack/suite developed by Apple Inc.that allows wireless streaming of audio on a wifi network with related metadata between devices , different devices as Android,PC,iOS,iMac,etc.. are able to send Airplay(™) audio contents.Soundfree includes the option of sending and receiving Airplay(™) audio to another Airplay(™) receiver devices/speakers or to a secondary Soundfree unit when it is on airplay receiver mode.




Bluetooth A2DP (Advanced audio distribution profile), allows multimedia audio stream from one device to another over a Bluetooth connection. For example, music can be streamed from a mobile phone to a wireless headset,etc.. Soundfree includes the option of receive or send captured audio to other bluetooth receiver devices or to a secondary Soundfree unit when it is on Bluetooth receiver mode.    


Bluetooth handsfree voice profile, allows individuals who are driving or walking/footing to communicate hands-free with mobile phones or computers.                                                              






FM stereo radio tuner , uses frequency modulation (FM) to provide high-fidelity sound over broadcast radio



Online radio player,is an audio service transmitted via the Internet (requires internet connection).


DLNA/UPNP, enable sharing of digital media between multimedia devices,DLNA has two different types,server and renderer(player),Soundfree includes the option of receiving or sending captured audio to other DLNA receiver devices or to a Soundfree unit when it is on DLNA receiver mode.



Microsd for upgradeable firmware and Universal MicroUSB plug for power and charging.                                    


                 


Web server control built-in/configurator and Android/iOS application





1 output audio 3.5mm/4 rings jack 

1 input audio 3.5mm/4 rings jack for audio capture and streaming


Box with 2 control buttons + status led



Expansion add-ons connector

Fast 400Mhz Freescale microcontroller
32MB SDRAM

No extra cost for standard features
Powerfull scripts set/API  for open source developer add-ons (requires license)
External antenna for extra radio/Bluetooth/Wifi a/b/g/n coberture

Built-in battery or Direct DC MicroUSB power plug mode (fully PORTABLE)
Why Choose Soundfree and not Another Device ? Soundfree offers a ALLinOne solution for low price,It has the ability to upgrade your old HiFi/speakers/headphones or computer to new Wifi/Bluetooth/DLNA,etc.. technologies . Soundfree is PORTABLE , so you can enjoy every party, not only at your home , you can also easily put it at your pocket, transport it , play it and be the parties' hero! , examples of variety Soundfree uses are : 




Receive music from any Airplay(™) sender (iMac,iPhone,Android,PC iTunes,etc.)

Receive stereo music from any Bluetooth A2DP sender device

Receive stereo music from any DLNA/UPNP sender device 


Receive incoming stereo music via built-in FM radio tuner



Receive Bluetooth Voice incoming phone calls (handsfree)


Send Line-in and Microphone-in captured sound by Airplay(™)


Send Line-in and Microphone-in captured sound by Bluetooth A2DP&Voice
        Examples : Conferences,meetings,theatre,concerts,etc..
Send Line-in and Microphone-in captured sound by UPNP/DLNA
        Examples : Conferences,meetings,theathre,concerts,etc..Here you've two real demonstration videos of our prototype  :
Change music and songs from your smartphone and computer in parties!!




Main differences with other expensive solutions are : 
* PORTABLE using MicroUSB power plug and mini battery
* SMALL SIZE 
* UNIVERSAL MicroUSB power plug (no specific adapter required)
* Airplay(™) , DLNA/UPNP wifi a/b/g/n 
* Built-in wifi a/b/g/n hotspot
* Ability to send local & external contents from any captured audio source
* Bluetooth stereo music (A2DP) and Bluetooth Handsfree Voice receiver and sender modes* FM radio tuner built-in
* Multiroom and Unit interconnection , to enjoy different music streaming to any of your rooms, each Soundfree has own unique unit name , which provides the option to send specific audio,songs and playlists to a different Soundfree (room) or chain them as a full streaming network.

MULTIROOM


INTERCONNECTION

* Add-OnsInternal PCB expansion connector with built-in UART , SPI and more signals for extra future add-ons such as touchscreen,wifi HD,NAS converter,and more…..
* The MAINBOARD,the proof of concept box,and the final box designMainboard is the heart of Soundfree chipset.


1.Expansion connector 2.MicroUSB connector (bottom side)3.MicroSD connector4.3.5mm. / 4 rings capture input jack5.3.5mm. / 4 rings output jack6.External battery connector


FIRST FACTORY PROTOTYPEInitial 3D rendered box design including color led status.



Future upgrades
Send FM stereo radio by Bluetooth/Airplay(™) -> in development
SPOTIFY radio standalone network Integration -> in development
Receive & send by Bluetooth/Airplay(™))/DLNA, and any open internet radios (requires internet home router) -> in development
RSTP conference and multiconference realtime voice protocol


Visit our official webpage,for English and Spanish user manuals and other information at the links below : 
         User manual (English) :                     http://www.soundfree.net/soundfreeusermanual.pdf        Manual de usuario (Español) :         http://www.soundfree.net/manualdeusuariosoundfree.pdf         Funds and rewardsDetails :
Will be used for massive production including chipset+box
Rewards includes receive a discounted unit prior to retail selling  at the end of the campaign .. retail price will cost 95-99€ worldwide shipping included .




What do you will get ? Each Soundfree reward set will contain :- 1pc Soundfree Standard pcb- 1pc internal battery with minimum approximately 5 to 6h of playing capability- 1pc MicroUSB charge and power cable- 1pc High style design mini box- 1pc kernel MicroSD card


FAQ

* Do i need buy a new speakers/hifi/computer or headphones to use sound free ? No,sound free mini box will upgrade all of them to the new Wifi & Bluetooth technology by easily just connecting to the Sounfree output 3.5mm jack.

* Can i connect my wireless speakers to sound free ? Yes,use speakers' jack or connect by setting Soundfree as Airplay(™),Bluetooth or DLNA sender mode.
* Can i use sound free mini box as a audio receiver ?  Yes,sound free supports Airplay(™),Bluetooth A2DP,FM radio,online radio and DLNA receiver modes.* Can i use Soundfree as a audio sender ? Yes,Soundfree includes an input 3.5mm jack to capture any sound from Line-in/Mic-in and send on Airplay(™),Bluetooth or DLNA mode. * Does sound free supports Bluetooth ? Yes,Soundfree includes Bluetooth 3.0+EDR , supporting A2DP and handsfree voice modes .
* Do i need a WIFI router to use Soundfree ? No,Soundfree has a built-in WIFI a/b/g/n hotspot that allows  to connect and link different devices.
* It's Soundfree portable ? Yes , MicroUSB direct power connection and standard 3.7v lithium battery are included on standard version.
* How many hours is Soundfree portable ? Battery plays aproximatelly 5 to 6h. 
* How do i control Soundfree and select audio modes ? You can use iOS/Android application or built-in web server tool from any computer. 
* Can i use Soundfree in multiple rooms ? Yes,each Soundfree has unique unit name , so you can send audio to each one of link all them creating a full network to sending or receiving,
* Can i use Soundfree to create a privated network and share my documents,datas and audio ? Yes,use the built-in a/b/g/n wifi hotspot for it.
* What are the technical specs ? These are the main ones.......Freescale imx series 400Mhz processorMemory: 32MB DDR2.Storage: MicroSD card.Audio: 44KHz DAC.WiFi: 802.11bgn. WPA, WPA2, Mixed mode WPA/WPA2 compliant.Bluetooth 3.0 + EDR.FM radio receiver built-in.Power consumption: 230mA/h.Power input : 5v universal MicroUSB connector or standard 3.7v Litium battery.





The TeamLuis Maria Perez (CEO and developer)Michael Tagli (Code and Hardware developer)Jordan Díaz (Graphics editor,Webpage,3D & applications designer)Winnie Perez (Public relations)How to follow….If you like this project please pledge , contribute to our campaign , hype it to all your network around and follow us at @soundfreenet
campaign_city: Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, Spain

story:
The midiflorian merges simplicity and affordability with extensive pro level features so that you can  spend more time creating and less time tweaking. Let the midiflorian open up endless control possibilities for samplers, instruments, amp modelling software, digital audio workstations, lighting rigs and more ...

If you've ever wanted an inexpensive midi pedal that is packed with pro level features and is the perfect partner for almost any midi device or software application, check out the midiflorian, the ultra versatile midi foot controller.

 

 

 

Supporting both standard MIDI and USB-MIDI, the midiflorian is packed with high end functionality at a price that competes with the most affordable controllers on the market

 


 

The midiflorian comes with free open-source programming software for Windows and Mac. We've made sure that setting up presets is easy and intuitive.


Who is behind the midiflorian?

We are a group of musicians and engineers with decades of electronics and industrial engineering experience. We designed the midiflorian because we had grown frustrated with the expensive, complicated and limited controllers on the market. We were so happy with the result that we knew we had to make it available to everyone.

Which midi messages can the midiflorian send?

The midiflorian can send any number of the following messages with each press or release of a preset button...

  • Program change
  • Control change
  • Note on and off events
  • Pitch bend change
  • Polyphonic key pressure (after touch)
  • Channel pressure (after touch)
  • All sound off
  • Reset all controllers
  • Local control
  • All notes off

Why is the midiflorian being sold through Indiegogo?

There are two reasons.

The first is that it allows us to take advantage of economies of scale. All the components in the midiflorian can be sourced much cheaper when purchased in bulk. We can then pass the savings on to you and allow us to keep the price of the midiflorian under $200.

The second is that it allows us to provide peace of mind to customers by using a trusted site as well as better support once the orders are shipped.

Does the price include shipping?

Yes, the listed price does include a courier service to your door. Please note however that your particular country may impose additional taxes or customs duties upon delivery.

Does the midiflorian come with a warranty?

Yes. While we are certain that the midiflorian is bomb proof, if any component fails under reasonable use within a year of shipping we will work with you to resolve the problem or replace the unit.

When will I get my midiflorian?

We are ready to place orders with our suppliers the moment the target number of midiflorian orders is met. We expect to ship 6 weeks after the end of the campaign.

Is there anything that might delay my order?

While extremely rare, it is not unheard of for suppliers to deliver imperfect components to designers like us. We are committed to shipping high quality products so in the unlikely event that we are sent faulty components there may be delays while we rectify the problem.

I have another question, can I contact you?

Absolutely! In fact we welcome any questions or discussions you may have for us. Get hold of us through the website and we will be sure to answer you.

How can I help spread the word about the midiflorian?

Please feel free to share this page, make use of the social media links here in Indiegogo or visit our official webpage at www.midiflorian.com

story: Hear the Music
story_txt: Hear the Music

story:
SPEAKER MODE

ARMED AUDIO The ELITE-300 lets you connect with others by sharing your music out loud. Set them down to activate your Speaker Mode.

 

 

WE ALL HEAR DIFFERENTLY

ARMED AUDIO headphones allow each and every user to customize the handcrafted equalizers. You can modify the presets, giving you the power to shape your sound at your fingertips.

 

 

NO LIMITS

The ELITE-300 is limitless, with its capability to adapt to you!

 

 

 

 

Over-Ear Mode

 

Speaker Mode

 

 

 

FIRST PERSON EXPERIENCE

  • Unzip your Protective Case

  • Unfold your ELITE-300 headphones

  • Personalize your comfort fit with Memory Size Lock

  • Strong dynamic flexibility to increase Durability

  • Turn out your ear cups to activate Speaker Mode

  • Protect your ELITE-300 headphones

  • Zip your Protective Case

 

ISOLATE yourself with ARMED AUDIO+ Adjustable Active Noise Cancellation.

 

Activate The ELITE-300 SPEAKER MODE to share your sound!

 

SPEAKER MODE - SHARE YOUR MUSIC      

The ELITE-300 has an exciting new feature that allows you to play your music out loud, sharing your sound with others. Play your music out loud during your workout to stand out from the crowd. It's simple, all you have to do is flip out your ELITE-300 ear-cups to automatically activate your sound. To deactivate Speaker Mode, simply flip in the ear-cups.

Everyone hears music differently and ARMED AUDIO+ adjusts to you. It allows you to choose how you want to hear your music. You can customize your own sound by using the EQ, or you can also play ARMED AUDIO+ presets to what suits you best. This is one of many key features along with The ELITE-300 unique Speaker Mode feature:

  • You can enjoy Speaker Mode anywhere.
  • Adjustable Active Noise Cancellation.
  • Personalize your sound with ARMED AUDIO+ Equalizer.
  • Strong dynamic flexibility and increased Durability.
  • Memory Size Lock to keep track of your personalized custom fit.

 

 

​​

 

  • When you're not listening to incredible sound through your ELITE-300, set them down to activate Speaker Mode which you can enjoy anywhere.

 

 

  • With our ANC you can simply adjust the audio that suits you best. Whether you want it low, high or completely off, you can now control the sound surrounding you with our Adjustable Active Noise Cancellation feature.

 

 

  • ARMED AUDIO+ brings you the power to personalize your sound at your fingertips. Whether you want more punch or a deeper sound, you can simply choose between the ARMED AUDIO+ presets.

 

 

  • We created the frame of The ELITE-300 headphones out of aluminum to guarantee you strong dynamic flexibility and increased durability. 

 

 

  • This feature allows you to keep track of your personalized custom fit so you can tailor it at your own comfort level.

 

OUR MISSION

It was our mission when we partnered up with SODO to develop The ELITE-300. We made it our priority to improve every aspect we found necessary to create the most durable and adaptive sounding headphone for you.

 

 

 

iOS / Android compatible

 

We have created ARMED AUDIO+ Equalizer to enable you to make adjustments to the sound outputs of your music files. You can also save your own custom presets so that you won't lose track of your personalized hearing.

You will be able to control the noise surrounding you with its Adjustable Noise Cancellation feature. This allows you to adjust what will best suit your surroundings, whether you want low, high or completely off.

ARMED AUDIO+ has mastered its own presets and you can activate a preset that personally connects with you.

 

Customizing EQ, so you can continue your workout at the highest level.

 

 

 
 

 

Over-Ear Mode

 

Speaker Mode

 

Protective Case

 

ELITE-300 and Protective Case

 

 

 

 

 

Control your phone call and music play activity with just a simple touch.

 

 

 

 

 

 

We want to show our appreciation for hitting our first milestone and to thank each and every one of you for all your support! 

Once we have reached our target of 150k, you, the backer will have the option to choose between our two colors Black on Black ELITE-300 or our LIMITED EDITION Red ELITE-300 headphones.

By choosing our Limited Edition Red ELITE-300 you will be the first and only to have our exclusive Indiegogo offer.

 

 CREATING THE ELITE BOX

 

 
 
 

ELITE Box

 

 

 

ARMED AUDIO

It began with an idea where a duo wanted to revolutionize the headphone industry. Both their creative and driven passion lead them to search for an experienced and passionate team to develop the highest quality possible when designing and creating The ELITE-300. When it comes to developing and engineering audio equipment, the team at ARMED AUDIO have the experience, trusted knowledge and creativity.                        

- We Care About You.

 

 

Production photos

CAD drawings​

3D assemble image

 

Product testing and assembling line​

 

 

Engaging with The ELITE-300​

 

WHY INDIEGOGO?

This is our first Indiegogo campaign and we are honored and excited more than ever to be able to share and show you the insights of The ELITE-300. We wanted to ensure we have a strong connection with you, the backer. Our team has continuously worked hard in creating the highest quality product for you. It is crucial for us to prove to you what we can conquer within a headphone. We are ready to begin the production and we now need your support!​

 

 

Every step was taken with high attention to detail.

 

Risks and challenges

Our Indiegogo campaign is a milestone, we must confidently progress and grow, proving to ourselves and to you our success. Before launching our campaign, we wanted to make sure we were ready and 100% committed to preventing any issues that may arise. We promise to deliver a detailed and high quality completed headphone, where you can walk away knowing you are in trusted hands. Our aim is to deliver our headphone to you as quickly as possible, everything we have informed you with we will strive to deliver. Our team is strong and prepared to start mass production.

story:
We are Saints of Death from Vancouver, BC. We are a Double Bass Attack with our unique use of 8 string bass and traditional 5 string bass. Formed in 2013, we released our debut EP in 2015. We have since done multiple tours and are preparing to record our new EP this October. We plan to follow up this new EP with multiple international tours, starting with Mexico in November.

This campaign is important to us because we are an independent band, and for now all these tours and recording is costing us a great deal of money! These pre-sale packages are a great way to get you our newest material as well as awesome merchandise, and help us fund our next recording endeavour.

We want to thank you for taking the time to check out our pre-sale packages (below) and hope to see you all at some of our upcoming shows around the world in our kick ass gear!

 

 

We are trying to raise $9500 towards our new EP through our Pre-Sale Merch Packs.  This will help cover the cost of recording/mixing/matering as well as distrobution of the new EP. We hope that this money will allow us to free up some funds for other cool things like Tours, and Music Videos. We have brainstormed some great ideas so have a look at the packages, and purchase the best one for you! Each package comes with a Pre-Release digital copy of our album and a personalized autographed picture of the band!

We understand that some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean that you can't help.  Please share this campaign on your social media for your friends and family to see and follow us on all of our Social Media networks.

We would like to personally thank all of our fans for sticking with us over the past 5 years! We are extremely grateful,  and too show our loyalty back to the fans, we will be personally thanking each and every one of our contributors with a thank you on the liner notes of the album!!

Thanks for the support,

Saints of Death!

This campaign is important to us because we are an independent band, and for now all these tours and recording is costing us a great deal of money! These pre-sale packages are a great way to get you our newest material as well as awesome merchandise, and help us fund our next recording endeavour.
We want to thank you for taking the time to check out our pre-sale packages (below) and hope to see you all at some of our upcoming shows around the world in our kick ass gear!
 

 
We are trying to raise $9500 towards our new EP through our Pre-Sale Merch Packs.  This will help cover the cost of recording/mixing/matering as well as distrobution of the new EP. We hope that this money will allow us to free up some funds for other cool things like Tours, and Music Videos. We have brainstormed some great ideas so have a look at the packages, and purchase the best one for you! Each package comes with a Pre-Release digital copy of our album and a personalized autographed picture of the band!

We understand that some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean that you can't help.  Please share this campaign on your social media for your friends and family to see and follow us on all of our Social Media networks.
We would like to personally thank all of our fans for sticking with us over the past 5 years! We are extremely grateful,  and too show our loyalty back to the fans, we will be personally thanking each and every one of our contributors with a thank you on the liner notes of the album!!
Thanks for the support,
Saints of Death!

story:
Japan Tuned

Samurai Ears aims at providing the sound of Japan. We select high-speed, wide-range, high-definition drivers, and conduct extensive listening tests, with painstaking sound tuning performed at increments of 0.1 dB across the entire frequency range. Flat frequency response and balanced tone form the basis of Samurai Ears' approach to sound reproduction. This stands in stark contrast to the in-ear headphones of many brands from other countries that emphasize only the so-called "heavy-bass" sound, which can be harsh for ears.

 


Key Features and Specs

 

State-of-the-Art True Wireless In-Ear Headphones

 

Currently in development at Samurai Ears are the STW-D01a audiophile-grade wireless earbuds. The STW-D01a will be one of the first Japanese products equipped with the latest QCC3026 chip by U.S. based Qualcomm Technologies, Inc.

Key features of the STW-D01a can be categorized as follows:

1. Extended listening time: Up to 9 hours of staying power with just the earbuds themselves

2. No more frustration! Strong, stable Bluetooth signal connection, even in crowded places such as Tokyo. 

3. 100% waterproof (IPX7 level) can withstand even temporary immersion in water. Your in-ear headphones will not be damaged by sudden rainfall and sweat.

4. Incredible sound quality thanks to the synergy between the outstanding signal processing power of the latest chips and our “Japan Tuned” approach

4. Future-proof: Even more features will become accessible with Snapdragon 845 mobile SoC, which is expected to be used in many upcoming Android smartphones and other devices soon

Let’s take a closer look at each of these features.

 

 

Why do other true wireless in-ear headphones offer so little playback time?

In existing true wireless in-ear headphones in the market, either the left or right earbud is set as the "master." The master earbud receives the signal for both sides of the stereo field being transmitted from a smartphone or other device, and re-transmits one side of the signal to the other side, i.e. the "slave" earbud. With this system, the master earbud is responsible for both receiving and re-transmitting the audio signal, resulting in higher power consumption than the slave earbud. Hence the battery of the master earbud runs out first, while leaving excess power in the slave earbud. This is why the battery life of true wireless earbuds is shorter than that of traditional wireless in-ear headphones.

 

The QCC3206 chip used in the STW-D01a allows the left and right earbuds to connect in such a way for them to switch between the "master" and "slave" roles as needed. This results in the greatest possible efficiency of the left- and right-side batteries.

 

 

Outstanding Playback Time

The STW-D01a can play audio for up to 9 consecutive hours on a single charge. This is the available playback time after the earbuds are fully charged and does not include any time spent charging them in the battery-powered charging case. When in-case charging time is included, these in-ear headphones provide an impressive maximum playback time of approximately 60 hours.

*Playback time may vary due to connection-related conditions and playback volume. The above data are provided as a general guideline.

 

 

Superior Connection Stability

In addition to continuous playback time being far from ideal, there is another issue with existing true wireless earbuds: Intermittent connections. Even if 100% uninterrupted connections are just a dream for wireless products, fewer interruptions are certainly preferable. Thanks to the cutting-edge QCC3026 chip, the STW-D01a gets a much better reception than devices that use previous versions of chips. Additionally, the STW-D01a's connection performance is further enhanced by our new approach on antenna placement.

Prototype to check the connection stability in Tokyo

 

 

Sound First

 

Since its launch, the Samurai Ears has consistently taken a "by Japan, for the world" approach in acoustic design. We call this approach "Japan Tuned," and are fully committed to it. Our rigorous quality control extends to the factories where our products are made. The STW-D01a's sound has been painstakingly tuned through close listening tests by some of Japan's top audio experts, using roughly 3,000 music pieces ranging from classics to the latest hits.

 

 

Superior high quality sound codec

 


When connected to a compatible device, such as an Android device, playback with the high-quality aptX audio codec is available. Compared to the standard SBC codec, aptX uses a lower compression ratio when transmitting audio, allowing users to play music without significantly decreasing the quality of the sound. At Samurai Ears, we are particular about sound quality, and we consider aptX to be the ideal codec.

The STW-D01a is also compatible with the SBC codec, as well as the AAC format. Please rest assured that we have also performed careful tuning to ensure that the STW-D01a's sound quality meets your expectations in regard to these codecs.

 

Bluetooth 5.0

The STW-D01a is compatible with Bluetooth version 5.0, which is now being included with the latest smartphone models. The result is a marked improvement in data speed and range when connected to a compatible device, making your wireless audio experience that much more enjoyable. Of course, the STW-D01a is also backward compatible with devices that support earlier versions of Bluetooth.



 

Ease of Use

Without the need of control via your smartphones, just by touching buttons on each of the left and right earbuds, you can play or pause your music, and skip tracks.

Prototype to check the connection stability in Tokyo.

 

Siri and Google assistant available


 


 

Fast Charging

Charging only for 15 mins, you can playback your music for 80 mins. 



 

Superior Water Resistance

The STW-D01a’s IPX7-compliant waterproofing can withstand even temporary immersion in water. Your in-ear headphones will not be damaged by sudden rainfall and sweat.

 

 

Bombproof Durable Metal Case with High Capacity Battery

The charging case is made in durable and long-lasting duralumin. And, with built-in a high capacity (800mAh) lithium-ion battery, you can charge the earbuds about 6 times. So you can enjoy listening to music for approximately 60 hours on the go. 

4 colors available.

Prototypes

 

Hidden Features

Both the STW-01a and the QCC3026 chip actually have capabilities that have yet to be fully unleashed. Before we describe these capabilities, we would first like to review the basic mechanisms of true wireless earbuds.

As described previously, the system used by traditional true wireless in-ear headphones works in the manner shown in the above picture. This is called TrueWireless™ Stereo ("TWS").

The QCC3026 chip, as aforementioned, allows the two earbuds to switch between the master and slave roles, even when connected by conventional means.

But, what if the two sides of true wireless earbuds did not have a master/slave relationship or any other relationship? What if the signal could be sent from the device to each of the left and right sides individually? Is that even possible?

In fact, that very capability is one of the hidden features of the QCC3026 chip. It is called TrueWireless™ Stereo Plus ("TWS Plus"). This state-of-the-art system is ideal for in-ear headphones, as it allows the right side of the stereo signal to be sent directly to the right earbud, and the left side directly to the left earbud.

In order to make use of this system, a device (such as a smartphone) equipped with Qualcomm's Snapdragon 845 chip is required. This chip is used in several devices that are already in the market. It may even be in your smartphone. If so, you will be able to use the groundbreaking TWS Plus technology, once the software on your device becomes compatible (which may require a device firmware update, etc.).

As of October 2018, this feature is not yet available. However, we think it offers great potential, so please allow us to explain a bit more about TWS Plus.

The greatest advantage of this system is that, by transmitting the appropriate sides of the audio signal from the device to the corresponding sides of the earbuds individually, the need (as imposed by master/slave earbud systems) to transmit a signal between left and right earbuds is eliminated, thereby substantially improving the stability of the connection.

Another major benefit of TWS Plus is that equalizing power consumption across the left and right sides result in extended battery life, expecting even over 9 hours.

 

 

High-quality ear-tips

STW-D01a includes the high-quality ear-tips of SpinFit, in which the angle of the end of the ear tip changes to fit the shape of the user's ear canal. Patented SpinFit improves the airtightness of the ear canal, which reduces the exterior noises, resulting in improved sound clarity. SpinFit has won the loyalty of both users and developers who value sound quality and fit, with sound-obsessed audio brands around the world adopting SpinFit ear tips as the standard option for their in-ear headphones.

 

Technical Specifications

Color : Samurai black, Champagne gold, Rouge, Silver

Chipset：Qualcomm QCC3026

Bluetooth : ver.5.0Driver：φ6mm Dynnamic

Sensitivity：91dB±3db

Impedance：16Ω

Frequency Response：20Hz - 20,000Hz

Microphone：-42db/±3db   CVC8.0 Noise Cancellation

Battery capacity : earbuds/each 45mAh　Charging case/800mAh

Single charge(listening time)：Maximum 9 hours

Battery life with case : Maximum 51 hours

Connection：TWS,TWS Plus

Bluetooth codec：SBC,AAC(for iPhone),aptX(for Android)

Bluetooth profile：A2DP,AVRCP,HSP,HFP

weight：earbuds/each 4.5g   Charging case 85.5g

include accessories：standard ear-tips(S/M/L), SpinFit ear-tips(SS/S/M), MicroUSB cable, Carrying pouch, User manual(English)

 

 

 

Our team

We appreciate all of you taking the time to read the details of our very new project. We're so excited to get started with this Indiegogo campaign, and we can't wait to share our dream to produce this most advanced true wireless earphone designed in Japan with you. We hope you will join us on our journey and become part of this project. Thank you for backing it today!
