Therefore misplacing components is impossible. Unlike with other electronic kits, where multiple parts look nearly the same, but have to go in special places, this kit is as "Lego" as an electronic kit can be.
Nevertheless, if you use force, or are not careful in some situations you can mess pretty much anything up. You need good eyes and common sense. Building electronics is easy IF instructions are followed 100%. There is no 99% in electronics. It works or it doesn't and it is all up to following the instructions to the letter

story:
Short Summary of New Song: "He Knows My Name"

Amidst widespread turmoil and uncertainty of what's coming next in the world, we have the assurance that God, our Creator, not only has a plan but that He actually knows our names. And this new song, which is recorded and about to enter into post-production (e.g. mixing and mastering), brings reassurance of this truth.

The song, "He Knows My Name," draws from my musical roots of gospel and favorite pop musical artists. Beginning with the opening chordal pattern which may remind you of the song "O Happy Day," the song is bound to inspire hope to hope again in God and His intimate knowledge of your name and who you are.

Please consider contributing to the costs of the creation of "He Knows My Name," which I believe will bring glory to God and personal encouragement to all who hear it. Peace,,,

Sincerely,

Steve Drury

story:
The Kamili Innovation:

Everyone deserves to hear their best voice. The Speech-to-Singing technology of Kamili effectively generates personalized, high-quality singing without examining users’ singing skills. 

Now you can read lyrics or sing it without caring about the melody or pitch at all. Enjoy hours of fun using the revolutionary Kamili sound device.

Hear The Difference! - Demonstration:

How Does It Work?

The Kamili technology is able to convert the singing or spoken recording into a great singing voice. The user’s lyrics-reading/singing speech is the only input. 

Kamili Speech-to-Singing technology has the following features:

User-friendly and requires only simple reading for synthesis Preserves user’s timbre (vocal characteristics). 

Accepts singing input as well, where imperfect melody (pitch and rhythm) will be corrected.

Produces singing voice and accompaniment music at once. 

Generates natural voice with singing quality much higher than existing products on the market.

and so much more!

The Kamili Mission:

Singing voice synthesis and music processing has become popular in recent years. There is a growing number of innovative services and applications, such as entertainment on mobile devices, music production and computer-assisted vocal training. 

Synthesized singing voices are expected to be natural and of a high quality, possibly with pleasant singing styles and appropriate music accompaniment. 

It is also desirable to generate personalized singing voices with the individuals' voice timbre (vocal characteristics). Optimally, everyone who speaks can become a singer, even if he/she is tone-deaf. 

Founded by engineering experts, Kamili finally makes it possible for anyone to sound their best!

Pre-Order The Kamili on Kickstarter!

With Kamili everyone is a great singer! You can pre-order this device now by supporting our Kickstarter project. 

Enjoy special pricing and be the first to get the device by pre-ordering on Kickstarter today!

story:
Check out the Seaval BeachStyle WebShop here

Hi, We're SEAVAL BeachStyle; a couple of watersports athletes originally from the Caribbean who decided it would be kinda chill to make and sport our own gear, so that's what we did and now we want to share it with you.

Our reward is being able to use our own goods and that is why we assure quality in everything we make otherwise it simply wouldn't be worth it. However in order to fund our projects we need the help of scale and that is how YOU can support us!

We don't need to make any profit, that's why our prices are so low. If we can distribute our goods, it'll make our custom production more feasible and it'll get our name out so we can do this more often. So, thanks for the speakers guys!

How it works

This is really as simple as it gets.
We used recycled cardboard and dropped some quality speakers in them.  Just fold them up along the seems just like in the video, pop in the tabs, plug in any device with a 3.5mm jack (pretty much any mobile device) and hit play! You're ready to jam!

Check out any further info and specs on our website here: SeavalSoundWaves.com

 

Origin

We were looking to make small, light, eco-friendly, appealing and affordable speakers that actually worked, and so we began thinking. 

 

We wanted to work with wood first but soon enough we figured the recycled and recyclable cardboard would be real sweet if we could pull it off and once we noticed it actually worked, it stuck! Next we had to figure out how to turn them into compact speakers that we could store in a tight spot for travelers, obviously folding would do the trick, but the puzzle was how to fold it most efficiently while maintaining sound quality. 

Once we found a manufacturer with extensive experience in speakers systems that could bring this to life we were advised on what electronics etc. to use and soon enough we had the perfect combo. 

 

Now we had a cardboard speaker box that worked without batteries and connects to pretty much any modern mobile device, it was awesome! 

So time to do some designing. We went through tons of designs for all sides and the protective case, we wanted something cool on each surface and ended up settling for this design to start off our production with. It's difficult to start up with multiple designs especially with the prices we are offering, but once this campaign is over, we'll be sure to throw out some new options and hopefully even customization! Help us make that possible!

Rewards

10 Bucks a pop! As promised, for just 10 bucks we'll send you a set of SEAVAL SoundWaves, however if we don't reach our goal you will not be billed and no one will receive their SoundWaves, so if you want to take advantage of this amazing deal you're gonna have to make sure your friends get one as well... Like, Share and do all that other good stuff and we'll make sure to get you your set of speakers asap.
Thanks, we couldn't do it without you!

WIN A PAIR OF SEAVAL SHADES!

Because you are so awesome for buying a set of SoundWaves we thought you'd probably fit the category of awesome people who can pull off wearing one of our new models of Seaval Shades! 

For every pair of pair of SoundWaves you buy you have a chance to win a pair of Seaval Shades of your choice!

Also, we'll be doing many more photo competitions with these speakers with many awesome prizes to win, getting a pair is your ticket in. Oh, and LIKE us here!

Thanks for the support!

Risks and challenges

Of course, like all ventures, we will undoubtedly meet some challenges however we're confident that we can handle whatever comes our way. Why? 'Cause we're surfers and we think that way! 
But also because we have gone through the entire process already, produced our speakers (they work perfectly), the supply chain is set up and ready to go, all we need now is your help to build some scale. As long as we make enough sales, you'll be getting your speakers in perfect condition and on time!

We know our prices are ridiculously low and we're cutting it straight-up border line with our costs which is tough for a small company, however we think this is a good and fun way to promote ourselves and get these awesome speakers out to all you good people. So if we have any financial issues, no worries, we'll gladly take care of that ourselves.

$10 is our offer, please help us make it happen.

story:
Update 2020-01-10 | final sample ready

With the support of a generous backer we were able to already place an order at our factory in China. They started making some samples which we can show to you. In the other part of this Indiegogo page you'll find pictures of the black cable which is not the reward you'll finally get, it will be the awesome premium cable as seen below.

 

The JackSavior black edition is an instrument cable with a black JackSavior jack plug and a comfortable cable. The JackSavior plug is a jack where the wires are connected inside the plug resulting in a smaller, flexible and 10x stronger audio jack. With this cool looking black jack instrument cable you can enjoy playing your favorite instrument without being afraid of breaking the output jack of your instrument or amplifier.

JackSavior Black edition instrument cable

The JackSavior Black edition instrument cable is a 10 ft comfortable instrument cable with 1/4” (6.35 mm) JackSavior black jack plugs. The black nickel plated plugs are one of a kind, which gives you a unique looking cable. The final product that will be your reward for supporting us will include a braided cable, which is not yet included in the pictures of this campaign. 

Specifications:

  • black nickel-plated connectors for optimal signal transfer and a cool look ?
  • 10x stronger 1/4” (6.35 mm) straight JackSavior connectors
  • 10 ft / 3 m tangle-resistant braided cable for a comfortable playing experience
  • oxygen free copper core and shield
     

JackSavior Black 1/4" Jack instrument cable
 

JackSavior Technology

The JackSavior plug is an audio jack where the wires are connected inside the plug resulting in a smaller, flexible and 10x stronger audio jack. This prevents any external forces from touching the connection, preventing jack plug and jack input failure. The JackSavior plug is the smaller connector in the picture below:

 

top: regular jack | bottom: JackSavior jack
 

Proof of production

We have already produced a batch of products with our newly found OEM partner for our first B2B customer! We have made a 10 feet (3 meter) cable for an awesome acoustic electric violin from Eastman Strings!

Eastman Strings Electric Acoustic Violin with the smallest and strongest plug on earth made by JackSavior

From left to right: small tooling improvements - corner plug in my phone - 1/4 inch jack for violin amplifier
 

Goal of this campaign

Our goal is to prevent jack plug failure, so you can keep on playing your instrument. We try to do this by offering our JackSavior technology to well known cable and plug manufacturers or brands to incorporate it in their products. We make the JackSavior technology implementation easier for the factories by running a project with them, which we offer to pay for. This offered instrument cable is such a project. We aim to reach as much people as possible with this project to get the following word on the street: There is a new jack plug in town which is smaller, flexible and 10x stronger.
 

The JackSavior story

The beginning

The design of audio jacks found in modern headphones dates back to 1876 and was invented by Tividar Puskás. It is by no means a bad design, but at JackSavior, we feel that an update is long overdue. Audio jacks break frequent between the wires and the plug. We solve this by connecting the wires inside. But selling headphones makes no sense, as there are already many great brands selling audio products and our founder Bouwy is not Dr. Dre. We are licensing out the technology to these brands but apparently, no manager is interested in preventing jack failure problems for their customers. So we ran a crowdfunding campaign to pay for the first tooling and convince big brands to incorporate the JackSavior plug into their products.


What happened after the first crowdfunding campaign?

We shipped all the promised rewards/perks and our goal of convincing big brands succeeded as multiple brands want to have it. They requested a quotation from their factory, who did not give any reply to that request. They said that they cannot give a quotation as they cannot estimate the planning sufficiently to comply with planning rules and involved penalties. This is because they have no experience with making a million JackSavior plugs. We have to buildup to those order sizes and increase manufacturability to achieve predictability for those big manufacturers.


Small OEM partner to grow predictable manufacturing

We decided to find a smaller factory to cooperate with us and increase manufacturability and thereby the predictability of the whole process. We will be growing from this factory towards the big factories to ultimately supply to the big headphone brands. We need to produce products to identify optimizations in the production process. This campaign will help us to pay for these production batches and save the world from jack failure.


The black jack

We've been around in the jack plug business for a couple of years and often wondered why plugs don’t have any color, except silver or gold. We stumbled on some sample material with a black zinc coating. Unfortunately, this was not wear resistant, it was easily scratchable. In the discussion with our local metal supplier, black nickel came out as a possibility!

Why aren’t there any other black jacks? We think it’s because it is harder to solder. But with the JackSavior production process we can solder this difficult material. This gives you the opportunity to be rewarded with a cool looking cable and spreading the JackSavior technology.

With our local metal supplier we discussed the black finish

 

Working prototype 

The first prototype of the JackSavior black edition is demonstrated in the video below. You'll hear that the black nickel plating is not affecting the performance of the cable. We furthermore tested the conductivity in the factory and confirmed that the black plating doesn't affect the signal transfer. The cable in this prototype is just a sample, the reward will be shipped with a premium 5 mm braided cable.

 

But How?

We solder the wires inside the plug that goes inside your device. This part is not moving constantly, which results in the 10x better test results.

Schematic illustration of soldering connection inside the plug

Bending test
 

Timeline


Thanks and miscellaneous

Thanks to https://max.guitars/ who where so kind to let us film some cool shots in their store.

story:
Our campaign has ended, but you can still reserve your EKKO+AERO: Pre-order NOW


The EKKO™ delay effects pedal and companion AERO™ remote controller gives you freedom in all playing situations as well as new creative possibilites.

AERO™ - wireless controller
  • Store/recall presets, turn on/off & set tap-tempo on the fly
  • Range up to 98 feet/30m & rechargable (USB) battery
  • Compatible with future Aalberg Audio effects.

EKKO™ - delay pedal
  • Semi-analog delay pedal (100% analog direct signal)
  • LED bars to indicate parameters (delay time, level and feedback)
  • Stereo in/out and true bypass


Featured in

(Press release and web/high-res pictures: Here)

"Cutting-edge technology put to practical use!"

-- Premier Guitar

"You may find, as a result, that the EKKO can in fact improve the quality of your performance.”

-- Next sound

"with the AERO controller you can quickly and easily switch between the 3 controls on the pedal and then use the rotary control knob to adjust the level, feedback and delay time."

-- Guitar noize

Seen at

"...given the interest at the show, we doubt they'll have trouble reaching their funding goal."

-- Premier Guitar, Musikmesse 2014




Guitarists


“To have your effects parameters at your fingertips dramatically enhances the playing experience and paves the way for infinite new musical ideas.”

-- Jake Hertzog, award winning jazz guitarist and former columnist for Guitar Player Magazine

“Suddenly you can run delay-feedback-dives from anywhere on stage without being locked to the pedal board. Great!”

-- Magnus Børmark, guitarist in 22, previously Gåte


Watch Jake Hertzog demonstrate EKKO™+AERO™ here:




Solution

The classical stompbox has served us loyally since the 60s. Their position on the floor has enabled easy access with our feet. However in many situations it would be great with increased possibilities to access the pedal board.


The same way that our televisions finally got a remote controller many years ago, we have now developed the first remote controller for effects pedals. In this way your effects pedals are literally at your fingertips, whether it be in studio, at practice or live.

Imagine having the AERO™ when you are:

  • Altering effects at the edge of the stage

  • Setting up your pedal board

  • Transitioning into a guitar solo

  • Changing effects between songs

  • When stage-diving!




Aalberg Audio will deliver a range of different effects pedals that can be controlled with the wireless control unit AERO™. The first pedal, available for pre-order, is the EKKO™ delay pedal. The AERO™ controller will be compatible with future effects of Aalberg Audio. EKKO™+AERO™ is a package deal, but EKKO™ also works like a stand-alone effects pedal. The communication happens through Bluetooth Low Energy (by market leader Nordic Semiconductor) and has a range up to 98 feet/30m. EKKO™+AERO™ is delivered pre-paired. Pairing up multiple Aalberg Audio effects pedals to an existing controller is just a click away. 


Content

1x EKKO™+AERO™ package includes:

  • 1x EKKO™ delay pedal
  • 1x AERO™ wireless controller
  • USB cable for recharging the AERO™
  • 1x clip for belt or guitar strap attachment
  • 2x transparent & 2x black 3M Dual lock™ velcro pieces for guitar attachment
  • Cleaning sachet for mounting velcro
  • User Manual




AERO™ is the palm sized remote controller for the EKKO™ delay pedal. It is typically mounted to the guitar strap, belt or straight to the guitar. The AERO™ enables remote access to all parameters on the EKKO™ effects pedal.


Features

  • Adjust parameter settings instantly
  • Store/recall presets from anywhere on stage
  • Dedicated tap tempo button for delay time (on top of potentiometer)
  • Recharge battery through standard micro USB-connector (cable included)



    Mounting

    The AERO™ controller is mounted using the 3M Dual lock™ velcro or clip included in the package. Attaching the AERO™ is very flexible, but we usually attach it to the guitar, strap or belt. The clip solutions has been designed to sit firmly on most guitar straps.



    Specifications




    EKKO™ is a high-quality aluminium, standard semi-analog delay pedal. It can be controlled like a stand-alone effects pedal or using the AERO™ wireless controller. Aalberg Audio is also in the development process of a tablet/phone-app to control the EKKO™ and future Aalberg-effects (such as overdrive, tremolo and distortion).


    Features

      • Parameters: Delay Time, Delay Level and Feedback Rate
      • Up to 10 seconds delay time
      • True Bypass
      • Semi-analog delay pedal (100% analog direct signal)
      • Wireless transmission of effect´s parameter settings only (audio signal untouched)


          Specifications




          Perks

          This is an overview of what you get when you support the campaign. Pre-order now by selecting your perk from the sidebar on the top right of the page. 



          History

          It took the Aalberg Audio team a total of four years to develop EKKO™+AERO™ and the technology needed to control effects pedals using a wireless controller. Even though there was up to a dozen prototypes of EKKO™+AERO™ there were three key prototypes (2010, 2012 and 2013) and finally our Indiegogo delay effects pedal.


          Plan

          Below is a month by month plan towards the delivery of the perks in Aalberg Audio’s Indiegogo campaign .


          Status

          During the last four years, Aalberg Audio’s team has grown from one hopeful guitarist with a crazy idea to a carefully selected, highly skilled and enthusiastic team. Today, the EKKO™ guitar pedal and the AERO™ together stand as a finished market-ready product after several rounds of product design and electronic design as well as test production with established production partners. The development of EKKO™+AERO™ is ready and we have a working prototype. The last step is the setting up and running the production. The funding received through this campaign will enable us to follow through with our first production run.



          Meet the founders

          The inspiration for the EKKO™+AERO™ came to Aalberg Audio co-founder and guitarist Rune Aalberg Alstad after a night out with student friends in 2010 during which they'd been arguing about which were the best effects pedals on the market at that time. Suddenly Alstad realized that all the pedals shared a common flaw: they are all fixed to one position on stage. The sky opened up and the ideas for a remote controlled pedal just came pouring in. Alstad recalls grabbing the closest object he could write on and scribbling down the blue-print for a remotely controlled effects pedal.

          Rune used his idea to form the basis of a Masters degree in Music Technology at the Norwegian University of Science & Technology (NTNU). Rune teamed up with the engineer Torkild Indstøy (now Aalberg's CTO) and entrepreneur Aleksander Torstensen (now Aalberg's CEO). The team has grown since then with many contributors and advisors helping to make our innovative ideas into a reality.


           Aleksander Torstensen, CEO & Co-Founder

          Rune Aalberg Alstad, CPO, Co-Founder & inventor

          Torkild Indstøy, CTO & Co-Founder


          Technical patent: Norway (pending)

          Design patent: Norway (approved), EU (pending) and US (pending)

          Copyright © 2014 ● Aalberg Audio ® ● All Rights Reserved

story:
Music is More Than Sound, it's a Feeling

 

What We Have Done 

 

Our Mission

Full Body Sound started as a passion product for us. We love music and we love the combined experience of feeling our favorite songs while we listen to them. We also love extreme sports and (sometimes) this love resulted in minor injuries. With a TENS unit device in hand from physical therapy, and a desire for tactile audio-Full Body Sound was born. The more we shared it with friends and family the more we received the question, “Where can I get one of these?” We realized that it would be selfish to keep this experience to ourselves and are now happy to share it with you!

Full Body Sound Features

• Full stereo: Feel both left and right audio

• Multi-user compatible: Share a musical and electrical connection with a friend

• Compatible with TENS accessories: Turn your body into a custom speaker

• More than bass: Stimulate your body to the full spectrum of music- vocals, string instruments, and electric guitars

 

 

To Use

 

 
1. Choose a song, the device is synced (through Bluetooth or auxiliary cord) to speakers or headphones. This way you can listen to the audio while you feel it!
2. A pair of electrodes are placed on the skin of the user and electric current stimulates the muscles and nerves near the electrodes.
3. Full Body Sound technology alters the audio input and conditions it, allowing users to feel audio frequencies.
4. What you feel as a user varies from person to person. But, electrical stimulation contracts your muscles to the rhythm of the music wherever you choose. The user can choose to feel electric stimulation in a variety of places depending on the placement and location of electrodes. 

How it Feels

Have you ever played one of those old timey games at the carnival or arcade where you grabbed the metal knob and felt an exciting jolt with a friend? Or maybe you visited a museum where they had an exhibit describing electricity and how it travels from + to -. Full Body Sound electrically stimulates your muscles and nerves to the music with electrode pads on the surface of the skin.

Want to feel something different? Just shift the electrode just by half an inch, or try a new location. Muscle groups also play a big role in what you will feel. For example, fast twitch muscle groups (like your bicep) can physically move your muscles. While slow-twitch groups ( like your lower back) will yield the rhythmic sensation of what you are listening to without much muscle movement. 

These are some of our favorite placements:

Testimonials 

Our first time users are energized by the initial sensation. We love seeing what different music genres people want to feel.

 

Where We Have Been Featured

 

A Fully Immersive Experience

The portable nature of the FBS-1 makes it useful wherever you want to be fully immersed in your music: Festivals, concerts, with friends, relaxing at home.


 

How will you choose to FEEL MUSIC?

Here is video of us and our friends using "Ol' Blue" in Las Vegas, NV. 

 

How it Works

The fundamental technology behind Full Body Sound was derived from Transcutaneous Electrical Nerve Stimulation (TENS) devices. These medical devices have been around for decades and have offered pain relieve to hundreds of thousands of people.
 
 

Pre-Order, and Revolutionize the Way We Experience Music

You get our flagship product, a pocket size device that allows you to FEEL Music. We have created several iterations of working prototypes and have tested it on over 400 people. With this user feedback, we have improved the design to include: full stereo, high and low frequency stimulation, Bluetooth,  and a larger  rechargeable battery. The FBS-1 device comes ready to use with electrodes.  Help us revolutionize the way we experience music and transform our prototype into a product in your hands. 

What's in the Box

  • FBS-1 unit
  • 1 set of electrode pads
  • 1 USB charger cord

Music is For Everyone

Music lovers come in many different forms, and we believe music should be enjoyed by everyone. No matter what genre you like, if you are a festival goer, prefer relaxing at home, or are a member of the Deaf Community, we want to offer the fully immersive experience of the FBS-1 unit to everyone.

We had the pleasure of sharing Full Body Sound with Lori, a member of the Deaf Community, at the Collision Conference in 2018. This friendship opened our eyes to the possibilities of our technology. Lori had some limited low frequency hearing when she was young and then completely lost all hearing. She was able to feel some of her favorite songs long lost to her childhood, and for the first time in her life experienced birdsong.  People such as Lori and their experiences with Full Body Sound have fueled our drive forward to create a product we are proud of.

Check out our interview with Lori here: https://collisionconf.com/blog/achieving-impossible-machine-demo

Our Progress and Next Steps

We have come a long way. The journey from idea to thing has included several iterations of prototypes with new features. We have tested these, gotten feedback and have produced the FBS-1 unit! We are excited to share the fruit of our efforts with you.

You will help us prove that there is group of awesome people who want to Feel Music through electric stimulation.  We have set a $30,000 Goal for injection molds, production, and certifications. 

In the case we don’t meet our funding goal, we guarantee full money reimbursement to all contributors.

 

Full Body Sound offers a unique and customizable option for a tactile wearable. With Full Body Sound, you won’t be limited to bass or tactile location. We want this to be an item that all music lovers can enjoy, not just a select few. We have gone through several iterations of prototyping and through attending many events and venues we have been able to get valuable product feedback from over 400 people. We listened to what users said, and have worked on incorporating the capability to control the electrostimulation intensity as well as bluetooth capabilities. We also recognize that our tech has many other possible applications. We are excited to provide a tactile wearable to music lovers like us, but we also want to spend more time with the Deaf Community, VR/AR, and possibly delve into the Health Tech arena. With your help, we can open up this world of possibilities.

 

 

Risks & Challenges

Hardware, especially that which includes electricity, can be very tricky. To combat possible future issues, we have formed a community that can offer the expertise to help us get our product to you. We are members of SolderWorks, an innovation lab designed for entrepreneurial visionaries in the hardware space. The space provides the tools and connections we need to carry through for our backers. In order to keep costs down with our electronic parts, we have partnered closely with Arrow Electronics. We have visited their local office in Centennial, CO to make sure we can decrease the cost and streamline our design. We look forward to keeping our backers updated with both new successes as well as possible delays. We are born problem-solvers and we will keep backers informed on how we will solve issues.

Other Ways You Can Help

We get it. You like the idea of FEELING music and you want to help revolutionize  how we experience audio but you don't have the cash to by a unit. That does not mean you cant help. Click "Back It" at the top of the page to contribute to our campaign. Every dollar and every backer matter. 

 

We also would love your help making some noise! Know someone else who loves music and might enjoy Full Body Sound?-Share our campaign with them. Also, check out the Indiegogo share tool- it provides an easy way to get the info right into their hands. It takes a community to revolutionize the way we experience music, we need your help!

Our Team

Allison & Griffin

 

Husband and wife team Allison and Griffin Hale created Full Body Sound as a way to become more fully immersed in the music they love. They realized that adding a tactile dimension enriched the listening experience and that music is more than just sound, it’s a feeling. With Griffin’s engineering and technical background, and Allison’s problem solving and entrepreneurial spirit, they have brought their idea to life and are excited to share a new way to experience music.

Steven Dourmashkin

Steven met the team at an airport in New Orleans after an event and has been a wonderful asset providing product development consulting for Full Body Sound. Steven earned his B.S. and M.Eng. in Mechanical Engineering from Cornell University, where he founded his company Specdrums.

story:
Your AxumGear Earbuds Will NEVER Fall

 

The World's Best Wireless Workout Earbuds

You're One Step Away From A Better Workout...

Connectivity

If you ever bought true wireless earbuds that you already know what's out there, and there's a good reason why you're here looking for your next pair. 

Our customized chipset solution will take care of your signal so you will never ever experience those signal drops again, no matter if your phone is in your front or back pocket or maybe even in the backpack. It's kind alike having a wireless wire.

Fit

It'll never make you stop your workout and adjust your earbuds position 

It will NEVER FALL regardless of your ear shape and size.

Thanks to 18 different size combinations you get in each package,

you can be sure that with AxumGear earbuds you'll find your perfect match.

What You’ll Receive

True Wireless Earbuds

Silicone Jackets—3 Sizes (S, M and L)

Silicone Ear Tips—3 Sizes (S, M and L)

Foam Ear Tips—3 Sizes (S, M and L)

Portable Charging Case

Charging Cable For The Case

3 Hours Playtime

6 Recharges using the portable charging case

Portable Charging Case with 2500mAh

Wireless charging

Full Recharge in 60 minutes

Industry Leading Designers 

Adjustable Hook To Fit All Ear Sizes And Shapes

Each set included 3 different sizes of silicone jackets + 3 different sizes of ear tips so you'll definitely find the best combination for you. 

With 9 different size combinations, you will definitely find the best fit for you, regardless of your ear size, shape or sports activity you plan to do with it.

One of the most important things to us while creating your Axum earbuds was the fit and to make sure it will NEVER FALL OUT OF YOUR EARS, what's the best way to do it? TEST, TEST, and TEST few more times. 

So in the last months, we've been trying almost any sports activity that you can think of, such as crossfit , lifting, cycling, parkour, running and more ...

2 x Built-In microphones, 1 in each earpiece ( Left & Right )

Can be used as mono and stereo

Omnidirectional Microphone - Cancelling background noises (wind, street noise, etc )

Running low on audio juice? No worries—charging our Bluetooth, True Wireless earbuds is as hassle-free as possible. To charge them, simply place them in their Charging Case. There’s a designated space for each bud, but even if your placement is off, magnets bring the earbuds into place so timely charging can begin.

Up to 10 meters range

Will never drop signal

put your phone in the pocket, in your bag or on your armband

 

Dynamic Driver

CSR Apt-X Codec

10mm Speaker Driver

 

Axum Gear: True Wireless Earbuds for Extreme Athletes

Whether pumping iron at the gym or pushing both your body and sanity to the limits at a nearby skate park, extreme athletes are motivated to the max. They expect only the absolute best from themselves. Likewise, the gear they use must perform on a similar level—this is where Axum Gear’s True Wireless earbuds come alive.

Sweat is the stuff of grit, determination and personal resolve, but to make it to the top, you’ll need all the help you can get. Kick tangled wires, poor sound quality and bulky, ill-fitting headphones to the curb. Axum’s take on earbuds was not only designed for extreme athletes, but by extreme athletes. No corner-cutting, here …

 

 

When we say “True Wireless,” we mean it. Using Bluetooth 4.1 Technology, our buds allow for complete freedom of movement—no strings (or wires) attached.

 

 

Though total domination is the end goal for all fitness gurus and fearless athletes, each is unique. Our earbuds’ Adjustable Hook makes Universal Fit a reality.

 

You put your body through hell to transform it. Traditional headphones weren’t meant to tag along—our earbuds are small and compact enough to do so.

 

Quit fumbling with wires—having strategically placed magnets in each charging port, our innovative earbuds fall into proper place and immediately take in energy.

 

Remember that “charging port” of which was previously made mention? It’s conveniently the case, giving you 4 hours of playtime, and 4 hours of playtime in the case.


 

Maximizing your athletic output means sweat—lots of it. Liquipel’s Nanotech Waterproof Coating, means your earbuds won’t throw in the towel.

Along with a waterproof nano-coating, our state-of-the-art Silicon Jackets make for the perfect one-two punch. Trust us—these earbuds aren’t falling out anytime soon.

 

No matter how long you’ve given your mind and body all you’ve got, life happens. Should a call come in, use our Built-In Microphone to keep up.

 

Technology & Performance Without Wires

Wires are for 90s home phones—not your go-to pair of competitive earbuds. Using the power of Bluetooth 4.1 Technology, our fast-paced audio enhancers are optimized for low-battery use and perform flawlessly within a 10-meter range. 

 

Under The Hood 

Noise Cancellation

Bluetooth 4.1

Up to 10 meters range

Built-In Mic

Magnetic Hassle-Free charging

Waterproof double nanocoating

Battery

Battery 90mAh

Playtime 4 hours

Recharge fully in 60 min

Sound

Dynamic Driver Speaker

AptX coded CSR

20Hz – 20kHz

Impedance 16 Omh

10mm speaker

The Making Of Axum

 

What's the secret sauce ? to work with the best !

 

Axum earbuds designed by the industrial design legends BebopDesigners , leading agency that created some of the best earphones out there today . Got many awards for their work and few of their recent crowdfunding campaigns become world’s best sellers .

 

Axum’s Innovative Team

We want to know about you—your passions, goals and exactly what you’ve done to get to where you’re at today. For now, though, it’s our turn to introduce ourselves …

Share To Support

We Need Your Help

 

Here at Axum Gear, we recognize that we’re part of a larger community of extreme sports enthusiasts. It doesn’t matter if you lift weights, run marathons, skate, snowboard or surf. As fully committed athletes, we’re in this together—we push, grind and make the most out of what we’re given. While others might call it quits, we press on …

Currently, we find ourselves at an important stage in our company’s progression. Without the necessary funding, we’re stuck. With your support, however, tenacious athletes from all over the world will have access to our one-of-a-kind earbuds. Here on Indiegogo, we kindly ask that you back our project—anything helps.

Lift Where You Stand

To make our unprecedented earbud project a reality, we’ll need your help with funding, but we’ll need something else, too—social promotion. From Facebook and Twitter to Instagram and Snapchat, each and every one of us is active on at least on social network.

So, using the link to this page, please share our project with family, friends and other devoted athletes like you. Together, we’ll not only make audio history, we’ll be elevating our commitment to the very athletic passions that drive us each and every day.

Feel free to include us in your posts, tweets and stories …

        

FAQs

 

Q - How long does Axum’s battery last?

A. Playtime is 4 hours, with an additional 4 hours in the portable charging case.

Q - Can Axum’s earbuds be used under a helmet?

A. Yes, thanks to Axum’s compact design, you’ll be able to use our earbuds under your helmet. Keep in mind, however, that you’ll need to press the earpiece to answer calls, so when wearing a helmet, keep your smartphone within reach.

Q - Can these earbuds be used in a single-mono setting?

A. No, our earbuds can only be used for stereo listening. Also, both the left and right earbuds must be worn for maximum audio enjoyment.

Q - Can I use these earbuds to answer phone calls?

A. Yes, there’s a built-in mic for phone calls, Siri, Google Now, etc.

Q - What’s the standby time like?

A. Standby time is about 200 hours.

Q - How many recharges can a fully-charged case provide?

A. You can recharge our earbuds 5 times before needing to charge the case again.

Q - When I decide to take out my earbuds, where can I store them?

A. There’s a leash included with the case we send our customers, in case you want to take out your earbuds to speak with someone.

Q - What devices will Axum’s earbuds work with?

A. Our earbuds work with any Bluetooth 3.0 device and up, so you shouldn’t have an issue connecting them to any electronic device manufactured after 2011.

Q - Can these earbuds connect to 2 devices at the same time?

A. No, they can only be paired with 1 device at a time.

Q - Are these earbuds waterproof?

A. Yes, they’re waterproof. However, we don’t recommend swimming with them.

Q - What’s Axum’s product warranty like?

A. Our earbuds come with a 2-year warranty. This warranty starts when you receive your earbuds, not when an order is placed.

story:
"It's history melded with modern technology"

"BT speakers crafted from vintage wood"

"An elegant, powerful wooden bluetooth speaker"

  "the world’s first Ancient Kauri wooden Bluetooth speaker"

   "Petite Square: A Sleek Wooden Bluetooth Speaker"

  "It is promised to provide a high quality sound"

    "The simple and elegant design encloses a first-class sound quality system and Bluetooth features"

     "An actually different Bluetooth speaker" 

 

 

 

THE STORY

Born in a small family-owned woodworking workshop in Burbank, California, Petite Square is the result of utilizing unique craftsmanship skills that were passed from our past generations. Our passion of working with rare and precious woods took another phase when we heard and felt the harmonical beauty of a violin made with 50,000 years old Ancient Kauri wood. The prominence of the sensation was so substantial that we promised ourselves to bring the natural harmonical and aesthetical beauty of the Ancient Kauri wood to music enthusiasts. To achieve our vision we asked the help of a two renowned local sound engineers to develop the world's first Ancient Kauri wooden Bluetooth speaker.

 

THE WOOD

Ancient Kauri is the oldest timber in the world that can be hand-crafted into wooden pieces of art. Native to New Zealand, Ancient Kauri has been preserved underground in a perfectly balanced bog environment. Coming from the Kauri forests that grew 45 to 50 millenniums ago, some of these Kauri trees grew for 600 to 2,000 years before falling from natural causes. Buried under a peat swamp by an unexplained act of nature, the trees have survived the centuries underground, sealed in a chemically balanced environment that has preserved the timber in perfect condition. Today, the Ancient Kauri logs are being extracted from the north island of New Zealand.

At 50,000 years old, this relatively rare, expensive, and captivating wood, predates the migration of Neanderthals, the arrival of Homo Sapiens, and all the cave paintings in Europe. In another words, when you hold a Petite Square, you are holding a piece of organic history. 

Ancientwood.com

 

THE DESIGN

Contemporary, the element of being simple but beautiful. The element that our company is based on. The design was a very critical part of the process in bringing Petite Square to life. Complimenting Ancient Kauri's amazing history with today's design standards, we gave Petite Square straight rigid edges, making it into a perfect palm-fitting cube. Precision hand sanded straight and wide surfaces show the Ancient Kauri's beautiful grains, and brings the harmony between the modern minimalistic design and the history that each piece of Ancient Kauri tells.

 

THE SOUND

Just as Petite Square's design is quietly admirable, the delivery of flawless sound from the 2" full-range speaker is equally impressive. Exceptional harmonical properties of Ancient Kauri emanate a rich high-fidelity sound with crystal clear details and warm bass response. To achieve the petite palm-fitting size, we have designed a passive non-powered bass radiator that is driven by the force of the speaker and contributes in naturally amplifying the bass response. At 5 watts, the advanced 2" speakerdriver with Titanium cone and Neodymium rare earth magnet, the legendary CLASS T TRIPATH amplifier, and the carefully tuned proprietary passive bass radiator deliver a performance that we have only seen in considerably larger speakers.

Also, we saw sometimes there is a need to combine the souls of two Petite Squares into one stereo system. Because Bluetooth technology doeasn't allow linking two speakers wirelessly, we designed a linking system to link the two speakers in a stereo form by using the supplied 3.5mm linking cable and add even more depth to the already warm and organic sound.

STEREO LINK

THE BLUETOOTH

In order to harmonize the speaker's external and internal qualities, we have used CLASS 1 Bluetooth technology instead of the widely-used CLASS 2. The CLASS 1 Bluetooth has a range of 100 feet comparing to CLASS 2 which is only 30 feet. This not only means you get the freedom of moving around, accomplishing tasks without getting disconnected, but also means a much better sound quality. Bluetooth is designed to keep a balance between staying connected to the music source and quality of the sound. Better quality sound means greater data transfer which becomes tough when the distance between the speaker and the music source increases. Therefore, even tough the regular CLASS 2 technology has a maximum range of 30 feet, as the distance increases and gets closer to the maximum range, the sound quality decreases in order to keep the connection.

We solved this issue by using the advanced Bluetooth CLASS 1 technology which has the exceptional 100 feet range. This means a higher distance range of high-fidelity sound quality is achieved.

 

THE BATTERY

Being petite, small and truly portable didn't stop Petite Square from having a powerful 2500mah custom designed Lipo battery. This means having an astounding 15+ hours of battery life. 

 

THE COLORS

Different people, different personalities, but one love for music. That's a slogan that we want to reflect on by offering different color options while preserving the natural aesthetics of the Ancient Kauri wood.

SUSTAINABILITY

Since we use a wood which comes from the remaining of trees that are from 50,000 years ago, no live trees are harvested. Also, Ancient Kauri is RELATIVELY rare and that means, it might not be suitable for mass-producing violins, but interestingly about 100 Petite Squares could be made from the same block of wood used to make a single violin.

OUR STATUS

We brought this project from sketches drawn on napkins to a fully working piece. We have designed, engineered, and crafted petite square to the very last detail. In order to make this well thought product available to you at the price point we promised, we need to reach our fixed goal of $45000 and meet the minimum needed order quantity. We have already partnered with the Ancient Kauri importer in Wisconsin, the Bluetooth modules and electronics supplier in Arizona, and the speaker drivers supplier in Ohio. Because each speaker is going to be hand-crafted and assembled here in Burbank, California, we have asked the help of a number local craftsmen and craftswomen in making these flawless pieces of art.

We are asking your help in making our vision of seeing petite square in every music enthusiast's hand, a reality. Thank you!

 

TIMELINE:

     April 2012:

  • The inspiration
  • The idea and the concept

     May 2012:

  • Designing 

     June, July 2012:

  • Engineering 

     August 2012

  • Finding Suppliers and quoting

     September, October and November 2012: 

  • Making prototypes
  • Field testing 
  • Finalizing

     December 2012:

  • Preparing the campaign                                                                           
  • Finding the plausible campaign funding goal and, the campaign and                                   retail price points based on the minimum order needed

     January 16, 2013 - March 4, 2013:

  • Indiegogo Campaign 

     March 2013:

  • Ordering the electronics and the wood
  • Preparing the wood

     April, May, and June 2013:

  • Hand-crafted production in Burbank,Ca
  • Hand-assembling in Burbank,Ca                                                              
  • Quality evaluation of the sound and craft of each speaker in Burbank,Ca

     July 2013: 

  • Shipping from Burbank,Ca

 

Technical Specifications:

  

The Comparison Chart:

 

Included Items:

  • Petite Square Wooden Bluetooth Speaker
  • Certification of the wood's authenticity
  • International micro USB charger (not included with the BASIC version)
  • Cotton Carrying Bag
  • 3' (1m) Linking Cable (not included with the BASIC version)
  • 3' (1m) AUX Cable
  • Manual

 

                                        www.PetiteSquare.com

 

 

 

 International Coverage:

-Russia

"A Bluetooth Speaker from the remainings of 50,000 year old trees"

      -BELARUS

"A small American company is developing Bluetooth-speakers"

    -FRANCE

"In the palm of the hand, it is a self-amplified speaker with Tripath amplifier" 

  -ROMANIA

"Bluetooth speakers with 50,000 year old wooden cabinet"

  -RUSSIA

"enjoy the unique dynamics"

story:
JackSafe - the first and the best magnetic audio jack connector.

There are already plenty of magnetic adapters for Lightning and Micro-USB that make connection safe and easy. But we found that there are no audio jack adapters that can do this function well.

Perhaps many times you faced a situation when something pulls the wire of your headphones connected to the phone, laptop or any other device and your device drops to the floor or some damage done to the wire or the connector. Then JackSafe is made for you.

JackSafe is solving the problem of broken headphone wires and devices forever.

JackSafe also helps to significantly reduce the wear and tear of audio connector due to often connection and disconnection.

Here are most common reasons for headphones cable mechanical failures. 

JackSafe solves the forced tearing problem and prevents excessive bending of headphones cable.

The design process of JackSafe took us more than two years to make it perfect. We worked through all the details that will make JackSafe a great product. After several redesigns and iterations, we finally made the best version of it.

We have already made a working JackSafe prototype, here how it works:

 

JackSafe could be easily used while doing sports or any other activities. The connection is strong enough to withstand shaking.

JackSafe can be connected to almost any device with a standard 3.5mm headphone jack (phones, computers, audio-players, consumer, and professional-grade audio equipment).

JackSafe works with almost any type of phone cases (we tested the thickness of up to 1.5mm).

JackSafe can be successfully used if you have several devices and need to switch headphones between them (you will need two sets of JackSafe connectors).

 

JackSafe is designed by the team with more than 9 years of experience in mass production of audio equipment. We are located in Shenzhen China, which gives us the fastest access to the whole range of components and factories.

 

 

 

Shipping 

We are able to ship worldwide. VAT and GST not included. Please see reward details for the shipping cost that applies to you.

When will we start shipping?

All pre-orders for JackSafe sets will be shipped in April 2018*. We will keep you up to date on our progress and the expected delivery date of your order.    

*Actual shipping dates may vary. We will keep you notified of your product ship date.

Why order now?

By backing now you'll get to own one of the very first JackSafe magnetic audio adapters off the line plus exclusive access to prices only available during the Indiegogo campaign. 

Help out by sharing with friends

Have a friend who could need JackSafe? Want to share? Just 30 seconds of your time could make the difference in growing the community. Hit one of the sharing buttons on top of the page and tag a friend or coworker who needs this!

The more people who know about the JackSafe project, the larger our community will become, the faster we will get to production.

Let's do this!

 

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

Please contact us via email: pr@thejacksafe.com to get a guaranteed reply within 24 hours!

What is it?

JackSafe is Magnetic 3,5mm audio jack adapter. This adapter helps to prolong the life of original audio jack and audio port of your device. It will save your device or headphone if something accidentally pulls the wire.

 Who created it?

We're a team of 4 who came from a variety of backgrounds including engineering, design and commercial manufacturing. We are living in Shenzhen and professionally involved in producing OEM audio products.

 Why should we use it?

Due to the force needed to insert and remove the audio connector, device audio socket cloud break over time. So if you need to often switch between multiple devices, JackSafe will help. JackSafe is also useful in these kinds of situations: someone knocked on the door and you go to open the door, someone called you and you go to respond, you feel thirsty and you go to drink some water, but each time you forgot that you have headsets in your ears, then JackSafe is definitely for you.

 We aimed higher to ensure JackSafe is a perfect balance of form, function, and style.

 What is the price?

Our Super early bird backers can get JackSafe at as low as $19 - up to 29% off the retail price of $27.

 Where can we buy it?

Right here on Indiegogo! Pre-order yours today to be one of the first people to get the JackSafe connector.

 What do we get when we order?

Depending on chosen pack beginning from 1 set (1 phone end and 1 cable end)

 Why are you crowdfunding?

We love crowdfunding! For us, it's a perfect solution to ensure we meet minimum order quantities for the first production batch - our tooling is done and we're ready to scale up our manufacturing.

 

Product features

Which phones does it work with?

We tested with iPhone, Nokia, HTC, Blackberry, Samsung, Xiaomi, Meizu phones, of course, we cannot test it with all phones on the market, but we can assure you it will work with 97% of devices that has a universal headphone jack connector.

What colors do you offer?

Due to high demands of minimum order quantity for the first batch, we decided to choose only the black color.

Will it support headset detection on the phone?

Unfortunately, it cannot detect the earphones or headsets connection. When the JackSafe's phone part is inserted into the phone (or other audio devices), the phone will always think that the headset is connected, it will keep playing music even if the second part of JackSafe is disconnected. So it will require stopping music manually. 

What is the size of the JackSafe

The size can be checked in the JackSafe drawing on the campaign page.

Will it work with my phone case?

We tested our prototype with many cases and found that it fit almost all cases if the thickness at the place of connection of the case does not exceed 1,5mm.

What are additional features available?

JackSafe will align itself, just put two parts of it close to each other and it will connect itself in the right way.

I used to catch my falling phone by pulling the earphones wire. Will JackSafe save my device in a similar situation?

No, JackSafe is designed to prevent the cable from breaking or your devices like laptops from being cracked to the floor due to accidental pulling. We do not recommend to rely on the earphones wire when the phone is falling. First of all earphones cable can be destroyed, second device audio port also can be broken. Please use rugged phone cases to protect your phones, some of them can be really slim and good looking meanwhile they can stand drops from 30ft.

How will it help to prolong the life of my device audio port?

 Every connector has a limited lifetime, which is measured in plug/unplug cycles. Especially when an accidental pulling force applied to the audio jack it can be damaged. Thanks to magnetic connection JackSafe will simply disconnect saving your audio jack from wearing out.

Is it can be used as a waterproof plug for audio jack?

Jack safe can be used as a dustproof plug, but it's not waterproof.

Where is it manufactured?

In Shenzhen, China ?our team is located in China permanently to oversee the full production process.

 

Shipping

When does shipping begin?

Shipping for all sets will be in April 2018.

When can we expect it to reach our doorsteps?

All orders are expected to be delivered to your doorsteps for the end of April 2018.

Where does it ship?

We're proud to ship our JackSafe magnetic adapters worldwide. Shipping rates vary depending on your country.

How much is shipping?

Please see reward details for all locations. Local taxes not included.

I'm interested in a distribution partnership.

Please contact pr@thejacksafe.com and include in your email the region(s) you distribute to.

Do I have to pay VAT / GST?

Yes, depending on your location, you may have to pay VAT/GST, but in some countries, you don't have to pay a tax because JackSafe is small, not expensive item.

 

Customer Service

Is there a warranty?

Yes, all of our audio adapters come with a 3 months warranty. This warranty covers manufacturing defects. It does not cover gradual wear throughout it's lifetime that is to be expected from normal use.

How do I order extra sets of JackSafe?

Check out our 2-sets perks or just pre-order again for another set.

What is your refund policy during the Indiegogo campaign?

See these steps on How to Request a Refund. During the Indiegogo campaign, you can process the refund at any time by contacting support@indiegogo.com or searching their help center. Refunds are processed on a case-by-case basis; at some point, we will need to lock refunds in order to go into production & shipment. We will not be able to refund orders once they've shipped.

What is your return/exchange policy?

If you received your product and you aren't satisfied, you may exchange it for a new one within 30 days, you will need to bear shipping & handling fees. Indiegogo does process refunds during the campaign. If you would like a refund, we're sorry to see you go. Please see here for How to Request a Refund. 

How can I check the status of my pre-order?

By pre-ordering through Indiegogo, you automatically have an account created. Log back into Indiegogo using the email you pre-ordered, to verify your information.

If I have other questions, who should I contact?

For press, if you want exclusive article contact: pr@thejacksafe.com
Support: Please contact us via email: pr@thejacksafe.com  to get a guaranteed reply within 24 hours!

 

Risks & Challenges

Our team consists of professionals with more than 9 years of experience in earphones design and engineering. We are living in China for years designing, developing and manufacturing products for export, we are conversant in the language, adept at the business culture, and has a strong network. With our experience in manufacturing, we will try our best to minimize all risks. At the current stage, with prototype and testing were done, we don't foresee any issues with getting this product to the market. All we need is your backing!

Link to the press kit.

story:
We believe smart devices should be more inclusive, and assistive devices deserve more design and innovation. The low demand for assistive devices have led to high cost and little innovation. While mobile phones have gotten smarter with each passing day, assistive devices like the door bell for the deaf has pretty much remained the same all these years. 

We are here to change this. 

We designed StickEar, a smart sound alert system. This is not simply for those with hearing loss, but for anyone else who has a need - the elderly, people who live or work in noisy environments, or families who want to monitor specific areas in their homes.


StickEar translates sound events into visual alerts. It is beautifully designed and packed with additional features that would better allow any person to be more aware of important sound events. StickEar has inbuilt sensors that can detect door knocks/movement, doorbells, smoke/fire alarms and baby cries. It then alerts the user through multiple wireless light modules - Lumies. 


Stay Alert.

Want to know if someone is entering or leaving the house? StickEar can alert you when it detects door movement. StickEar is equipped with a reliable knock detection algorithm. Now you don't have to be worried about not receiving an important visitor or delivery any more.

Regular doorbells can come in a variety of different sounds. You can also train your StickEar to recognise the sound of your doorbell. Family members can hear the doorbell, while the deaf and elderly can be visually alerted at the same time by Lumies. You can also place it on windows.



Feel safe and assured. 

StickEar can be trained to recognise the sound of the fire/smoke alarm at home. In the event of an emergency, StickEar will be able to detect the alarm sound and activate all the Lumies at home with bright flashes.

Alternatively, you can set your StickEar into general alarm monitoring mode, in which it will be triggered when it hears a loud persistent sound. This could be an indication of something important that needs further investigation and attention.


Give your immediate attention to your loved ones

We know how difficult it is to take care of a baby, and how important it is to give all the love and attention you child needs. StickEar can detect the cries of your baby and Lumies can alert you while you are in another location in the house. 



Lumies are intelligent light modules that wirelessly communicate with StickEar. They can be configured to glow and light up in different colours to convey notifications from StickEar sensors. 

Subscribing to notifications from a StickEar sensor is simple. A user simply brings StickEar close to a Lumie Light and press the pair button on StickEar. The Lumie light will flash to indicate a successful pairing. Multiple Lumies can be paired with StickEar. Also, Lumies  relay information between each other, extending its wireless range to reach difficult corners in the house or building.


Lumies come in two form factors -  A standard E27 Edison Bulb or as a battery powered light block. The Lumie bulb is exceptionally bright as a visual notification, and can be a permanent fixture in a room. Lumie blocks are smaller portable lights which are less intrusive, and easy to carry around. They are useful if you want an ambient personal notification without intruding others. Bring along a Lumie block and StickEar while you are travelling for work or holidays.



Here are some of the many comments that we have received during beta testing:

"My current doorbell system works with only 1 light. With StickEar and multiple Lumies I can be notified anywhere in the house."

"I can bring StickEar and a Lumie block when I go on a holiday and use it in the hotel room. I don't have to worry about staying alone in the room, and not be able to hear someone at the door or if a fire alarm goes off."

"I stay in a two storey house. Sometimes I can't hear my baby upstairs while I am in the kitchen on the ground floor. I can definitely use a Lumie in the kitchen."

"My grandmother has poor hearing. Sometimes when I visit her, she can't hear me while I knock on the door. The Lumie bulb is very bright. Putting one in the living room will be great since she can notice the flashing light easily."

"I play computer games in my room with the headphones on. I can use StickEar to know when my parents are back home, so I can quickly go back to my assignments." 


Here is a list of deaf organisations whom  we have partnered with, and will be receiving the StickEars generously donated by you.


  • Dr. Reijntjes School for the Deaf, Sri Lanka (http://www.schoolforthedeaf.lk)

  • The Singapore Association for the Deaf (http://sadeaf.org.sg)

  • Deaf Sports Association Singapore (http://www.dsa.org.sg)

  • ExtraOrdinary Horizons (http://www.eohorizons.com)

We will be updating this campaign page and also our webpage with photos and letters from the various deaf associations upon receiving your kind donations of StickEar. Each StickEar will come with a thank you card which will be filled up by a recipient and sent back to supporters who opt to donate a set of StickEars. For those who contribute to the StickEar Money Jar reward, your name will be listed in our website's hall of fame.

If you belong to a deaf organisation and would like to be a partner with us to receive StickEar from our Indiegogo supporters, please send us an email at: founders@stickear.com



We're a team of  engineers, computer scientists and academics based in Singapore. StickEar is a collaboration between the Augmented Human Lab at the Singapore University of Technology and Design, and Embodied Sensing, a Singapore startup company.



There are inherent challenges in building hardware but we got it all worked out from design, software, electronics, suppliers, financing, all the way to distribution.

We are not starting from scratch. Our team has extensive experience in acoustics signal processing and electronics design. The design has been repeatedly prototyped and iterated upon with rigorous testing and feedback from beta testers. Our software and electronics design is almost final and we are putting the finishing touches to the industrial design. The images you see are actual devices and not renderings. That is how close we are to delivering you a great product. We believe that our timeline is realistic. We will be working with an experienced contract manufacturer who has already helped many other projects to deliver.


What is the listening range of StickEar?

The listening range of StickEar depends on the loudness of the sound. As a reference, it can detect the sound of a baby crying within a 5 meter range.

What is the battery life of StickEar?

We have optimised the power consumption of StickEar and it can last for up to 3 months on a single battery charge.

Does StickEar require a Wifi connection?

StickEar and Lumies uses the Zigbee wireless communication protocol which operates at 2.4 GHz. You don't need to have Wifi in order to use StickEar and Lumies.

How many types of sounds can StickEar hear?

Currently, StickEar can hear and recognise the following sounds reliably:

  • Door Knock
  • Baby Cries
  • Door Bells
  • Fire Alarms

Can StickEar hear other sounds?

There is an option to set StickEar to operate in a general sound monitoring mode in which it can be triggered by any loud sound. There is also a general alarm monitoring mode in which only a loud continuous sound can trigger it.

How do I train StickEar to recognise the sound of my door bell and fire/smoke alarm?

It is easy to train your StickEar. Just set your StickEar into training mode, play the same sound to it 2 to 3 times. If the sound matches, it will be successfully trained. StickEar will now be able to recognise this new sound and send notifications to Lumies.

Can I have multiple StickEars notifying Lumies?

Yes, you can use multiple StickEars with multiple Lumies.

I live in two storey house. Can a StickEar on the ground floor notify a Lumie on the second floor?

StickEar and Lumies have a wireless range of up to 50m. The range will be reduced if there are solid walls in between a StickEar and Lumie. However, Lumies can forward notifications between each other. So if you have problems with a Lumie that is out of range from a StickEar, you can place another Lumie in between them. 

How do I personalise the colour of my Lumie?

You can personalise the colour of a Lumie and assign a different colour for each type of notification. This can be done directly using the controls on StickEar.

I would like to give my StickEar to a deaf organisation of my choice/ I know a deaf organisation that would like to receive StickEar.

Please send us an email at: founders@stickear.com. We will be more than happy to send StickEars to the organisation of your choice.

How do I know if the deaf organisation received the StickEar I donated?

We will ask our partner deaf organisations to provide a notice of acceptance upon receiving StickEars. These notices will be put up on this campaign page and also on our website.

Each StickEar will come with a thank you card which will be filled up by a recipient and sent back to supporters who opt to donate a set of StickEars. For those who contribute to the StickEar Money Jar reward, your name will be listed in our website's hall of fame.
If you belong to a deaf organisation and would like to be a partner with us to receive StickEar from our Indiegogo supporters, please send us an email at: founders@stickear.com
















We're a team of  engineers, computer scientists and academics based in Singapore. StickEar is a collaboration between the Augmented Human Lab at the Singapore University of Technology and Design, and Embodied Sensing, a Singapore startup company.









There are inherent challenges in building hardware but we got it all worked out from design, software, electronics, suppliers, financing, all the way to distribution.
We are not starting from scratch. Our team has extensive experience in acoustics signal processing and electronics design. The design has been repeatedly prototyped and iterated upon with rigorous testing and feedback from beta testers. Our software and electronics design is almost final and we are putting the finishing touches to the industrial design. The images you see are actual devices and not renderings. That is how close we are to delivering you a great product. We believe that our timeline is realistic. We will be working with an experienced contract manufacturer who has already helped many other projects to deliver.



What is the listening range of StickEar?
The listening range of StickEar depends on the loudness of the sound. As a reference, it can detect the sound of a baby crying within a 5 meter range.
What is the battery life of StickEar?
We have optimised the power consumption of StickEar and it can last for up to 3 months on a single battery charge.

Does StickEar require a Wifi connection?
StickEar and Lumies uses the Zigbee wireless communication protocol which operates at 2.4 GHz. You don't need to have Wifi in order to use StickEar and Lumies.
How many types of sounds can StickEar hear?
Currently, StickEar can hear and recognise the following sounds reliably:
Door Knock
Baby Cries
Door Bells
Fire Alarms
Can StickEar hear other sounds?
There is an option to set StickEar to operate in a general sound monitoring mode in which it can be triggered by any loud sound. There is also a general alarm monitoring mode in which only a loud continuous sound can trigger it.
How do I train StickEar to recognise the sound of my door bell and fire/smoke alarm?It is easy to train your StickEar. Just set your StickEar into training mode, play the same sound to it 2 to 3 times. If the sound matches, it will be successfully trained. StickEar will now be able to recognise this new sound and send notifications to Lumies.Can I have multiple StickEars notifying Lumies?Yes, you can use multiple StickEars with multiple Lumies.I live in two storey house. Can a StickEar on the ground floor notify a Lumie on the second floor?StickEar and Lumies have a wireless range of up to 50m. The range will be reduced if there are solid walls in between a StickEar and Lumie. However, Lumies can forward notifications between each other. So if you have problems with a Lumie that is out of range from a StickEar, you can place another Lumie in between them. How do I personalise the colour of my Lumie?You can personalise the colour of a Lumie and assign a different colour for each type of notification. This can be done directly using the controls on StickEar.I would like to give my StickEar to a deaf organisation of my choice/ I know a deaf organisation that would like to receive StickEar.Please send us an email at: founders@stickear.com. We will be more than happy to send StickEars to the organisation of your choice.How do I know if the deaf organisation received the StickEar I donated?We will ask our partner deaf organisations to provide a notice of acceptance upon receiving StickEars. These notices will be put up on this campaign page and also on our website.

story:
#Update: Manufacturing in Process

 

Bluetooth speakers have given us the freedom to enjoy music anytime, anywhere, but they haven’t been able to bring a truly free, positionable stereo sound experience — until now!  

With the latest Bluetooth 4.2 TWS (True Wireless Stereo), we created MiniS so that you can experience stereo sound no matter where you are. Rich, beautiful sound in a conveniently-positionable magnetic package.

Elegant Design

With the magnetic back, MiniS speakers can be attached to any metal surface, letting you position them for optimal sound reproduction. But we didn’t stop there — we also designed small magnetic stickers that’ll affix to almost any surface, so even if there’s nothing metal around, you’re still covered.

Equipped with the latest TWS (True Wireless Stereo) Technology, we have made the real breakthrough by eliminating the wire between the traditional two speakers, allowing you to enjoy true wireless stereo, effortlessly.

Our latest Bluetooth 4.2 has not only provided much faster transmission and more safety but also promised wireless connection up to 33 ft, letting you enjoy the music across your rooms.

Exquisite, Balanced Sound Boasts Clear Treble and Vocals and Deep, Rich Bass

MiniS speakers offer a stereo sound experience you can take anywhere. With the 33 mm full-range NdFeB strong magnet and aluminum alloy cone, we took our sound in a new direction. Every direction.

Clear Distinction Between Left and Right Channels  

It’s our best-performing portable speaker, engineered to spread deep, jaw-dropping 360° sound. Also features built-in microphone for taking calls.

With our accessories, the MiniS Speakers can accompany you on any of your outdoor activities.

We tested for countless hours to get a pair of speakers that’ll hold up to any sport.

With a smaller form factor and similar weight to an iPhone, the MiniS Speakers are ultra-portable and so light you'll forget you’re even carrying them.  

But it wouldn’t be adventure-ready without an epic battery life — so we designed the MiniS speakers to have an 8-hour battery life, replenishable on only a 50-minute charge.

Three Ways to Use

Use them individually, you'll get two little independently-pairable little speakers.

Use them synced but positioned apart for fully immersive stereo sound on the go.

Or, snap them together for optimal sound quality in a compact package.

One second pairing, powerful gain, elegant design, and quick charging — the MiniS Speakers are sure to be the best, most portable personal stereo speakers you can buy.

 

FAQ

1. When will you ship MiniS?

We’ll deliver them on October 2017.

 

2.How will I know it will support my phone, tablet or computer?

Bluetooth is a global standard designed to work on any device. If your device has Bluetooth, it will work with MiniS.

 

3. Is Bluetooth 4.2 compatible with the previous versions?

Yes, they are fully compatible.

 

4. How strong is the magnetic attraction? Will it drop off during sports time?

The magnetic attraction is so strong that it will not part until you separate them with force.

 

5. Is pairing easy or not?

The pairing is quite easy. You need to hold on one of the speakers to get the two connected for the first time, and they will pair automatically afterwards.

 

6. Can I pair more than two speakers together?

GEMINI was designed to connect to two speakers at most, and we plan to research into connecting more than two speakers together if we reach our stretch goal.

 

7. Can I buy just one MiniS?

Sorry, we sell MiniS in pairs, but you can use them separately or together.

 

8. Can MiniS play and charge at the same time?

Yes, it can!

Campaign Promoted By

We can’t thank you enough for checking out our project and helping us make Zenbuds a reality. 

We know not everyone will be able to support us with a pledge, so even if you can’t give a dollar or pre-order a pair of Zenbuds, if you’re a supporter of Zenbuds, you can help us spread the word on Twitter, Facebook, Reddit, Instagram and anywhere else you can think of!
