story:
This   A M O

 

 

The World's First Multifunction 360° Camera.   It is designed for Everyone, Everywhere & Every time !

In the past, people used to distinguish the camera by its function, but now you can image that there will be a camera with all functions and that will be AMO 360.

It can show the picture and video by 360° and it can be home security to have function of P2P as IP Camera and video livestreaming to Facebook and YouTube directly and can be a webcam to use for video conference call and can be a driving recorder to secure your drive, and can be your partner while you do sporting or any exercise.

 

For Everyone, Everywhere ...And Any Weather

 

AMO  360° Video

Image you are doing the extreme sport or you are traveling in the south pole or even walking in the rain, you don’t need to carry a bunch of cameras and camera lens, all you need a just one AMO360 along with you.

With AMO 360 to capture your life, you can go to any place at any time！

 

AMO 360 is the one to satisfy for taking pictures and photography whatever in the aspects of sporting, living , traveling, driving, security or even activities at night time.

AMO makes your life with creativity and possibility.​

 

AMO 360 captures not only the 360° picture and video at any time, any place and any moment for your world but also to share it with your family and friends.

 

  • AMO 360 available for APP of IOS and Andriod system.
  • AMO 360 connect to Wi-Fi hotspot by APP of IOS and Android system to do real time review.
  • Monitor the live status by P2P as IP Camera.
  • Share 360° picture and video to your family and friend timely via Facebook and YouTube.
  • Connect to PC/Laptop to become a 360 ° video conference call.

 

 

 

 

Is the shipping date confirmed?

The product is almost 100% finished and ready to sell. If there is any update, we will share the information in time.

Will OIN publish other new products in the near future?​

Yes, we will publish the enhanced high FHD version and also the accessory type version of 360° camera.

What is the difference between AMO with others?

AMO is a multi-function 360 degree camera , you can use it at any where , any time and any place. Especially , AMO is the first 360 degree camera that can do the remote moniting in the world.

Does AMO360 have other functions except for taking picture and video recording?

Yes, the AMO360 can be used for the webcam for video conference, home/office security as IP Cam and driving recorder for car.

If I would like to be your product distributor in my country, who should I contact?

Thanks for your interesting in our product. Please contact our CEO Jerry, jerry@oin-tech.com to have a further discussion.

Does AMO360 provide the preview timely?

Yes, it can be done via our Andriod/iOS APP and also the PC Software.

How’s the weight of AMO in total?

172g.

How’s the size of AMO?

The size of AMO is 72.96mm*51.8mm*66.2mm. 

What are the available colors for AMO?

The available colors are Pink, Blue and Yellow. Please see the picture of product for more understanding.

Does AMO have function of waterproof?

No water proof. Please keep away of water when AMO is in using.

Any further design to make AMO to become waterproof?

No. but it might design in the new version.

How to make AMO to connect to APP and PC software?

It uses the Wi-Fi to connect the AMO and smartphone or laptop.

How to share the picture and video from APP?

To share any picture or video via the YouTube, Twitter, Facebook, Whatspp, Line, email by smartphone.

Does the battery be removed?

No, it can not be removed from AMO.

How to do the battery charge?

Please use micro USB to connect AMO. It can support up to 5V2A input.

How long will be for video recording?

Up to 1.5hrs - 2hrs.  

How many devices can connect to one AMO at the same time?

One device can only connect to one AMO at the same time.

How many APP and software available?

Yes, AMO has APP for Andriod, iOS and Windows-PC tool.

What is the capacity of SD card? And can it be removed or changed?

AMO has 32G Micro SD card embedded, but it can not be removed or changed.

Any warranty for AMO?

Yes, the AMO has one year warranty.  

What is the content of warranty?

The warranty does not include any damage or out of function because of man-made factors.

Does the shipping cost cover the duty and tax?

No, the shipping cost doesn’t include any duty or tax.

If I would like to be your product distributor in my country, who should I contact?

Thanks for your interesting in our product. Please contact our CEO Jerry, jerry@oin-tech.com to have a further discussion.

Please contact our CEO Jerry, jerry@oin-tech.com to have a further discussion.

story:
Please don't be deterred by the donation suggestions to your right. EVERYTHING helps, and we will find a way to give back.  

Our Story

During our founder & CEO Jessica Randolph’s time working at some of the top TV companies she was saddened to see that she was one of the only woman of color at the “table” of content development as an intern. These opportunities gave her a unique insight and she noticed that most produced content had little original content and were mostly based off of archaic stereotypes. From this realization birthed the understanding of the true power of perspective, its ability to be uplifting or damaging. Our mission is to bring the ideas of the unheard to the table, where they can be lucrative and used to benefit the community as a whole. We are not only social media curators, but storytellers with the purpose of impacting the world for the better.

The Exchange

Thus far, JessBe Creative has been a “mixtape dream” to a young Black millennial hustlin’ a 9-5 job to pay her exorbitant student loans. But limited financial resources were never a deterrent. Jessica attributes lots of support and dedication as the contributing factors that brought the dream into fruition. After two years of producing creative social media content and telling the story of local business owners, it is time for better equipment.

Our clients deserve the best production quality, and we deserve the tools to produce it. By donating you are not only supporting us to buy new equipment, but those who donate to the incentive packages have the opportunity to receive one of our service packages.

We would be able to purchase these supplies with your assistance:

Sony FS5 Camera ($6249)

3 new Canon Lenses ($2050 to $3050)

boom pole

memory cards

macbook pro ($2,500)

Manfrotto tripods

2 tablets ($300 a piece) 

Funds to register as an LLC

The Impact

The impact of the success of our project would not only include a heightened experience for our clients, but laying the foundation for a global social media marketing firm. Our long term goal is to establish ourselves as digital marketing powerhouse. Currently we serve clients in the DMV area and New York. Our short term goals include serving clients all around the nation. We look to expand to LA and MIA within the next two years. By investing in our business we would be able to continue to pay it forward and offer discounted services to community members in honor our beloved ancestors. Everyday we work towards building an organization that will withstand the test of time.

 

Overcoming Obstacles

We don’t believe in failure. We have too much heart to fail, but the cost of making it all happen is real. As millennials navigating student debt, we need your help to make it happen. By acquiring better equipment and the financial flexibility of more resources we will have everything we need to increase our production quality. Hard work, dedication and grit are the reason JessBeCreative has been real for two years. Our team posses all the qualities that can not be taught. Now are are asking for your financial support. 

Please don't be deterred by the donation suggestions to you right. EVERYTHING helps, and we will find a way to give back.  

 

Different Ways to Support Us

We appreciate your support and it isn’t limited to money. Here are some different ways you can assist:

 

Please share follow us on social media. (@jessbecre)

Share our Indiegogo on your own social media page.

Leave us positive messages on our social media.

 

And that's all there is to it.
